story:
==Scroll down for English version==

Aire Fresco no es solo una aplicación de meditación

Es una app que revoluciona el pensamiento y la inteligencia emocional y queremos compartirla con la mayor cantidad posible de personas.

La meditación y la concentración con plenitud mental o mindfulness han capturado recientemente la imaginación de los habitantes de Europa y América del Norte y llegó la hora de que 400 millones de hispanoparlantes disfruten también de sus beneficios.

Nos apasiona llevar la meditación a las masas, y Aire Fresco es la primera aplicación de su clase, diseñada especialmente para América Latina.

Diseñada por hispanohablantes para todos los hispanos

Nuestro fundador, Victor Coutin, de origen colombiano, encontró un enorme solaz en la meditación mientras navegaba por una etapa desafiante de su vida personal. A raíz de una ruptura matrimonial, la meditación le ayudó a volver a encontrar el sentido de las cosas y su inspiración fue el enorme impacto que la meditación tuvo en él. Ahora, ha reunido a un equipo internacional de expertos dedicados a que el acceso a la meditación sea fácil para toda Latino América y más.

Nos apasiona lo que hacemos y, cada uno de nosotros por diferentes razones, hemos descubierto personalmente cómo la meditación puede ayudarnos a atravesar los momentos difíciles de nuestra vida. 

De manera impecable, combinamos nuestra pasión por la meditación con nuestras aptitudes de diseño, ilustración, narración y negocios para que nuestro sueño sea una realidad. Con tu ayuda y patrocinio, podremos llevar la meditación al mundo hispano para que meditar sea tan natural como lavarse los dientes.

Esto se verá reflejado en comunidades más productivas, más compasivas, con niveles de salud mental y física más altos y mayor inteligencia emocional.

Queremos alcanzar la meta de 10,000 euros en los próximos 40 días para dar los toques finales a nuestra app y ponerla al alcance del público.

Utilizaremos estos fondos para terminar de cubrir el costo del módulo de gestión de pagos y suscripciones, grabaciones y masterización de audios y para poner en práctica la columna vertebral de nuestro enfoque de premios y puntuaciones "gamificación". 

El 65% de los fondos se utilizarán para codificación, específicamente los módulos mencionados anteriormente. 25% de los fondos serán utlizados para grabación de audios y masterización, y un 10% adicional se destinará para informar al público qué es Aire Fresco.

Sabemos que cada pequeño riesgo conlleva la expectativa de un beneficio, así que incentivaremos tu patrocinio de diversas maneras. Para informarte de todos los detalles, haz clic a cada recompensa para ver qué recibirás como agradecimiento. Algunas de nuestras recompensas son:

¿Y cómo se ve el éxito?

Sabremos que hemos dejado huella en el universo cuando la meditación forme parte integral de nuestras vidas, como lo es lavarnos las manos o hacer ejercicio.

Así, únete ahora que comenzamos la jornada y forma parte de la revolución silenciosa que llevará la meditación a las masas en todo el mundo de habla hispana y más allá.

Un precio bajo qué pagar a cambio de tu paz interior

¿Qué puede ser más valioso?

Y recuerda: compartir es una forma de apoyo, así que si no te sientes cómodo con ayudarnos económicamente en este momento, no te preocupes. Nos encantaría que nos apoyes con solo compartir la información con quienes te rodea, tu comunidad y amigos, y ayudarnos a correr la voz.

Aire Fresco: meditación para las masas.

 

Aire Fresco is not just a meditation app.

It is a revolution of thought and emotional intelligence and we want to share it with as many people as possible.

Mindfulness and meditation have recently captured the imagination of both Europe and North America and now it is time for the 400 million people in the Spanish speaking world to enjoy its benefits too.

We are passionate about bringing meditation to the masses and Aire Fresco is the first app of its kind specially designed for the Latin American market.

Designed by Spanish speakers for Spanish speakers

We were founded by Victor Coutin, a Colombian, who found great solace in meditation as he navigated his way through a challenging period of his personal life. Witnessing the break up of his marriage, meditation helped him to make sense of things and he was inspired by the profound impact it had on him. He has now assembled an international team of experts dedicated to bringing easy access to meditation to the people of Latin America and beyond.

We are passionate about what we do and each of us, for different reasons have personally discovered how meditation can help us through the difficult moments in our life. 

We are seamlessly combining our passion for meditation with our skills in design, illustration, storytelling and business to make our dream come true. With your help and support, we can bring meditation to the Spanish speaking world and make it as natural as brushing your teeth.

This will be reflected in more compassionate and productive communities with higher levels of physical and mental health and greater emotional intelligence.

We're looking to raise 10,000 euros in the next 40 days to tackle the finishing touches to our app and to get this show on the road. We'll use this money to finalise the payment and subscription management module for the app, record and master audios, and implement the skeleton for our exciting new gamification approach. 65% of our funds will be spent on coding, specifically for the modules mentioned previously and for the account and profile management module. 25% of the funds will be spent on audio recording and mastering, and a further 10% will be spent telling the world about Aire Fresco.

We know that with every little risk comes the expectation of a reward, so we'll be incentivising your support in a number of ways - for full details, check out our exciting perks section. Some of our perks include:

And what does success look like?

We'll know we've left our mark on the universe when meditation is an integral part of our lives, like washing our hands or exercising.

So, join us as we start our journey and be part of the quiet revolution that will bring meditation to the masses across the Spanish speaking world and beyond.

A small price to pay for inner peace.

What could be more worthwhile than that?

And remember, sharing is caring - so if you don't feel comfortable contributing right now, no worries. We'd love you to show your support by sharing with your communities and helping us to spread the word.

Aire Fresco - meditation for the masses.

story:
Air Mass Sanitiser (AMS) is an air filter designed to reduce unwanted airborne droplets, dust and particulate matter in indoor spaces.​
 

The high throughput air filter removes harmful droplets that may contain infectious material as well as dust particles from air in indoor spaces. The water droplets produced while coughing or sneezing may contain bacteria and viruses whilst dust and particulate matter may be respiratory irritants triggering hay fever and asthma. The removal of these particles is a significant health benefit and offers a layer of Protective Personal Equipment (PPE). This will be designed for rooms in hospitals, GP surgeries and care homes, but can also be used at home.

 

Tiny particles can remain airborne for many hours, especially in indoor environments with little air movement which is a particular problem during the current lockdown. Existing air filters cannot clean aerosol mists quickly enough and can get clogged up.

The aim of the project is to finalise a design that can be rapidly manufactured to help under the current lockdown conditions, but will remain a benefit in the future.

We have spent ~£350k and the last 4 years developing a similar product for reduction of indoor CO2 and particulate matter levels. This experience gives us a head start in the development of this new product.

We believe that this product would be of huge public benefit making this pivot  but we cannot produce it without your help.

You can get one for use in your house/office/business or contribute to help produce units that will be donated to hospitals, GP surgeries and care homes and help to keep people and also your loved ones safer.

AMS combines an innovative air filtration technique, ultraviolet lighting, and  a bio-wash scrubber, to capture and neutralise airborne droplets, dust and particulate matter.

The functioning principle is straightforward: air is drawn from the surroundings by the pump and injected into the unit.

The bigger droplets are split into microbubbles by a diffuser placed in the base, increasing the purification rate of the unit.

Microbubbles are initially filtered in a highly selective membrane, which efficiently traps particles the size of 0.01 microns.

The entrained particles are subjected to ultra-violet lighting and forced into the antiseptic fluid to remove infectious agents and particulate matter concentrations.

As a result, the air in a room is passed through the filter multiple times an hour removing these harmful agents.

 

 

Prototype liquid bubble maze

 

Prototype air flow measurement

story:
Remote free experience with your AC!

It's 2020, and sometimes we still wake up in the middle of the night because the room temperature is not suitable, sometimes it is too hot, and too cold other times. This urge us to develop a solution that not only senses the temperature and humidity, but also the ability to control any IR-controlled AC, to avoid discomfort during sleep (which is so tired).

Also, we don't want our users to buy a whole devices with any AC in their homes, therefore we split the device into 2 parts to reduce the cost user have to pay per AC:

The hub: plugged & connected to the wifi, in charge for calculating "optimal feels like temperature", and generating AC controlling command.

The spoke: battery powered, in charge for sensing room temperature, humidity, light & send IR signal to the AC following command received from the hub. Also, with IR receiver integrated, the spoke can also recorded how user control the AC with the remote controller, saving historical data to create personalized preferable temperature.

Though more experiments are required, we expect to be able to detect "abnormal environmental changes" through room temperature changes, like a window or door open, then notify users to avoid wasted energy. 

And from financial view, with akaCoola, we aim to create a device that have reasonable prices, deliver faster ROI, and supporting our users in saving money on energy bills.

So, better sleep experience, remote free, and saving energy bills. These are our goals.

Where we are right now

We started since mid 2019. In Dec, the first version was completed, we test, and found out problems in IR compatibility, together with issues in BLE ICU.

In March 2020, 20 sets of hub and spoke 2nd version was completed, they are running in a school dorm at this moment. we expect the field test to be completed in next 3 months, in a total 6 months field tests

It costed us around 30000 USD to this point, and to have the final version be ready for shipping, we estimate around 20000 plus device manufacturing costs. 

What is the biggest challenges

Is should be how the team lack of experiences in designing a completed products, especially in hardware. We were able to finish the mobile app and setting up the IoT platform on cloud pretty quickly in just 2 months, but for the hardware, we made a lot of mistakes in designing the board, choosing the ICU, and put them together for a long run.

Fortunately, we have support from professors of University of Technology and Education Ho Chi Minh city, from design, test equipment to 3D printer, and reviewing the board.

So 

better sleep experience, remote free, and saving energy bills. These are our goals.

Thank you <3

story:
With the current situation, keeping your household and working environment sanitized is more important than ever. As the flu season approaches, it is essential to pay attention to invisible germs and viruses. Presently, hand sanitizers and other disinfectant products can become expensive over time, but what if we tell you that there is a better solution to protect your family?

Introducing Enpuly, the all-purpose spray maker generates and stores electrolyzed water that kills  all of bacteria and germs.

Portable, affordable, and 100% natural, the reusable spray maker brings the most effective disinfectant technology to any place you can imagine.

Just add tap water and table salt to make this 100% natural and non-toxic cleaning solution with Enpuly. In just 3 minutes, a bottle of homemade natural disinfection solution is ready to use. It's that simple!

Enpuly is integrated with an electrolyzer to produce the electrolysis of tap water and table salt, resulting in the product of hypochlorous acid and hydroxide.

The Electrolytic brine generates chlorine gas, which dissolves in the water and produces sodium hydroxide in the solution. The solution from the electrolysis process is called EOW/ electrolyzed oxidation water.

                       

EOW is a powerful disinfectant that is safe for humans, animals, food, and surfaces. Hydroxide radicals are commonly found in cleaning detergents, and hypochlorous acid kills all kinds of micro bacteria, fungi, and germs.

According to chemists and scientists, the concentration of hydroxide radicals in our EOW is lower than any other cleaning detergents in the market. In other words, Enpuly's EOW is safer and more effective at killing all harmful germs and bacteria that are present in your home and wherever you go.

 

Only one Enpuly disinfectant spray bottle replaces all other cleaners to clean all germs and bacteria that human eyes cannot see.

Germs Hot Spots

Germs and bacteria live on surfaces such as carpets, sofas and bed linen, with which one comes into daily contact.

 

Statistics show that about 27% of toilet seats are contaminated with mold and yeast, and the bathroom is one of the germ's most popular party places.

 

About 45% of kitchen sink tested positive for coliform bacteria, while 27% contained molds. Yuck.

 

Dish sponges and rags are used for cleaning, but ironically, it is the germiest item in your household. That's right, sponges and dishrags contained 77% harbored coliform bacteria, and 18% contained staph bacteria.

Kills Bacteria & Germs

The homemade Enpuly disinfectant spray kills most of all germs, bacteria, and other dangerous microorganisms.

 

Sterilizes & Deodorizes

Enpuly sterilizes and deodorizes everything and purifies the air to protect you and your family from harmful particles.

 

One-Click Control

Select the concentration level you need and make the disinfectant spray easily with one-click control.

 

3 Minutes Ready to Use

Just add a spoon of salt and mix water to produce sodium hypochlorite, and the powerful disinfectant solution is ready to use within 3 minutes.

 

Removes Pesticides

Only tap water does not remove all germs and pesticides from meat, vegetable, and fruit. With Enpuly, you can effectively remove pesticide residues and pollutants from the surface of fruit or produce.

 

100% Natural & Non-Toxic

Made only with tap water and table salt, EOW is 100% NATURAL and NON-TOXIC, which is 100% safe for children and pets.

 

Designed for Every Situation

Enpuly offers two bottles in different sizes for your convenience. The standard-sized bottle is for your household, and the portable sized bottle is for your life on the go. Carry the portable bottle anywhere and stay healthy at all times.

 

Continuous Spray

A bottle produces up to 400 times of sprays that you can use during your commute or in your household.

 

No Expensive Refills

Never spend a penny on cleaning products again! You only need to buy the disinfectant spray maker once, and it can be used for up to 4-5 years. Enpuly does all the hard work and save your money by treating yourself to a delicious dessert.

Testing video:

 

Usage:

 

We destroy our health and our environment every day

The traditional daily cleaning products are a threat to our health and Mother Earth. The harmful ingredients of many cleaners include ammonia and bleach, which are detrimental to our lungs but also toxic to animals. VOCs and other chemicals released when cleaners are used contribute to many health problems such as chronic respiratory problems, allergic reactions, and headaches.

 

Most plastic packaging takes over 400 years to decompose, and more than 80 billion plastics end up in our oceans and landfills. Not only is the wasted chemical harmful to the environment but buying new cleaning supplies consumes a lot of unwanted waste and is not budget friendly.

 

Why opt for Enpuly – The Cleaner, and Safer Choice

We desire to create a non-toxic and 100% natural disinfecting technology at an affordable price. Enpuly is budget-friendly, and you can make EOW with the ingredients you find in your homes.

 

Unlike traditional cleaning products, Enpuly is environmentally friendly and can be reused for up to 4-5 years without disposing of unnecessary plastic or chemical waste. We are tired of seeing our loving animals eating plastics or losing their homes due to pollution. Please join our passionate community and make the change we need today.

Sterilization Test:

The ENPULY team has gathered a number of experts with more than 15 years of product design experience, a strong marketing and sales team, and a strong factory production and manufacturing capacity.

 

ENPULY was derived from the trading agency of world-renowned electrical products, and has deepened the characteristics of electronic products. We deeply understand consumer needs; Simple cost-effective, and stable quality products are the goal of our product design.

 

We hope ENPULY can bring health, convenience and happiness to every family. Our slogan: choose ENPULY, health with you.

We research on core components to optimize performance parameters; analyze key components to optimize product stability; analyze overall assembly to optimize mold and assembly issues. After modeling, multiple rounds of reliability testing, trial production and other links to ensure product quality.

Partner With

You only need to buy the disinfectant spray maker once, and it can be used for up to 4-5 years. Enpuly does all the hard work and save your money by treating yourself to a delicious dessert.Testing video:

 
Usage: We destroy our health and our environment every dayThe traditional daily cleaning products are a threat to our health and Mother Earth. The harmful ingredients of many cleaners include ammonia and bleach, which are detrimental to our lungs but also toxic to animals. VOCs and other chemicals released when cleaners are used contribute to many health problems such as chronic respiratory problems, allergic reactions, and headaches. Most plastic packaging takes over 400 years to decompose, and more than 80 billion plastics end up in our oceans and landfills. Not only is the wasted chemical harmful to the environment but buying new cleaning supplies consumes a lot of unwanted waste and is not budget friendly. Why opt for Enpuly – The Cleaner, and Safer ChoiceWe desire to create a non-toxic and 100% natural disinfecting technology at an affordable price. Enpuly is budget-friendly, and you can make EOW with the ingredients you find in your homes. Unlike traditional cleaning products, Enpuly is environmentally friendly and can be reused for up to 4-5 years without disposing of unnecessary plastic or chemical waste. We are tired of seeing our loving animals eating plastics or losing their homes due to pollution. Please join our passionate community and make the change we need today.Sterilization Test:The ENPULY team has gathered a number of experts with more than 15 years of product design experience, a strong marketing and sales team, and a strong factory production and manufacturing capacity. ENPULY was derived from the trading agency of world-renowned electrical products, and has deepened the characteristics of electronic products. We deeply understand consumer needs; Simple cost-effective, and stable quality products are the goal of our product design. We hope ENPULY can bring health, convenience and happiness to every family. Our slogan: choose ENPULY, health with you.We research on core components to optimize performance parameters; analyze key components to optimize product stability; analyze overall assembly to optimize mold and assembly issues. After modeling, multiple rounds of reliability testing, trial production and other links to ensure product quality.Partner With

story:
This is what drove me to form Parabiotic Research & Development.

This new PATENTED treatment is based on Parabiotic’s drug PB-1, which is a combination antibiotic/probiotic formulation encapsulated together in one single dose that will help with patient convenience and compliance in not forgetting to take their medications at the proper times. There is no other drug on the market today for Inflammatory Bowel Disease that has the same properties as PB-1 that is both therapeutic and prophylactic combined in one single capsule.

  • The evidence for bacterial linkage in disease is well documented by leading investigators worldwide and provides the basis for the rationale behind Parabiotic’s combination drug products and its Method for Treatment.
  • PB-1 will offer doctors a less toxic, safer and more effective treatment option than the current use of steroids, immunosuppressants and biologics.
  • Will minimize secondary infections such as c. difficile due to antibiotic therapy
  • As opposed to most antibiotics that dissolve in the stomach with negative side-effects, PB-1 is a pH dependent dual-release capsule targeted for delivery to the areas of highest need
  • PB-1 and its patented Method for Treatment will address an underlying cause of disease pathogenic bacteria- as opposed to being merely symptom managing.

COLON CANCER USUALLY GROWS OVER THE COURSE OF TIME WHEN THE COLON IS SUBJECTED TO PERSISTENT INFLAMMATION. THE RESULT OF THAT CHRONIC INFLAMMATION IS A DIRECT CAUSAL FACTOR LEADING TO DISEASE. WE BELIEVE THAT THIS COMBINATION THERAPY IS ONE OF THE MOST IMPORTANT ADVANCES IN MEDICINE AND MAY MITIGATE THE CHRONIC INFLAMMATION AND CHAIN OF EVENTS THAT OFTEN LEAD TO COLORECTAL CANCER.



  • During the course of my illness, I consulted with many leading gastroenterologists and medical experts and documented over 30,000 pages of medical literature- and thru this I was able to connect the dots of known knowledge that formed the rationale which is the basis for Parabiotic’s patented Method for Treatment. This sentiment is shared by key opinion leaders in the fields of Gastroenterology, Pulmonology, Infectious disease and Integrated medicine
  • You may have friends and family members who suffer from this debilitating disease and our goal is to bring them long-term symptom free remission.
  • Our immediate needs are to fund the formulation of PB-1 and start the FDA approval process that will allow us to proceed to a first of its kind clinical trial.
  • Your support matters and will help us to make this ground- breaking new treatment available to help the millions of sufferers worldwide.

Thank you for your consideration of this most important project

story:
Jawzrsize was created to form the ultimate jawline, while firming and toning your facial features.

Using Jawzrsize for just 5 minutes a day will allow you to feel the difference and soreness, as your jaw works hard to strengthen itself.

Jawzrsize was inspired by the founder who, after a motorcycle crash, realized his need to train his jaw muscles to regain range of motion. Soon after, he not only realized that Jawzrsize was a great product for recovery, but also that the many other benefits included a well defined jawline, a spike in overall focus, increase in metabolism, and much more. 

Jawzrsize trains one of the most important, yet forgotten muscles in your jaw, the masseter muscle.

 

 

Jawzrsize is for all adults wanting to tone, firm, and strengthen the entire facial and neck area.

For anybody looking to achieve a slimmer face, or to reduce the double chin effect, Jawzrsize is your solution.

For athletes, Jawzrsize helps improve the body's mind-muscle connection (muscle memory), while simultaneously increasing your focus and apprehension.

For males, Jawzrsize can help sculpt a distinctive masculine jawline, as well as increase metabolism through the constant chewing motion.

For females, Jawzrsize can help tone and firm the jawline, while activating all the facial muscles, which in turn creates a much younger appearance and overall look.

 

 

 

 

Hart used Jawzrsize for 20 minutes a day. The left side of the photo, taken April 2016 and the right side of photo taken 7 weeks after in June 2016. 

 

Valerie used Jawzrsize for 10 weeks for 20 minutes a day. She noticed a significant toning and firming of her face and decrease of her wrinkles.

 

Jawzrsize made with Food Grade, FDA-compliant materials.

Made out of silicone and polyurethane.

 

What Past Customers are Saying

 

Unpackaging of Jawzrsize

 

What We Need 

We successfully raised over $16,000 last year on Kickstarter, which allowed us to complete our first round of prototypes, including the tooling and manufacturing.  We are now looking to hit our new fundraising goal of $20,000 so that we can buy more tools to create more options, such as different resistance levels, sizes, and more colors.

 

 

This product is intended to be placed in the mouth and chewed. The dangers associated with use of product include CHOKING, SINUS HEADACHES AND PAIN, SORE/SENSITVE TEETH, SORE JAWS, NECK AND UPPER SHOULDER PAIN and INFECTIONS. If you are prone to sinus headaches or if your neck, jaw, teeth, or head were injured before using the product, consult with your doctor on whether your condition allows you to use the product safely. If after using the product, you experience pain that does not subside, stop using the product and consult with your doctor.

 

 

Besides the Jawzrsize device itself, we have some amazing swag!!
Check them out below.

 

14KTJAWZRSIZE LOGO PENDANT WITH DIAMOND

The Jawzrsize Logo pendant is made from 14kt yellow gold featuring a .04cts diamond with a 3mm Italian Diamond cut rope chain. Unisex for both men & women.

Weight: 4.5 grams

 

Along with these necklace and chain, you will receive 10 Jawzrsize 5 T-shirts/tanks and 5 hats.

MEN'S T-SHIRT OPTIONS

Some of the backer rewards come with our Jawzrsize T-shirts, designed in Maui, Hawaii. Men's JAWZRSIZE T-shirts is great for working out, casual wear, or combine it with a Jawzrsize hat!

The dri-fit shirts are of high quality made from 40% polyester, 60% cotton. 

You get the choice of size, color, and back design.

 

Size: S, M, L, XL, XXL

Colors Available: Black or Military Green

Back of Shirt Design: "Fitness 4 Your Face" or "Put Some Bite"

 

WOMEN'S TANKTOP OPTIONS

Some of the backer rewards come with our Jawzrsize racerback tank tops, designed in Maui, Hawaii. Great for working out, casual wear, or combine it with a Jawzrsize hat! 

You get the choice of size and color.

The dri-fit tank tops are of high quality made from 38% polyester, 57% cotton, 5% spandex.

Size: S, M, L, XL

Color: Black, Blue

HATS OPTIONS

Some of the backer rewards come with our Jawzrsize racerback tank tops, designed in Maui, Hawaii. 

Available in FlexFits or Snapbacks. FlexFits are One Size Fits All, L-XL. Snapbacks have plastic backstrap for adjustable size.

FlexFit colors: Black, Gray

Snapback colors: Black, Gray, Camouflage, Turquoise with white side mesh, Dark gray, Black with black side mesh, Black with white side mesh, Aloha pattern, Black hat with camo brim.

Spreading a little Aloha on all snapbacks on the inside of hats.

STICKER

A large 8 in x 3.5 in white Jawzrsize logo sticker.

 

Trip to Maui, Hawaii

 

The largest reward is for $4999 will get you a fully-guided Maui Adventure Excursion with CEO of Jawzrsize.

4 Nights at Luxury Hotel.

Spend time in the outdoors and choose 4 outdoor excursions all while training to use Jawzrsize with Brandon.

Activities to choose from: surfing, kayaking, hiking, ziplining, rappelling waterfalls, snorkeling with sea turtles, yoga, stand up paddling, or whale watching.

 

Catching the sunset the Haleakala Crater summit of 10,000 feet above sea level.

 One of activities - snorkeling with sea turtles

 

Risks & Challenges

We already have an established prototype and the first 500 Jawzrsize products has been shipped out. We currently have three colors - Red & Blue & Military Green.

T-shirts, tanktops, and hats are designed on Maui and we already have first 2000 stocked up, ready to be shipped. We can re-order locally quickly.

We hope you understand that challenges may arise with manufacturing, packaging, and shipping, but our goal is to fulfill orders as soon as we can so that we get Jawzrsize in your hands quickly.

We expect first shipments to be sent out early January. If you want to get your Jawzrsize before Christmas, be sure to get "Get it now" for $29, assuming you are ordering at least 10 days before Christmas in the USA.

We promise to keep you updated on our progress and be transparent in any challenges that arise, but none are foreseen at this time.

story:
Our PLAYAstation

Last year we asked you to console-trate your star power and Yoshi egg aim as we took to the track for multi player battle balloon mode. With a creative pit crew you avoided the Thwomps, got to use your Boo and took a spin in our Mushroom Cup. We finished with a desert Max Max mash up where you were the rocker, the roller, the out of controllers. Oh what a lovely day it was to bring Fury Road vs Mario Karts.

This year we have upped our game play and it really is another level of human sized Super Mario pedal go-karting. Trapped inside an electric arena where love and escape do not compute, we invite you to step inside the world of Mario Kart Vs Tron an electronic gladiator game guaranteed to end in dusty hugs and daft punks. The game has changed as we ask you to take on the Tron Kings and their light cycles. Can two plumbers save the Grid from going down the drain? The only way to win is to radically survive.

 

Help us power up our human sized PLAYAstation

Alongside Nowhere's evening party-icipation there will now be an opportunity to be radically included in an other-worldly game when the sun goes down and the lights come on but it isn't cheep -cheeps and we do need some coins to accelerate this project.

Nowhere have already got the wheels spinning with the confirmation of a 1000 euro grant and we are hoping that you can also give this project extra life.

WHERE WE (N)INTENDO TO SPEND THE MONEY:

  • Lights. Lots and lots of em. We're talking acres of el wire, Solar powered, diffusers, and enough LEDS for this game to be seen from out of space. (£800)
  • Replacement pedal go kart after it bit Nowhere's dust (£150)
  • Pedal go kart spares and repairs (£80)
  • Inner and outer new track fencing (£200)
  • Scaffolding for the main frame. (£300)
  • Bikes (turn into light cycles) x 4 (£200)
  • Super Mario replacement character costumes and repairs (£300)
  • Creation of new Tron costumes (including Tron costumes and light discs) (£300)

If we do not reach our entire goal we will be super appreciative of the help we have received. We are already putting a lot of money into the game, and getting it to Spain and are hoping that gameboys and girls can make it as spectacular as it can possible be at this year's Nowhere. 


Modes of Play and Other Ways You Can Help

Appreciating that there are plenty of other ways to power up this project here are some core ways to participate if you'd like to get involved:

  • Setting up the track at Nowhere
  • Lakitu compering at Nowhere
  • El wiring human sized bananas, mushrooms, dinosaurs, gorillas, princesses and plumbers. We need to make them all spark before Nowhere.
  • Share this project with friends

story:
Boxair is a truly innovative product for men with unmatched health-promoting benefits. 

Boxair brings the category of men's underwear to a new level by introducing a product that is not only comfortable, stylish and of highest quality but also cares for men's reproductive and sexual health  and serves as a natural  fertility aid. 

The combination of high-tech and organic fabrics and patented structure reproduce the useful effect of the underwear -  to protect the intimate zone from overheating and excessive sweating. The patented anatomic design follows body curves and high-tech materials create healthy and natural environment that allows your skin to breathe. 





The specially  designed cooling  section of the underwear  consists  of two  different tech fibers, which optimize  air  circulation and  improve  thermodynamics  of the intimate zone.  Nano-crystals  treatment  and  cross-section structure of fibers create draining system that pulls moisture away from the skin to the outer layer of the fabric. The cooling section protects testicles and inner thighs from contact, while the intimate parts stay naturally relaxed and physically comfortable. The side panels are constructed to follow the anatomic curves of men's body and delicately shape  the intimate area without putting pressure and tension.
 


Side membrane mesh boosts  airflow and  due to  innate  body movements, even  while resting,  there  is continuous air circulation in the section, providing coolness and moisture control. The combination of two high-end tech fibers stops the increase of testicular temperature. Up to 90% of far infrared rays, also known as body heat, are being transferred, which promotes blood circulation and thermoregulation. Mineral  content in  tech fibers controls  humidity,  keeps  testicles  dry  and  eliminates  body  odors.
The body of the underwear is made of high quality combed cotton for natural experience and freedom of movement.

    

Boxair is not just underwear.
Boxair is a proactive step towards everyday care and prevention. Its innovative features determine the benefits of its daily use.

 


When choosing from our perks, don't miss to check the size chart.


We rarely talk about it but...numbers talk instead...
World map containing percentages of infertility cases per region that are due to male factor. This figure demonstrates rates of infertility cases in each region studied (North America, Latin America, Africa, Europe, Central/Eastern Europe, Middle East.

Source:http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4424520/figure/Fig2/

Heat is among the top causes of reduced fertility in men. The sources of heat to the family jewels range from tighty whities to laptops, fevers or anatomy issues. All of these things can actually impact your fertility. 

No one is protected.

Did you know that testicles should always be cooler than other parts of your intimate area?
Your body is designed to keep the testes cooler than regular body temp: that's why they hang outside your body...The warmer environment, the lower they want to hang, but when its real cold they hike up. The sweat glands are there to further lower temps by evaporation - the same reason you sweat in other places. 
Testicles are the sperm keepers. Sperm are finely crafted little baby making machines. They require a precise environment, 3 to 4 degrees cooler than body temperature. That is why they are "separated" in testicles outside the body. If sperm are exposed to elevated temperatures, they begin to die. This will show up on a semen analysis as reduced mobility. If the exposure to heat is prolonged, it can affect sperm production processes, causing the body to produce fewer sperm, many of which may be abnormally shaped.

Here are some of the most common heat sources:

Environmental Sources
• Cooking

• Grilling
• Motorcycles
• Hottubs
• Saunas
• Laptops
• Cell phones
• Tight-fitting clothing
• Cycling

Physiological Sources

• Varicocele
• Undecended / late decended testicle
• Obesity (scrotal fat)
• Fever

We are sure that you all have friends who are struggling to have a baby. Help us fight one of the biggest problems of the modern world - the decreasing male fertility. There are so many couples all around the world whose only dream is to have a child. 

Let's make it together! Help us spread our mission!

Boxair has already come to life. For the time being we were able to pay for the design and manufacture of the first bulk, as well as the branding and advertising concept. We have the ready product, the website, the packaging and the advertising materials. Now it is time to introduce Boxair to the world, but we are out of steam. We don not have the money to promote our product to potential distributors and clients at the most influential underwear international shows - MODE CITY Lyon, France and CURVE in Las Vegas, USA.

If you help us raise  20 000 USD,  we will be able to exhibit at the above mentioned fairs and  to promote our product to more distributors, boutiques, chain stores and agents. Thus more people will learn about Boxair and will benefit from its health promoting characteristics in regard to mens' fertility and health.

We will spend the money for exhibition fees, transportation, logistics, accommodation, hiring a model, etc. More than half of the money goes for the exhibition fees, e.g - a small 30 sq.ft.(10 sq.m.) stand at the fair costs about 6000 USD. If we succeed to raise more than the pledged amount we will rent a bigger stand and will be more attractive. If we can not reach the target of 20 000 USD, we will only take part in one of the shows, which  will  probably greatly decrease our chances, but nonetheless we will do it. 

You can also help us by spreading the word for our campaign and product. Sharing this campaign with your friends and acquaintances will also help us a great deal. 


THANK YOU ALL FOR THE SUPPORT!


                                                The INTRO Perk

1 pair of Boxair Underwear (10% Off RRP)
You receive 1 peice of BOXAIR boxer in original packaging + 1 piece of original biodegradable Boxair pen+1 Boxair booklet


The 2 Pack & Small Boxair face towel Perk

You get 2 pairs of BOXAIR  (10% Off RRP) + original Boxair face towel 30/50 cm+1 biodegradable  Boxair pen + 1  Boxair booklet.

The IndieGoGo Exlusive perk

You get 2 pieces of basic colors BOXAIRs + 1 exclusive BOXAIR Indiegogo edition  (watermelon and blue) (17% OFF RRP) + 1 piece of original biodegradable Boxair pen+1 Boxairbooklet.


The Boxair 4 color pack Perk

4 Pack  BOXAIR (20% Off RRP)  You get the four different colors of BOXAIR underwear.


5 BOXAIRs + BOXAIR messanger bag Perk

5 BOXAIRs  (20% Off RRP) You get 5 pairs of Boxair + Boxair messenger bag.


The Week pack Perk /our favourite/

You get 6 BOXAIR + Bonus Special Boxair Indiegogo Edition + Boxair Tee+ towel 30/50 cm. This pack will get you thru your busy weeks and will keep you cool and dry... sexy as well!


2 working weeks COOL pack Perk

You get 10 pairs of BOXAIR (25% Off RRP)+ big 70/140cm  Boxair beach towel.


The JUMBO pack Perk - the bigger, the better!

You get 1 carton box with 24 pairs of BOXAIR (30% Off RRP) + Tee+ Boxair 30/50 cm face towel + Big Boxair 70/140 cm beach towel+ Boxair travel backpack to fill all these goodies into.



Want to sell BOXAIR UNDERWEAR in your store?
That is great! Just email us with your info at  office@boxair.bg
story_txt:
Boxair is a truly innovative product for men with unmatched health-promoting benefits. 
Boxair brings the category of men's underwear to a new level by introducing a product that is not only comfortable, stylish and of highest quality but also cares for men's reproductive and sexual health  and serves as a natural  fertility aid. 
The combination of high-tech and organic fabrics and patented structure reproduce the useful effect of the underwear -  to protect the intimate zone from overheating and excessive sweating. The patented anatomic design follows body curves and high-tech materials create healthy and natural environment that allows your skin to breathe. 
















The specially  designed cooling  section of the underwear  consists  of two  different tech fibers, which optimize  air  circulation and  improve  thermodynamics  of the intimate zone.  Nano-crystals  treatment  and  cross-section structure of fibers create draining system that pulls moisture away from the skin to the outer layer of the fabric. The cooling section protects testicles and inner thighs from contact, while the intimate parts stay naturally relaxed and physically comfortable. The side panels are constructed to follow the anatomic curves of men's body and delicately shape  the intimate area without putting pressure and tension.
 






Side membrane mesh boosts  airflow and  due to  innate  body movements, even  while resting,  there  is continuous air circulation in the section, providing coolness and moisture control. The combination of two high-end tech fibers stops the increase of testicular temperature. Up to 90% of far infrared rays, also known as body heat, are being transferred, which promotes blood circulation and thermoregulation. Mineral  content in  tech fibers controls  humidity,  keeps  testicles  dry  and  eliminates  body  odors.The body of the underwear is made of high quality combed cotton for natural experience and freedom of movement.




    




Boxair is not just underwear.Boxair is a proactive step towards everyday care and prevention. Its innovative features determine the benefits of its daily use.








 




When choosing from our perks, don't miss to check the size chart.










We rarely talk about it but...numbers talk instead...World map containing percentages of infertility cases per region that are due to male factor. This figure demonstrates rates of infertility cases in each region studied (North America, Latin America, Africa, Europe, Central/Eastern Europe, Middle East.
Source:http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4424520/figure/Fig2/

Heat is among the top causes of reduced fertility in men. The sources of heat to the family jewels range from tighty whities to laptops, fevers or anatomy issues. All of these things can actually impact your fertility. 



No one is protected.

Did you know that testicles should always be cooler than other parts of your intimate area?Your body is designed to keep the testes cooler than regular body temp: that's why they hang outside your body...The warmer environment, the lower they want to hang, but when its real cold they hike up. The sweat glands are there to further lower temps by evaporation - the same reason you sweat in other places. Testicles are the sperm keepers. Sperm are finely crafted little baby making machines. They require a precise environment, 3 to 4 degrees cooler than body temperature. That is why they are "separated" in testicles outside the body. If sperm are exposed to elevated temperatures, they begin to die. This will show up on a semen analysis as reduced mobility. If the exposure to heat is prolonged, it can affect sperm production processes, causing the body to produce fewer sperm, many of which may be abnormally shaped.
Here are some of the most common heat sources:
Environmental Sources

• Cooking• Grilling• Motorcycles• Hottubs• Saunas• Laptops• Cell phones• Tight-fitting clothing• CyclingPhysiological Sources
• Varicocele• Undecended / late decended testicle• Obesity (scrotal fat)• Fever






We are sure that you all have friends who are struggling to have a baby. Help us fight one of the biggest problems of the modern world - the decreasing male fertility. There are so many couples all around the world whose only dream is to have a child. 
Let's make it together! Help us spread our mission!
Boxair has already come to life. For the time being we were able to pay for the design and manufacture of the first bulk, as well as the branding and advertising concept. We have the ready product, the website, the packaging and the advertising materials. Now it is time to introduce Boxair to the world, but we are out of steam. We don not have the money to promote our product to potential distributors and clients at the most influential underwear international shows - MODE CITY Lyon, France and CURVE in Las Vegas, USA.
If you help us raise  20 000 USD,  we will be able to exhibit at the above mentioned fairs and  to promote our product to more distributors, boutiques, chain stores and agents. Thus more people will learn about Boxair and will benefit from its health promoting characteristics in regard to mens' fertility and health.
We will spend the money for exhibition fees, transportation, logistics, accommodation, hiring a model, etc. More than half of the money goes for the exhibition fees, e.g - a small 30 sq.ft.(10 sq.m.) stand at the fair costs about 6000 USD. If we succeed to raise more than the pledged amount we will rent a bigger stand and will be more attractive. If we can not reach the target of 20 000 USD, we will only take part in one of the shows, which  will  probably greatly decrease our chances, but nonetheless we will do it. 
You can also help us by spreading the word for our campaign and product. Sharing this campaign with your friends and acquaintances will also help us a great deal. 

THANK YOU ALL FOR THE SUPPORT!




                                                The INTRO Perk
1 pair of Boxair Underwear (10% Off RRP) You receive 1 peice of BOXAIR boxer in original packaging + 1 piece of original biodegradable Boxair pen+1 Boxair booklet

The 2 Pack & Small Boxair face towel Perk
You get 2 pairs of BOXAIR  (10% Off RRP) + original Boxair face towel 30/50 cm+1 biodegradable  Boxair pen + 1  Boxair booklet.

story:
About This Project


 I was diagnosed with a severe case of ulcerative colitis when I was in secondary school or (high school) and engaged in the normal medical treatment at the time but was still in and out of periods of regression and remission throughout my university years. So I decided to dedicate my life to getting better.

I became medically trained; I became trained in Food science and Human Nutrition, all the sciences and the scientific literature surrounding the digestive tract and autoimmune disease. It was a long road but thankfully I do not have Ulcerative colitis or bowel disease now for 10 years; I am perfectly healthy and take no medication or have had no surgeries. I am cured.


Now I was very happy to put this entire journey behind me and never think about it again, I didn’t discuss it much, even with friends and family because and it brings me back to a dark place in my life, id rather leave in the past.

But now things have changed!

30 years on there is no progress with the treatment of inflammatory bowel disease. It is still deemed an incurable disease and the treatment protocol is still many medications and surgeries that have high levels of side effects yet still not reversing the disease process! The top gastroenterologist are still saying the same thing as they were saying 30 years ago; Inflammatory bowel disease(IBD) namely Uncreative Colitis and Crohn’s disease, has no cure, diet has nothing to do with it, you likely have to take medication for life and possibly endure surgeries down the track.

This is unacceptable anymore!



It is this disturbing fact, along with the fact that IBD is increasing worldwide and affecting more and more people close to me that has forced me to take action and use my knowledge and experience to change the narrative surrounding IBD and bring about change.


I have achieved academic qualifications containing in-depth studies in areas of immunology and microbiology, anatomy and physiology, human nutrition, pharmacology, evidence- based medicine and, although I do not hold the title of medical doctor, professor or PhD I have read more scientific papers in gastroenterology than I could count. All this acquired knowledge and life experience I feel, by any metric, makes me an expert in the area of Inflammatory Bowel Disease.


In the last 12 months I decided to write a book to act as a self-help guide for people suffering with ulcerative colitis and Crohn’s disease, outlining a treatment protocol with the main focus on REVERSING the disease, and returning to health. Yes reversing the disease, not suppressing the immune system or the inflammation, not controlling the symptoms etc, but actually removing the disease process completely.

I am looking for funding to finish and publish the book and get it out there to as many people as possible to help drive the change that is long overdue in this area and to help stop the suffering because in my opinion the tools and knowledge exist today to minimize and eliminate the suffering

Thank you for your support

In Health

story:
How many times we configure the monitor in a day? Never?!

Having generally put once the appropriate settings we forget about setup! Because it isn't convenient and takes time away! 

And at the same time we absolutely forget how it affects us.

EYE-SAVE was born from personal disappointment in recent developments in this sphere. It has induced us to create the simple solution suitable practically for all models of computers.  Lightweight, durable and rather small.

EYE-SAVE – the external device that can be connected to the computer and easily attached to any surface. Will be equipped USB and Wi-Fi  and compatible with the basic operating systems.

Nowadays the existing research don't allow to adjust automatically the screen settings (on the created dependency (profile) for regulation and comfortable operating), some change the screen temperature, as a result it seems uncomfortable. And if to take into account the five - ten years old computers and monitors the situation is absolutely sadly in the absence of any similar systems.

Communicating with different people and friends, we came to the conclusion that it is the main problem, setup inconvenience and regular monitors settings.

Our team developed EYE-SAVE which are reduces the unpleasant symptoms associated with eye strain, makes interaction more convenient and comfortable, allows adjusting automatically the monitor luminosity in accordance the external illumination thereby reducing exhaustion of eyes.

Scientists report, that up to 90% of the information people receive through vision. Statistics shows that a huge number of people spends more and more time at the computer. For example, experts from the USA have warned about the risk of reduced quality of vision in a rapidly developing digital age.

If you spend more than 2-3 hours in front of a monitor you have a 90% chance of developing digital eye strain, it is dangerous and can cause development of the disease or visual loss.

Many of us spend hours looking at the monitor screen, and a way of life without action is fraught with a lot of health hazards, especially from childhood!

Proper lighting and optimal settings of your monitor – this is one of the most essential recommendations for reducing eye strain when working at the computer.

Different studies confirm that it turns our eyes get very tired when they have to peer at the dim monitor in bright sunlight, or, conversely, staring at a dazzling spot monitor in the dark, later this can affect the overall fatigue of the body , headaches, blindness. That is by changing the external lighting you need to modify the luminosity of screen and take breaks more often. 

Few people know that, that it's possible the lighting should be natural, any artificial lights are not enough friendly view and subsequently tires.

We offer the system which will undertake these functions, will make for eyes more favorable conditions for work at any time thereby will rid you of changing the screen parameters and as a result will keep the eyesight after the long using.

EYE-SAVE will be very useful for all who spends a lot of time at the computer more than 2 hours a day.

Setup will take less than 10 minutes. Easy connection and setup in 3 steps:

  1. Connect the device
  2. Launch the program on the computer
  3. Enjoy working, use manual, training or automatic modes

When you work at the computer and feel eye irritation, simple adjust settings by quick keys (manual or training mode),

system will remember the configuration and subsequently will adjust all parameters automatically (automatic mode)!

The software has less than 1% consumption of CPU resources and device has very low power consumption about 120mA ! Real green tree !

We really wondered why this type of product does not exist yet. So we decided that if nobody else is going to do is we're going to give him a lucky chance.

The device is a PCB with a microcontroller, a digital sensor, USB adapter and WiFi module . Powered via a micro-USB port on the computer or an external power supply when transferring data over WiFi. So, you can't set something wrong.

Base software allows you to control the device, setup the communication parameters, quick keys. The first version will be equipped with the basic control program and a USB support, but now we are working on additional options like WiFi, allowing the device to operate with multiple computers at the same time and more interesting to control the system and additional features listed below.

Some users already test working EYE-SAVE and according to reviews all are satisfied with result.

The software will continue to improve for expand additional features, the graphical display of the profile and the additional subtle settings etc. The plan is to develop a software module, to introduce functions of timers, reminders of a possible fatigue, which inform that it is time to escape for awhile, to make a longer break or will tell you that you have exceeded the limit of daily work at the computer, information about excess or insufficient lighting.

The system will deprived of false operations, works adequately changeable illumination, it will possible to set delay and limits functions! 

Development of WiFi support would allow convenient to use EYE-SAVE for home, office or a whole class with multiple computers, and each will have its own lighting profile.

This is only the beginning as the project is to gaining strength!

We were looking for a solution to make a modern design. We also tried to make EYE-SAVE as small and lightweight that it can clip it on any surface.

A prototype printed on a modern 3D printer is great, it looks close to ideal, but the final version will be completely transparent and look even cool!

 

 

KratX squad is engaged in development of electronic devices, computer software and services.

After the origin of idea, we estimated the elaborations though somehow connected to our idea and dare to make the ready decision which will help many people to keep eyesight.

This project brought us together and we decided to combine our efforts and try crowdfunding platform Indiegogo as a funding source.

EYE-SAVE command is, of course, more, includes managers for the supply of electronics, components and partners associated with the production of the enclosures that operate in Asia as well as other engineers and designers on packaging, advertising etc.

From our history you see that we have been working throughout the year to make the world acquainted with our system. We developed the concept, working prototypes and proved that this technology is very useful.

We know how important to fulfill our promise to all our backers and deliver on time EYE-SAVE. We have done all we can to prepare for production and we are ready as soon as we hit our target funding.

Regardless of a result we will be engaged in our project, achievement of our financial purposes will accelerate all processes on development.

We understand that there are risks with delivery of our product in time remaining within our budget frames for the development. First deliveries of the EYE-SAVE devices we are planning in May 2017.

We have established partnerships with manufacturers in Taiwan and China, with many years of experience with electronics and components and are ready to start mass production. To reduce these risks, we regularly conduct negotiations with our business partners to guarantee that we adhere to the schedule and that the production process will be corresponds to the declared quality.

To make EYE-SAVE available, we shall estimate tens of options for each component and negotiate prices per item with tens of producers. We now know the exact number of units that we will be releasing our first batch, and who will be the suppliers of each component, as the agreed delivery terms and conditions. We understand, there were cases of the product delays but we will try not to let it happen in our project.

We have a plan to process completely our own production and we counted that we need take up about $ 208K , we are ready to develop the project, but we need your help to make EYE-SAVE more accessible for people and, ultimately, more to help people preserve vision. To keep low prices, we need to be involved at every stage of production, from cables and packaging.

Donations will be used to finance:

purchase of material for molding housings // manufacture of molds/ manufacture enclosures // manufacture PCB (all-in-one) // assembly electronics and enclosures in device // inspection and quality control // the final packaging design, printing, manufacturing // shipping // logistics// branding communication and PR// risks of the product and financial // support and documentation // HR Management and project Management // purchase of additional parts// the development and updating of firmware, software . 

We also need to finance the international certification UL, FCC,CE (EMC) of the device, which is a very important step to ensure the product is safe and legally ready for distribution in US, EU and other countries. With your generous support we can make this a high quality product as possible.

We are so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read our campaign.

Help us to bring EYE-SAVE to health life!

We have produced several different versions in the evolution of the device and was not observed in the work of any critical problems associated with electronics. Of course for large parties will control the quality of each device. With regard to software and firmware, if such are detected , they will be corrected and upgraded to new versions of the software \ firmware.

Before the Indiegogo, we are prepared for production devices and has signed agreements for supply of components, housings and assembly. Developed final 3D model of the mold housings.

Production and delivery in time is another key point. We cooperate with experienced and responsible companies that care about production plan and entire supply chain.

The production plan drawn up with risks, so it has some time delay. We make the realistic purposes of financing which will allow us to make enough items for achievement of scale effect and increase in profitability, providing at the same time the posted price.

If you have any questions, we will be fully transparent and to communicate to all of our backers

 What will the EYE-SAVE cost?

During the Indiegogo campaign, early supporters will be able to purchase EYE-SAVE for as low as $56. After the campaign, the EYE-SAVE will retail from ~$79.

 My TV set has USB, can I connect EYE-SAVE directly to it?

No! A desktop operating system of Windows, Linux and (OS-X soon) is necessary to install the EYE-SAVE . 

 What is the Length of the USB cable?

We understand that computers are different and that the device was easy to connect to any of them we decided to put 2 m cable !

 What is the WiFi range of my EYE-SAVE?

EYE-SAVE will works up to 100-150 feet (30-50 meters) away to Wi-Fi router.

 What diagonals is your device for?

Our system works with any diagonals of the screens

 How many EYE-SAVE do I need for several computers in the room?

If the device is USB how computers have many devices. If a device with Wi-Fi you only need 1 device to manage a class of computers, even on different operating systems.

 How can I specify the delivery terms?

When we have the first EYE-SAVE lot to ship and we come to definite shipment conditions with logistic companies we will send a survey to all backers. With this form you'll be able to do next:

• to specify delivery address

• to remind us of any special arrangements if such have place between us

• to ask your quesions and to express any additional preferences on documentation, customs or taxes.

 Where to send?

We use all major courier/postal company will deliver worldwide.

 What is “WiFi- soft upgradable option”?

All devices will compatible with Wi-Fi support, when you purchase an upgrade , you can update software to WiFi from our cite, and use it wireless too. But you'll need a power supply with a micro USB for example from your phone, or just buy a we have EYE-SAVE type “B” package.

 Why did EYE-SAVE choose a flexible campaign funding plan?

Flexible campaigns allow for a more payment choices by backers. We wanted everyone to be able to buy EYE-SAVE. Whether you want to use PayPal or your credit card, you can get your EYE-SAVE from here.

 Is there a guarantee on the EYE-SAVE?

Yes, the EYE-SAVE comes with a one year warranty. For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign, you can contact support@indiegogo.com For all other questions regarding the EYE-SAVE, please kindly contact us at  order@kratx.com

 Where and when can I buy EYE-SAVE outside of Indiegogo?

Those who didn't get to participate in our Indiegogo campaign in time can still get all the information and news updates on when and how to get the device from our official project site http://kratx.com or contact us at order@kratx.com

 What is about compatibility with Linux & OS-X ?

As soon as we release a beta version of software for the Mac & Linux, all devices will support them and available for free updates.

To reduce these risks, we regularly conduct negotiations with our business partners to guarantee that we adhere to the schedule and that the production process will be corresponds to the declared quality.To make EYE-SAVE available, we shall estimate tens of options for each component and negotiate prices per item with tens of producers. We now know the exact number of units that we will be releasing our first batch, and who will be the suppliers of each component, as the agreed delivery terms and conditions. We understand, there were cases of the product delays but we will try not to let it happen in our project. We have a plan to process completely our own production and we counted that we need take up about $ 208K , we are ready to develop the project, but we need your help to make EYE-SAVE more accessible for people and, ultimately, more to help people preserve vision. To keep low prices, we need to be involved at every stage of production, from cables and packaging. Donations will be used to finance:purchase of material for molding housings // manufacture of molds/ manufacture enclosures // manufacture PCB (all-in-one) // assembly electronics and enclosures in device // inspection and quality control // the final packaging design, printing, manufacturing // shipping // logistics// branding communication and PR// risks of the product and financial // support and documentation // HR Management and project Management // purchase of additional parts// the development and updating of firmware, software . We also need to finance the international certification UL, FCC,CE (EMC) of the device, which is a very important step to ensure the product is safe and legally ready for distribution in US, EU and other countries. With your generous support we can make this a high quality product as possible. We are so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read our campaign. Help us to bring EYE-SAVE to health life! We have produced several different versions in the evolution of the device and was not observed in the work of any critical problems associated with electronics. Of course for large parties will control the quality of each device. With regard to software and firmware, if such are detected , they will be corrected and upgraded to new versions of the software \ firmware. Before the Indiegogo, we are prepared for production devices and has signed agreements for supply of components, housings and assembly. Developed final 3D model of the mold housings.Production and delivery in time is another key point. We cooperate with experienced and responsible companies that care about production plan and entire supply chain.The production plan drawn up with risks, so it has some time delay. We make the realistic purposes of financing which will allow us to make enough items for achievement of scale effect and increase in profitability, providing at the same time the posted price.If you have any questions, we will be fully transparent and to communicate to all of our backers What will the EYE-SAVE cost?During the Indiegogo campaign, early supporters will be able to purchase EYE-SAVE for as low as $56. After the campaign, the EYE-SAVE will retail from ~$79.  My TV set has USB, can I connect EYE-SAVE directly to it? No! A desktop operating system of Windows, Linux and (OS-X soon) is necessary to install the EYE-SAVE .  What is the Length of the USB cable?We understand that computers are different and that the device was easy to connect to any of them we decided to put 2 m cable ! What is the WiFi range of my EYE-SAVE?EYE-SAVE will works up to 100-150 feet (30-50 meters) away to Wi-Fi router.  What diagonals is your device for? Our system works with any diagonals of the screens  How many EYE-SAVE do I need for several computers in the room? If the device is USB how computers have many devices. If a device with Wi-Fi you only need 1 device to manage a class of computers, even on different operating systems.  How can I specify the delivery terms? When we have the first EYE-SAVE lot to ship and we come to definite shipment conditions with logistic companies we will send a survey to all backers. With this form you'll be able to do next: 
• to specify delivery address
• to remind us of any special arrangements if such have place between us
• to ask your quesions and to express any additional preferences on documentation, customs or taxes.  Where to send? We use all major courier/postal company will deliver worldwide.  What is “WiFi- soft upgradable option”? All devices will compatible with Wi-Fi support, when you purchase an upgrade , you can update software to WiFi from our cite, and use it wireless too. But you'll need a power supply with a micro USB for example from your phone, or just buy a we have EYE-SAVE type “B” package.  Why did EYE-SAVE choose a flexible campaign funding plan? Flexible campaigns allow for a more payment choices by backers. We wanted everyone to be able to buy EYE-SAVE. Whether you want to use PayPal or your credit card, you can get your EYE-SAVE from here.  Is there a guarantee on the EYE-SAVE? Yes, the EYE-SAVE comes with a one year warranty. For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign, you can contact support@indiegogo.com For all other questions regarding the EYE-SAVE, please kindly contact us at  order@kratx.com Where and when can I buy EYE-SAVE outside of Indiegogo? Those who didn't get to participate in our Indiegogo campaign in time can still get all the information and news updates on when and how to get the device from our official project site http://kratx.com or contact us at order@kratx.com What is about compatibility with Linux & OS-X ?As soon as we release a beta version of software for the Mac & Linux, all devices will support them and available for free updates.

story:
MODERN HELMETS DO NOT SAVE BRAINS

 

Three years ago, sitting in a neurobiology lab in Kansas City, our founder was puzzling over a problem he couldn't solve:  Why, he wondered, were the major sports industries not doing more to prevent and protect their athletes from traumatic brain injuries(TBI)? 

Pick up any standard football helmet today and you’ll find some key similarities: lots of padding, heavy construction, with the goal to keep your brain safe.  The way we see it, the problem is that each player that arrives on the field is different than the one next to them.  They have different histories, experience levels and most importantly, body sizes and age.
 

Right now the CDC estimates that 1% of the US population suffers from concussions or some form of traumatic head injury (TBI) every year.  That's almost 4 MILLION people!

 

 

 

We strongly believe that we need to do away with the one-size-fits-all thinking about concussion prevention.

Think about it this way: A child is going to experience impact differently than an NFL linebacker. By learning who is wearing the helmet, the sensor we're developing can predict when an impact force is going to potentially hurt the wearer and send a warning signal via Bluetooth to a smart phone or other enabled device.

This helps you as a parent or coach to make decisions on providing care and prevent further injuries.  

A sensor is only as smart as the data it receives.  In order to build a smart sensor, we need to  get them in the hands and on the heads of as many people as possible to help us collect this valuable data.  Artificial intelligence relies on learning from large amounts of accumulated data from various of sources. And we are asking YOU to be our source​.

Our sensor is currently meant for anyone who considers themselves active to wear it.

 

A few of our features:

  • Issues a warning signal should you encounter a potentially dangerous head impact (such as a fall or a collision). 
  • Reminds you to upload the data on a regular basis to our server so that we can analyze the data and let you know (should you opt in) if a particular impact is serious enough or not that you should take it easy or if you can get back in the game.  

And because we take into account who you are as an active person, you can rest assured that the feedback you receive will accurate, tailored and unique to you. This separates us from the other "single-threshold" sensors on the market. Where they use a one-size fits all approach, we offer a custom profile of what your body can and cannot handle. 

 

From the business side of things, we're asking for $75,000.00 to disrupt the world of youth sports and concussion prevention.

These funds will not only allow us to make our sensors smaller and more powerful but it will also allow us to begin the crucial Phase II development of our smart helmet.

The sooner we can accomplish these things, the sooner  we can begin our field testing phase and get our integrated, active helmets into the hands of youth football teams for testing.

 

The bottom line is that preventing a concussion is a far better approach than attempting to fix the brain after a concussion. Our goal is to reduce the risk of a concussion with our integrated active helmet system.

We literally can't do this without  you--to be able to reach our full potential we are going to need serious investment dollars. Investors generally like to fund things that have been proven to make a difference in the marketplace.

And so we're asking you to help us. Show the world that you're serious about concussion prevention and make our vision a reality.

 

 

We're pretty excited about our perks and we hope you will be too.  You can add a jersey or a t-shirt to any reward by donating an extra 25.00 or 99.00 dollars. Just specify in the comments what size you need and we'll hook you up!

 

 

Our exclusive SeudoSkull jerseys are made of 3.8 oz. 100% moisture-wicking polyester and feature a tear-away neck label. They also have set-in sleeves. They come in any size you could want and are super comfortable.

 

Our Tee-shirts are of the same great quality and are 100% cotton. They come in a myriad of sizes and are sure to be something you're proud to wear around town.

And of course, our sensor is the cream of the crop. It will arrive at your doorstep ready to wear. Just take it out of the box, put it on your head (under a helmet or beanie) and out the door you go. You'll need to download our app from the Play store (link coming soon!) to upload your data.

 

The Center for Disease Control estimates that 1% of the US population suffers from concussions or some form of traumatic head injury (TBI) every year.  

Out of those, as many as 1.5 million children incur sports or recreation related concussions. (This is based on the June "Pediatrics" journal article from 2016). 

Concussions can lead to chronic traumatic encephalopathy (CTE), which has no cure and can accelerate brain aging by ~300%.  Furthermore, concussions in children severely reduce brain metabolism, interfere with overall brain development and are therefore all the more devastating. 

There are countless stories from parents whose children have suffered concussions and who are now closely monitoring their success at college, in the work force and other critical turning points in their lives. 

When it comes to the relationship between concussions and CTE, the scientific community is divided. Some believe that it only takes one concussion to cause serious brain trauma and increase the risk of CTE (chronic traumatic encephalopathy ). Others believe that it may take repeated head injuries. Either way, the odds are bad.

Our brain is literally our most valuable asset. Step up and take action to protect it and make a safer, healthier future a reality.

 

 

 

 

Changing the world and the industry isn't easy. We recognize that. We also recognize that we have a LOT of work ahead of us if we're going to be successful in our mission to eradicate childhood concussions.

Here's an overview of what we've accomplished so far: 

If you're curious, we currently have this patent  as well as the following in-part patents: 

  • DEVICE AND METHOD TO REDUCE TRAUMATIC BRAIN INJURY
  • DEVICE AND METHOD TO REDUCE TRAUMATIC BRAIN INJURY: SENSOR STAGE.​

​A  more detailed version of our milestones can be found at  www.seudoskull.com. Just click on "About" and then hit "more" to read all about our history!

 

Challenges:

Ongoing Software Development: As with any technology product, we will be continuously working on refining our code, working on our data analysis and updating our app to be as user-friendly and useful as possible. We are also continuing to pursue better PCB manufacturing options to streamline the look and feel of the sensor for future iterations.

Helmet Manufacturing: While our vision is to create the first integrated helmet/sensor system, we recognize the level of work yet to be done on this front. We have to find and build a relationship with a physical goods manufacturer and ensure a long-tail supply chain for any future development. We are also still in the early stages of mechanical development. To date, We have fabricated and tested several iterations of prototypes in our own lab and the lab of our independent collaborators at several university laboratories.   While these prototypes can only be worn by our lab dummies, our preliminary results are promising and show that we can reduce a significant amount of impact energy.

Field Testing and Adoption: The first thing most companies learn is that change is hard. And we are pushing for a lot of change. Change in the way we think about concussions and more importantly, change in the way people protect their most valuable asset. We are confident based on our current conversations with local area football teams and high schools that we can proceed with our field testing once we have our initial helmet prototype done, but long-term adoption is going to take a village.

Knowing the risks is half the battle, however. And frankly, nothing that was ever worth doing was easy. Every day we reach out to other industry experts, tech gurus and people with real life experience to educate ourselves and build our team. Throughout this entire endeavor we promise to be transparent and honest about our shortcomings but also to shout from the rooftops and give praise where praise is due when things go right. We are open to suggestions, questions and criticisms. Tell us why our idea won't work and make suggestions to make it better. Together we can build a future that is safer and better for our children and for anyone athletes who love to get outside and play. 

 

Dr. ChiMing Huang: Is a Neurobiologist at the University of Missouri-Kansas City (UMKC). He has dedicated his life to the study of the brain and, more recently, the prevention of concussions. He and his wife Rosa live in Kansas City and he has been tirelessly working on building the first active, preventative concussion solution since 2013.

Aaron Crabb: A graduate of KSU in Computer Science, Aaron is SeudoSkull's Chief Technology Officer. He prides himself on fully understanding business problems in order to strategically deliver and deploy the right technology solutions.

Larissa Uredi: Having been in the marketing and business development industry for the past seven years, Larissa is excited to bring her passion for startups to SeudoSkull. She believes in a people-first approach to marketing and still gets really excited when the metrics back up her enthusiasm. 

 

Find us on Facebook!  Or Twitter!  If you're feeling fancy, join our newsletter!
