story:
It is time to fix a broken healthcare system...

We have to do it. Together.

My friends (or soon to be). My name is Hans-Erik Stegeby. 3 Years Ago I started a journey to find a way to reduce healthcare cost for families and businesses while helping providers do what they like best, which is to take care of their patients.

We know who's fault it is.

Government regulation and insurance mandates are the cause.

I don't know about you but I am tired of broken promises from lawmakers.

As I talked to many different healthcare providers, business owners, local government agencies and the pains were the same. Increased cost and regulations. I knew the pains I was feeling as a young family father, and what my family and friends were feeling in response to the “Affordable” Care Act.

My solution is simple and genius.

For success, we need to cut out traditional insurance but still be compliant. ACA holds a jewel which is Direct Primary Care. It is a new concept that allows better connection between family doctors and their patients. Dr. Josh Umbehr, an inspiration to me, and a strong proponent on how DPC will help the healthcare system. You pay a small monthly fee (usually less than an office visit cost) to your primary care physician and he/she will give you all the care you want.

Some example of DPC practices:

  • Bluegrass Family Wellness - Crestwood, KY - Donated to our cause. :)
  • Gold Direct Care PC - Marblehead, MA
  • Ashwell Medical Group - Asheville, NC
  • Direct Access MD - Anderson, SC
  • Skyline Direct Care - Tucson, AZ
  • Cottontree Family Clinic - Orem, UT

Our Purpose...

Our mission is to Make Healthcare Great Again (#MHGA) by so that people will be able to get access to affordable healthcare again.

A diverse team...

Hans-Erik Stegeby - CEO and Founder - After frustration with the healthcare system in his own life, Hans-Erik started to talk to others. Business owners, healthcare providers, and individuals. All as frustrated as Hans-Erik felt. For three years he looked and worked to create the system you now have an opportunity to help bring to your family and friends. A system empowering you in deciding your healthcare.

Sean MacCourtney - Social Media and Customer Service - A young man who grabbed the opportunity when he saw it. Being young, married, and knowing that healthcare will impact him and his young family, has found that this system can help his family, friends, and fellow students who are looking for better healthcare options.

Nick Baguley - Business Outreach - Well known in the healthcare circle and provides valuable data to his customers is an awesome resource to DHC and their members.

Eva-Marie Stegeby - Media Manager - Entrepreneur and Media guru, writer of books and social media. Has a love for providing well written information to all levels of people.

Dr. Paul J. Fields PhD - PM, Consultant, Trainer, Coach, and Advisory Board Member - Has helped many people achieve their goals. Have created multiple health benefit plans and has a passion for improving healthcare. With his many years of experience we welcome him into the group.

This team has a passion to help others and brings valuable skills and experience to the table. Their faces is a part of DHC. Will you add yours?

Healthcare Providers, Businesses, and Families makes DHC possible...

We are a community. Together we will reduce healthcare cost.

SO HERE IT COMES PEOPLE!

Building a community that will battle government regulations and traditional insurance companies won’t be done for free. And we will NOT accept money from the government to battle the government’s regulation. WE NEED YOUR HELP.

Our goal is to raise $90,000.

So this is how we beat the system together!

We need to remove traditional insurance but still have insurance. How does that work you ask? This is what has taken us three years to develop. In simple terms.

  1. We need to first have a community that has the same goal. In our case a healthier and better living without government interference to as much as we can. This is what this Crowdfunding Campaign is for.
  2. We then need to connect our members with Direct Primary Care physicians. So many doctors out there are fed up with government interference as much as you are. So they are joining us. You will create a friendship you never thought you could have with your family doctor.
  3. Members who has a DPC will be able to get access to DHC self-insurance program plans after committing to our pledge. Prices for those plans will come later, however they will be very affordable.
  4. So members has the plan. The way we will make it cheaper is we will make the claims process happen between patient and our self-insurance program. The providers will be paid up front in similar way that CareCredit works. Our members will have access to a Credit so they can pay the providers up front.
  5. Providers will set their prices, be reviewed and rated by the DHC members, and they will be paid upon services. Free Market at it's best.

GIVE ME THE PERKS!

So what does our community members get? What is it in for YOU?!

FIRST YOU GET the tickling feeling of PURE AWESOMENESS...

You are getting the AWESOME satisfaction that you are being a part of Making Healthcare Great Again! We could continue relying on the failing lawmakers policies that continue ruining our healthcare or YOU can help by joining DHC.

Second you get some other awesome benefits of being First!

There are 4 Precious Levels. Every dollar donated in these levels, will turn into credit towards your Direct Healthcare Community membership. So if you donate $5, you will be able to use it towards your membership when we go live!

Level 1 - Precious Supporter

Thank you for supporting us! We know that money can be tight and every donation counts. We appreciate your donation and as a thank you we will send you a booklet on 7 ways to save on health care cost. This book is updated as new development happens within the realm of politics. Also as an extra thanks you will receive 5% Discount towards your DHC membership.

Level 2 - Precious Families - Donate $25, $50, or $100

  • Early access to web portal
  • 20% Discount to DHC Membership
  • Special Event discounts

Level 3 - Precious Business - Donate $250, $500, or $1000

  • Early access to web portal
  • 25% Discount to DHC Membership
  • Special Event Discounts
  • Help connecting with Providers
  • Name of Business on Founders Plaque

Level 4 - Community Founders - Donate $5,000, $10,000, or $25,000

  • Early access to web portal
  • 30% Discount to DHC Membership
  • Special Event Discounts
  • Help connecting with Providers
  • Special help building a Healthcare Community in your local area
  • Name of Community or Individual on Founders Plaque

Unless we work together lawmakers will continue to mess up your healthcare (there are a few out there fighting for your freedoms)

Only together can we beat the system. As healthcare providers, businesses, and families. We are creating a free market approach within our community, with a feeling of taking care of each other, something severely lacking in our society today. We need to work on compassion and love for one another.

This will help your local communities...

The current healthcare system, promoted by insurance companies, encourage us to be sick. The high deductibles, high premiums, doesn't want us to see the doctors. It also causes stress and depression. However DPC, in conjunction with our model, will cut cost, reduce dependence on deductibles, and decrease illness in community. It will also save school districts, county and city governments money as they adopt our approach.

Small & medium sized businesses JOIN US!

You need to join us! By joining our Self-Insurance group, you will be able to drop your health benefits from the national average of $1500/mo/family, to about $700/mo/family. Plus you will get access to the awesome benefits from Self-insurance. You will be able to reinvest your hard earned money in your business and community. (we would love to tell you in more detail)

TAKE ACTION TODAY!

We are tired of government interference in our lives. We are going to #ungovernment healthcare and we want you to join us. You have an opportunity to be a part of a cause that will help you, your family, neighbours, communities, businesses, and healthcare providers. Only together will this change happen.

So the Premium will go up if we don't band together...

How much are you willing to pay for your healthcare? If you receive your benefits through your employer, how far do you think they are willing to go before they lay off people because they can't handle the cost any more?

DHC is YOUR COMMUNITY!

We created DHC to be YOUR COMMUNITY. For less than a meal per month, you and your family can be eligible to reduce your monthly healthcare cost to less than what you currently are paying for your healthcare.

Your ToDo List

So here is what you need to do to help Make Healthcare Great Again.

  1. Donate what you are able to. Do this even if you do have insurance. We are not an insurance company but we by playing the rules, we will be able to help our members. Everything helps and your are investing in your future including your family, friends, and neighbours.
  2. Go to our Facebook page and like it. Then share our Crowdfunding campaign on your personal Facebook page. If you have other Facebook pages, post about us there as well.
  3. If you are part of any Facebook groups, share the campaign there as well.
  4. Follow us on Twitter. Share our crowdfunding page there.
  5. Go to our website www.directhcc.com and signup for our newsletter.
  6. Go to our YOUTUBE channel and subscribe to it. We will share promotional and training videos to our members and others on how to Make Healthcare Great Again in your local communities.
  7. THE MOST IMPORTANT. Talk to your family, friends, and neighbors. We have all been hit by the bad healthcare policies and we want to help build better healthcare communities local in your area.
  8. If you work for a small to medium sized business, talk to the owner and tell them about how you can help them save money on health benefits but get better care.
  9. Also make no mistake. Your healthcare provider has been impacted by ObamaCare. If you want to help them, tell them about us. We can help them go back to what they love best, to help YOU and their other patients.

Divided we have been conquered. Now is the time to reunite and take back our healthcare. Together we are strong. Let’s #UnGovernment the Healthcare. Lets Make Healthcare Great Again #MHGA.

 

*******FAQ*******

...our members concern if we don’t reach our goal...

Don’t be afraid. If we against all odds do not reach our complete goal, whatever we do raise will still go towards the Web portal and the legal but it may take a little longer time to get everything off the ground.

...if we raise more than the goal...
Extra funds raised over the goal will go towards the creation of our own self funded community insurance program. Why line the pocket of the insurance companies, when we can take care of ourselves together?

...some statistics on where we are in healthcare…
USA spends roughly $3 trillion a year on healthcare, or 18% of the GDP, and still we only rank 41st for life expectancy, 55th in infant mortality, and 49th in maternal mortality.

...Direct Primary Care (DPC) is…
...key to our working healthcare system. A DPC doctor provides all primary care to their patients for a monthly fee. This include stitches and other semi urgent care. They are usually on call 24/7 and when getting calls, goes to their office to help out. It is what a doctor patient relationship were meant to be. Different DPC charges differently but a good average is about $10-$25 per child per month when connected to their parents account. And an adult cost is usually between $50-$100 dependent on age. Some DPC also charges a family fee. Our goal is to connect our members with Providers that are already using the DPC model, or we will talk to doctors who are looking to change the way they practice.

Dr. Josh Umbehr, a pioneer in the DPC field, talking with Sean Hannity.

...DHC is located in…
...the state of Utah.

...limited to one state…
...DHC is not, as it is a membership organization. We are only limited by where our members live. And the more members in a local area, the better we can promote our healthcare model that will help your local community.

...we can pay at time of service…
… when DHC members are a part of our self-insurance program. Insurance claims process cost providers an estimated $58 per claim on the low end. Then the provider has to wait between 60-180 days for the insurance company to pay the remainder. No one wants to work under those types of circumstances and yet our Healthcare providers are forced to by the insurance companies. DHC Providers, when joining, sets their prices on the website. Our members will know what they will be paying for services and products and will pay on the portal in advanced or at the time of service. DHC Members who opts to participate in our self-insured program, will gain access to a DHC Credit line, that can be used for healthcare, much like CareCredit. Then the member pays back the credit to the DHC Self-insurance program. The provider will not be a part of the resolving of the claim.

...Providers who are not DHC…
...will still be able to have DHC members use them as many providers are more than willing to take upfront payments. However deductibles (if a part of our wrap around/emergency insurance program) will be higher. We do want to talk to the provider and discuss the benefits of joining DHC as a Provider. We will however shop around for the providers in this case that provides the better price.

...anyone can become a provider…
…if they provide services or products that promotes healthcare and healthy living. DHC uses the term Provider for anyone who provides a service and/or product to the members. The service or product needs to promote a healthier living, such as to reduce stress, increase vitamins intake, promote exercise, general healthcare, specialists, massage therapy, etc. We promote free market and healthier living. Also members will have the capability to rate the providers and their products/services.

...you were talking about insurance…
...but DHC is NOT an insurance company (too many regulations). Instead we will create a captive insurance group, where we will provide other businesses the capability to self-insure. DHC will also self-insure and offer our wrap around/emergency plan to our members who follow the set of rules, purpose, cause, and goal, that we need to have in order to offer this type of benefit to members. This is in accordance to the Affordable Care Act, 1301 (a)(3), which says, when a person uses a Direct Primary Care physician, and combine it with an emergency insurance, that will cover all the 10 essentials, they are compliant to the Affordable Care Act. So when we are at this stage of the plan, there will be criteria that needs to be met. More to come on this subject.

...businesses should join…
… as there is a big problem with our current system which is that small and medium sized businesses are competing for good workforce with big companies but can’t get the same type of deals. Now in DHC small to medium sized businesses will be able to provide better healthcare benefits for less than half the cost of the national average. And the best part, they will be self insured, but within a group. So they will get the benefits of self-insurance but the protection of a bigger group. And when using DPC, with our wrap around plan, they will be in compliance with the Affordable Care Act.

...when the Affordable Care Act disappears…
...it will be a glorious day. However we developed the model to work well under the ACA.

...I can contribute...
...on all precious levels even if you aren't a businesses owner. Anything you contribute will go towards your membership once we are up and running. You can also use your credit to donate to someone else's membership and more.

...I already have insurance...
...as DHC is not an insurance company, you are still very welcome to help and join DHC. We build an awareness that there are better way to do healthcare out there. We want anyone and everyone who wants to help Make Healthcare Great Again to join DHC.
story_txt:
It is time to fix a broken healthcare system...We have to do it. Together.My friends (or soon to be). My name is Hans-Erik Stegeby. 3 Years Ago I started a journey to find a way to reduce healthcare cost for families and businesses while helping providers do what they like best, which is to take care of their patients.We know who's fault it is.Government regulation and insurance mandates are the cause.I don't know about you but I am tired of broken promises from lawmakers.As I talked to many different healthcare providers, business owners, local government agencies and the pains were the same. Increased cost and regulations. I knew the pains I was feeling as a young family father, and what my family and friends were feeling in response to the “Affordable” Care Act.My solution is simple and genius.For success, we need to cut out traditional insurance but still be compliant. ACA holds a jewel which is Direct Primary Care. It is a new concept that allows better connection between family doctors and their patients. Dr. Josh Umbehr, an inspiration to me, and a strong proponent on how DPC will help the healthcare system. You pay a small monthly fee (usually less than an office visit cost) to your primary care physician and he/she will give you all the care you want.Some example of DPC practices:

Bluegrass Family Wellness - Crestwood, KY - Donated to our cause. :)

Gold Direct Care PC - Marblehead, MA

Ashwell Medical Group - Asheville, NC

Direct Access MD - Anderson, SC

Skyline Direct Care - Tucson, AZ

Cottontree Family Clinic - Orem, UT
Our Purpose...Our mission is to Make Healthcare Great Again (#MHGA) by so that people will be able to get access to affordable healthcare again.A diverse team...Hans-Erik Stegeby - CEO and Founder - After frustration with the healthcare system in his own life, Hans-Erik started to talk to others. Business owners, healthcare providers, and individuals. All as frustrated as Hans-Erik felt. For three years he looked and worked to create the system you now have an opportunity to help bring to your family and friends. A system empowering you in deciding your healthcare.Sean MacCourtney - Social Media and Customer Service - A young man who grabbed the opportunity when he saw it. Being young, married, and knowing that healthcare will impact him and his young family, has found that this system can help his family, friends, and fellow students who are looking for better healthcare options.Nick Baguley - Business Outreach - Well known in the healthcare circle and provides valuable data to his customers is an awesome resource to DHC and their members.Eva-Marie Stegeby - Media Manager - Entrepreneur and Media guru, writer of books and social media. Has a love for providing well written information to all levels of people.Dr. Paul J. Fields PhD - PM, Consultant, Trainer, Coach, and Advisory Board Member - Has helped many people achieve their goals. Have created multiple health benefit plans and has a passion for improving healthcare. With his many years of experience we welcome him into the group.This team has a passion to help others and brings valuable skills and experience to the table. Their faces is a part of DHC. Will you add yours?Healthcare Providers, Businesses, and Families makes DHC possible...We are a community. Together we will reduce healthcare cost.SO HERE IT COMES PEOPLE!Building a community that will battle government regulations and traditional insurance companies won’t be done for free. And we will NOT accept money from the government to battle the government’s regulation. WE NEED YOUR HELP.
Our goal is to raise $90,000.So this is how we beat the system together!We need to remove traditional insurance but still have insurance. How does that work you ask? This is what has taken us three years to develop. In simple terms.
We need to first have a community that has the same goal. In our case a healthier and better living without government interference to as much as we can. This is what this Crowdfunding Campaign is for.
We then need to connect our members with Direct Primary Care physicians. So many doctors out there are fed up with government interference as much as you are. So they are joining us. You will create a friendship you never thought you could have with your family doctor.
Members who has a DPC will be able to get access to DHC self-insurance program plans after committing to our pledge. Prices for those plans will come later, however they will be very affordable.
So members has the plan. The way we will make it cheaper is we will make the claims process happen between patient and our self-insurance program. The providers will be paid up front in similar way that CareCredit works. Our members will have access to a Credit so they can pay the providers up front.
Providers will set their prices, be reviewed and rated by the DHC members, and they will be paid upon services. Free Market at it's best.
GIVE ME THE PERKS!So what does our community members get? What is it in for YOU?!FIRST YOU GET the tickling feeling of PURE AWESOMENESS...You are getting the AWESOME satisfaction that you are being a part of Making Healthcare Great Again! We could continue relying on the failing lawmakers policies that continue ruining our healthcare or YOU can help by joining DHC.Second you get some other awesome benefits of being First!There are 4 Precious Levels. Every dollar donated in these levels, will turn into credit towards your Direct Healthcare Community membership. So if you donate $5, you will be able to use it towards your membership when we go live!Level 1 - Precious SupporterThank you for supporting us! We know that money can be tight and every donation counts. We appreciate your donation and as a thank you we will send you a booklet on 7 ways to save on health care cost. This book is updated as new development happens within the realm of politics. Also as an extra thanks you will receive 5% Discount towards your DHC membership.Level 2 - Precious Families - Donate $25, $50, or $100
Early access to web portal
20% Discount to DHC Membership
Special Event discounts
Level 3 - Precious Business - Donate $250, $500, or $1000
Early access to web portal
25% Discount to DHC Membership
Special Event Discounts
Help connecting with Providers
Name of Business on Founders Plaque
Level 4 - Community Founders - Donate $5,000, $10,000, or $25,000
Early access to web portal
30% Discount to DHC Membership
Special Event Discounts
Help connecting with Providers
Special help building a Healthcare Community in your local area
Name of Community or Individual on Founders Plaque
Unless we work together lawmakers will continue to mess up your healthcare (there are a few out there fighting for your freedoms)Only together can we beat the system. As healthcare providers, businesses, and families. We are creating a free market approach within our community, with a feeling of taking care of each other, something severely lacking in our society today. We need to work on compassion and love for one another.This will help your local communities...The current healthcare system, promoted by insurance companies, encourage us to be sick. The high deductibles, high premiums, doesn't want us to see the doctors. It also causes stress and depression. However DPC, in conjunction with our model, will cut cost, reduce dependence on deductibles, and decrease illness in community. It will also save school districts, county and city governments money as they adopt our approach.Small & medium sized businesses JOIN US!You need to join us! By joining our Self-Insurance group, you will be able to drop your health benefits from the national average of $1500/mo/family, to about $700/mo/family. Plus you will get access to the awesome benefits from Self-insurance. You will be able to reinvest your hard earned money in your business and community. (we would love to tell you in more detail)TAKE ACTION TODAY!We are tired of government interference in our lives. We are going to #ungovernment healthcare and we want you to join us. You have an opportunity to be a part of a cause that will help you, your family, neighbours, communities, businesses, and healthcare providers. Only together will this change happen.So the Premium will go up if we don't band together...How much are you willing to pay for your healthcare? If you receive your benefits through your employer, how far do you think they are willing to go before they lay off people because they can't handle the cost any more?DHC is YOUR COMMUNITY!We created DHC to be YOUR COMMUNITY. For less than a meal per month, you and your family can be eligible to reduce your monthly healthcare cost to less than what you currently are paying for your healthcare.Your ToDo ListSo here is what you need to do to help Make Healthcare Great Again.

Donate what you are able to. Do this even if you do have insurance. We are not an insurance company but we by playing the rules, we will be able to help our members. Everything helps and your are investing in your future including your family, friends, and neighbours.
Go to our Facebook page and like it. Then share our Crowdfunding campaign on your personal Facebook page. If you have other Facebook pages, post about us there as well.
If you are part of any Facebook groups, share the campaign there as well.
Follow us on Twitter. Share our crowdfunding page there.
Go to our website www.directhcc.com and signup for our newsletter.
Go to our YOUTUBE channel and subscribe to it. We will share promotional and training videos to our members and others on how to Make Healthcare Great Again in your local communities.

THE MOST IMPORTANT. Talk to your family, friends, and neighbors. We have all been hit by the bad healthcare policies and we want to help build better healthcare communities local in your area.
If you work for a small to medium sized business, talk to the owner and tell them about how you can help them save money on health benefits but get better care.
Also make no mistake. Your healthcare provider has been impacted by ObamaCare. If you want to help them, tell them about us. We can help them go back to what they love best, to help YOU and their other patients.
Divided we have been conquered. Now is the time to reunite and take back our healthcare. Together we are strong. Let’s #UnGovernment the Healthcare. Lets Make Healthcare Great Again #MHGA. *******FAQ*******
...our members concern if we don’t reach our goal...Don’t be afraid. If we against all odds do not reach our complete goal, whatever we do raise will still go towards the Web portal and the legal but it may take a little longer time to get everything off the ground....if we raise more than the goal...Extra funds raised over the goal will go towards the creation of our own self funded community insurance program. story:
Introducing TUKI

Hi, we are Angela and Harald-Sven, a French-Colombian couple living in the Grand-Duchy of Luxembourg - a small country located in Europe between Belgium, France and Germany. After a career in banking and finance, we wanted to do something useful with our lives. Because we were tired to hear bad things about Colombia, we were looking for an original business idea to change the bad image of Colombia, support the economy of our country and take social action for children. Finally, we decided to promote Colombia through its tasteful juices so appreciated by the Colombians themselves and the tourists which visit our country. We created TUKI, the toucan, with the traditional Colombian sombrero volteado, whose mission is to represent Colombia with his range of juice flavors.

___________________________________________________________

5 unique and unknown flavors

The concept of the TUKI fruit juices is to offer the original quality of a fresh homemade juice, such as in Colombia, but in a bottle and with a longer life cycle. We can achieve this thanks to the quality of the the fruits directly imported from small Colombian producers, our tasty recipes and the cold pasteurisation technique or High Pressure Processing (HPP).  In contrast to traditional fruit juices, even premium juices, TUKI juices are not subject to a heat treatment and keep the vitamins, the taste and the flavor of freshly squeezed juices for more than 60 days!   

Moreover, ​we are the first and only ones who propose an exclusive and healthy range of these 5 unknown flavors in the Western countries. Each bottle contains the juice of only one fruit : the Lulo, the Mango, the Maracuya, the Mora or the Guanabana. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Lulo

                      

Characterized by its bittersweet and vivid flavor similar to a citrus fruit, the Lulo is rich in vitamins A, B, C, iron and phosphorus. Drinking Lulo is excellent to remove toxins from the body, lower high cholesterol , protect arteries,  stimulate immune defenses,  keep skin healthy and combat diseases such as influenza. The Lulo helps to purify the blood and improve sleep. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Mango

                      

With a taste exceptionally mild, very aromatic and reminiscent of the tropics, the Mango is a super fruit, rich in vitamins A and C. It helps to strengthen the heart and human tissues, remove toxins,  prevent premature aging and avoid constipation. Thanks to its high potassium content, the Mango can aid in muscle recovery after physical activity by replacing liquids and minerals lost during exercises. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Maracuya

                       

The Maracuya contains a lot a fibre the body needs to clean the colon, improve digestion and to prevent heart and brain attacks. The Maracuya helps to decrease allergy and asthma triggers. The antioxydants present in the fruit protect healthy cells from aging and from transforming into cancer cells by eliminating free radicals. The Maracuya has a bittersweet flavor, very crisp and refreshing. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Mora 

                     

Lively and refreshing, the Mora (or the Andean blackberry) helps to combat fatigue, constipation, bleeding, diarrhea, stomach and intestinal inflammation. The person with diabetes will appreciate the Mora because its diuretic action can bring down the sugar level in the blood. Malic and citric acids give to the fruit a disinfecting and antimicrobial power. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Guanabana

                         

Tasting both sweet and tart, the Guanabana (soursop) is recommended for insomnia, breakdown and nervous disorders. The cancer-fighting properties of the Guanabana are scientifically proven, without any side effect. Rich in fibre and minerals (calcium, potassium and calcium), the Guanabana  protects the immune system and prevent serious infections. 

___________________________________________________________

What we need

From now on, after a very enthusiastic response from the final consumers and professionals, we want to go a step further. Our goal is to raise minimum of  USD 55.000  to continue marketing our juice fruits, become THE premium exotic juice brand, give more support to small Colombian producers and offer a more positive image of Colombia, where most part of our family comes from.

With 55,000 USD, we can reduce costs by shortening the circuit distribution and buying directly big quantities of raw materials in Colombia (USD 35,200), develop new flavors and bottle sizes (USD 5,500) , obtain the organic certification and strengthen our credibility (USD 14,300). Being organic certified is very expensive, especially for a small company like ours. We have the products and the process to be organic certified, but not the money. 

With USD 82,500, we can also produce marketing and communication material to promote our social and healthy products and their benefits  (USD 5,500), participate in international fairs (USD 11,000 ) and create pop-up stores (USD 11,000).

With USD 110,000, we can grow our presence on the web and in the social media (USD 11,000) and develop an international digital communication strategy (USD 16,500).

With USD 165,000, we can  hire employees and trainees (USD 49,500), find new distributors (USD 5,500) and start a success story.

Moreover, a part of the funds raised during the campaign (10%) will go to the  Pies Descalzos Foundation.  This non-profit organization, founded by the Colombian artist Shakira, aims to aid low-income children from Colombia through education and give them a future.

___________________________________________________________

Our perks

Thats's why we need you! We offer to all our backers exclusive gifts - some of them are directly coming from Colombia - for their financial supports. 

At the end of the campaign, you will have the opportunity to choose the design of your coasters set from more than 10 nice designs. Here already some examples: https://www.flickr.com/gp/145880211@N05/81h952

​At the end of the campaign, you can select the design of your mochilla among more than 20 designs. Here already some examples:

- Unisex: https://www.flickr.com/gp/145880211@N05/0u8e09

- For women: https://www.flickr.com/gp/145880211@N05/czT517
 

Perk summary table

___________________________________________________________

Spread the word !

You can't support us financially ? Never mind! You can still help us by spreading the word and using the social share links at the top of the page. Tweet, like and talk about TUKI and our project to all your friends, relatives and colleagues.   You will contribute to expand our fan base and make our crowdfunding campaign a success.

___________________________________________________________ 

They trusted TUKI 

___________________________________________________________ 

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: How long are the juices good for?

60 days from production date, thanks to HPP process which permits to obtain the quality of a fresh homemade squeezed juice in a bottle.

Q: Do I have to keep the juices cold?

Yes, the juices need to stay refrigerated. You can keep them outside the fridge only for a few days.

​Q : How are the TUKI fruit juices different from others?

​1. The juices are completely natural.
2. The TUKI fruit juices are free of preservatives, additives and dyes.
3. The vitamins are preserved. 
4. TUKI is the only brand to OFFER bottled juices from these Colombian fruits as homemade. THIS PROPOSAL is UNIQUE !
5. Other juices with other Colombian fruits will follow soon !
6. ONLY 1 FRUIT per bottle to enjoy the natural taste of each fruit

​Q : Is there some sugar added?

Only natural sugar from plants in some juices in order to reduce the acidity and to respect juice recipes as they are homemade prepared in Colombia.

Q : Is the taste of the TUKI fruit juices really different?

Definitely yes!  The taste of our fruit juices is strong. You'll never forget our fruit juices after having tried them. 

​Q : What is High Pressure Processing (HPP)?

High Pressure Processing is a processing method wherein the bottles are subjected to very high pressures (up to 120,000 pounds per square inch - 5.000-6000 bars) to kill the bacteria without heating the juices. This cold pasteurization technique respects to a maximum the organoleptic characteristics of the fruits such as the vitamins, the nutrients, the authentic taste and the freshness.  

Q : Where are the fruits cultivated?

The fruits are cultivated by small farmers in several areas of Colombia. Soon we will show you their way of working.

Q : Where are the juices produced?

The juices are produced with fruits from Colombia in Europe, at our bottling partner, which applies the cold pasteurization technique (HPP - High Pressure Process). This process is not widespread in all countries.

Q : Are TUKI fruits organic?

Our fruits are not yet labeled as certified organic because organic certification is very expensive, but they can be considered as such. Our fruit producers have no or little use of pesticides. 

Q : What about fair trade?

TUKI fruits are not fair trade certified because more of our fruits are not in the list for which the private organizations allowed to give the certification have put in place a procedure. There is a certification procedure for Colombian coffee, but not for our fruits. However, we know personally the supplier between the Colombian farmers and us and we can clearly state that they are well paid and work in decent conditions.  

Q : Why not use glass bottle?

High Pressure Processing can't be used in glass bottles because these can't resist to the pressure. Moreover, production, transport and recycling of glass bottles have an impact on the environment.

​Q : Can I recycle TUKI bottles?

Of course. Our plastic bottles are recyclable.

Q : Do you take any social action?

TUKI supports the Pies Descalzos foundation, created by the Colombian singer Shakira. This non-profit organization aims to aid low-income children from Colombia through education and give them a future. Around 10% of the raised funds will go to the foundation and we hope doing more in the future. Moreover, instead of destroying our unsold fruit juices, we give them  to the Red Cross and people in need.  

___________________________________________________________

___________________________________________________________
5 unique and unknown flavors

The concept of the TUKI fruit juices is to offer the original quality of a fresh homemade juice, such as in Colombia, but in a bottle and with a longer life cycle. We can achieve this thanks to the quality of the the fruits directly imported from small Colombian producers, our tasty recipes and the cold pasteurisation technique or High Pressure Processing (HPP).  In contrast to traditional fruit juices, even premium juices, TUKI juices are not subject to a heat treatment and keep the vitamins, the taste and the flavor of freshly squeezed juices for more than 60 days!   
Moreover, ​we are the first and only ones who propose an exclusive and healthy range of these 5 unknown flavors in the Western countries. Each bottle contains the juice of only one fruit : the Lulo, the Mango, the Maracuya, the Mora or the Guanabana. 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The Lulo
                      
Characterized by its bittersweet and vivid flavor similar to a citrus fruit, the Lulo is rich in vitamins A, B, C, iron and phosphorus. Drinking Lulo is excellent to remove toxins from the body, lower high cholesterol , protect arteries,  stimulate immune defenses,  keep skin healthy and combat diseases such as influenza. The Lulo helps to purify the blood and improve sleep. 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The Mango
                      
With a taste exceptionally mild, very aromatic and reminiscent of the tropics, the Mango is a super fruit, rich in vitamins A and C. It helps to strengthen the heart and human tissues, remove toxins,  prevent premature aging and avoid constipation. Thanks to its high potassium content, the Mango can aid in muscle recovery after physical activity by replacing liquids and minerals lost during exercises. 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The Maracuya
                       
The Maracuya contains a lot a fibre the body needs to clean the colon, improve digestion and to prevent heart and brain attacks. The Maracuya helps to decrease allergy and asthma triggers. The antioxydants present in the fruit protect healthy cells from aging and from transforming into cancer cells by eliminating free radicals. The Maracuya has a bittersweet flavor, very crisp and refreshing. 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The Mora 
                     
Lively and refreshing, the Mora (or the Andean blackberry) helps to combat fatigue, constipation, bleeding, diarrhea, stomach and intestinal inflammation. The person with diabetes will appreciate the Mora because its diuretic action can bring down the sugar level in the blood. Malic and citric acids give to the fruit a disinfecting and antimicrobial power. 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The Guanabana
                         
Tasting both sweet and tart, the Guanabana (soursop) is recommended for insomnia, breakdown and nervous disorders. The cancer-fighting properties of the Guanabana are scientifically proven, without any side effect. Rich in fibre and minerals (calcium, potassium and calcium), the Guanabana  protects the immune system and prevent serious infections. 
___________________________________________________________

What we need

From now on, after a very enthusiastic response from the final consumers and professionals, we want to go a step further. Our goal is to raise minimum of  USD 55.000  to continue marketing our juice fruits, become THE premium exotic juice brand, give more support to small Colombian producers and offer a more positive image of Colombia, where most part of our family comes from.
With 55,000 USD, we can reduce costs by shortening the circuit distribution and buying directly big quantities of raw materials in Colombia (USD 35,200), develop new flavors and bottle sizes (USD 5,500) , obtain the organic certification and strengthen our credibility (USD 14,300). Being organic certified is very expensive, especially for a small company like ours. We have the products and the process to be organic certified, but not the money. 
With USD 82,500, we can also produce marketing and communication material to promote our social and healthy products and their benefits  (USD 5,500), participate in international fairs (USD 11,000 ) and create pop-up stores (USD 11,000).
With USD 110,000, we can grow our presence on the web and in the social media (USD 11,000) and develop an international digital communication strategy (USD 16,500).
With USD 165,000, we can  hire employees and trainees (USD 49,500), find new distributors (USD 5,500) and start a success story.
Moreover, a part of the funds raised during the campaign (10%) will go to the  Pies Descalzos Foundation.  This non-profit organization, founded by the Colombian artist Shakira, aims to aid low-income children from Colombia through education and give them a future.
___________________________________________________________
Our perks
Thats's why we need you! We offer to all our backers exclusive gifts - some of them are directly coming from Colombia - for their financial supports. 

At the end of the campaign, you will have the opportunity to choose the design of your coasters set from more than 10 nice designs. Here already some examples: https://www.flickr.com/gp/145880211@N05/81h952

​At the end of the campaign, you can select the design of your mochilla among more than 20 designs. Here already some examples: 
- Unisex: https://www.flickr.com/gp/145880211@N05/0u8e09
- For women: https://www.flickr.com/gp/145880211@N05/czT517 
Perk summary table
___________________________________________________________

Spread the word !

You can't support us financially ? Never mind! You can still help us by spreading the word and using the social share links at the top of the page. Tweet, like and talk about TUKI and our project to all your friends, relatives and colleagues.   You will contribute to expand our fan base and make our crowdfunding campaign a success.
___________________________________________________________ 
They trusted TUKI 
___________________________________________________________ 
Frequently Asked Questions

Q: How long are the juices good for?
60 days from production date, thanks to HPP process which permits to obtain the quality of a fresh homemade squeezed juice in a bottle.
Q: Do I have to keep the juices cold?
Yes, the juices need to stay refrigerated. You can keep them outside the fridge only for a few days.
​Q : How are the TUKI fruit juices different from others?
​1. The juices are completely natural.2. The TUKI fruit juices are free of preservatives, additives and dyes.3. The vitamins are preserved. 4. TUKI is the only brand to OFFER bottled juices from these Colombian fruits as homemade. THIS PROPOSAL is UNIQUE !5. Other juices with other Colombian fruits will follow soon !6. ONLY 1 FRUIT per bottle to enjoy the natural taste of each fruit
​Q : Is there some sugar added?
Only natural sugar from plants in some juices in order to reduce the acidity and to respect juice recipes as they are homemade prepared in Colombia.
Q : Is the taste of the TUKI fruit juices really different?
Definitely yes!  The taste of our fruit juices is strong. You'll never forget our fruit juices after having tried them. 
​Q : What is High Pressure Processing (HPP)?
High Pressure Processing is a processing method wherein the bottles are subjected to very high pressures (up to 120,000 pounds per square inch - 5.000-6000 bars) to kill the bacteria without heating the juices. This cold pasteurization technique respects to a maximum the organoleptic characteristics of the fruits such as the vitamins, the nutrients, the authentic taste and the freshness.  

Q : Where are the fruits cultivated?
The fruits are cultivated by small farmers in several areas of Colombia. Soon we will show you their way of working.
Q : Where are the juices produced?
The juices are produced with fruits from Colombia in Europe, at our bottling partner, which applies the cold pasteurization technique (HPP - High Pressure Process). This process is not widespread in all countries.
Q : Are TUKI fruits organic?
Our fruits are not yet labeled as certified organic because organic certification is very expensive, but they can be considered as such. Our fruit producers have no or little use of pesticides. 
Q : What about fair trade?
TUKI fruits are not fair trade certified because more of our fruits are not in the list for which the private organizations allowed to give the certification have put in place a procedure. There is a certification procedure for Colombian coffee, but not for our fruits. However, we know personally the supplier between the Colombian farmers and us and we can clearly state that they are well paid and work in decent conditions.  
Q : Why not use glass bottle?
High Pressure Processing can't be used in glass bottles because these can't resist to the pressure. Moreover, production, transport and recycling of glass bottles have an impact on the environment.
​Q : Can I recycle TUKI bottles?
Of course. Our plastic bottles are recyclable.
Q : Do you take any social action?
TUKI supports the Pies Descalzos foundation, created by the Colombian singer Shakira. This non-profit organization aims to aid low-income children from Colombia through education and give them a future. Around 10% of the raised funds will go to the foundation and we hope doing more in the future. Moreover, instead of destroying our unsold fruit juices, we give them  to the Red Cross and people in need.  
___________________________________________________________

story:
HI Indie GOGO!

Who AM I?
My name is Tiffany Lotz and I am a Yoga instructor out of Detroit, Michigan. I was born and raised here in the heart of Motown, and recently returned to my home after five years of some amazing travels. 
After community college in Oakland County, I went down to Brazil to study conservation biology and natural resource management. Made my way over to Seattle, Washington for more college and some work in urban farming, organic gardening and education, as well as social justice.
Found myself in Northern California setting up the site for a permaculture farm, enjoyed the food truck scene in Portland, learned what not to do in Vegas, and received Yoga and Polarity therapy training in the valley of Arizona, and got my feet wet in medical marijuana and the festival scene up in Flagstaff. 
Coming full circle, and returning to home base, I am bringing all of my gems of love and inspiration that I have gathered along my way, back to the D. 
So, I am here. Teaching Yoga, bringing it all in. 
What is this all about?
There is a specific practice that I discovered while in Scottsdale, Arizona, that has uniquely stood out in my mind as a particularly attractive and expressive endeavor.
We call it BUTI Yoga. AND YES. It is as fun and sexy as it sounds. The reason why it is so, is not just the glistening bodies getting funky to some tribal vibration, but because at the very core, it empowers the divine feminine energy that is alive within each and every one of us. 
This energy serves our highest good by unlocking blockages in our energetic centers, allowing us to feel and express our healthiest, most vibrant, beautiful, secure, and creative selves. Making it more comfortable to be ourselves, work with each-other, and live life how it was intended to be lived. 
To further illustrate, BUTI combines the ancient science of Yoga, tribal dance, and a plyometric work out to serve and create the bodies and minds of our dreams. 
So yeah, thats what your contribution will grow. More specifically, the financial support for this certification not only supports me and my sustainability as a Yoga instructor and healing arts therapist, allowing me to continue to do what I love by helping others, but the tools that I pass along to countless others through the guidance of this practice, will continue to grow and prosper as gifts within each individual student, and all of the friends and family that they are connected to. 
How Much?
The costs for this campaign are pretty low. 900 Dollas. Total. Thats it.
$725 for the certification. (And yes, they just HaPPEn to be coming to Detroit December 5th & 6th)
$75 for some basic marketing costs - flyers, news feature, cards, etc. to get the word out.
$100 for rental space for the first 4 classes until the class begins to generate some income. 
As an expression of gratitude for your contribution. I will be happy to create a full BUTI work out video, with my own selection of sequencing and music for all of our contributors, including a testimonial section from the students of mine that wish to share how specifically the exposure to the class has helped transform their lives. 
If I don't reach my entire goal - which I am NOT counting on by the way - the funds will still go towards the certification and I will have to cover the remainder of the expenses in whatever way I can come up with. I have been quite thrifty in this way in the past ; ), however would prefer to focus on creating some stellar classes, instead of weird ways to make money. So please, help a sistar out. 

And remember, what goes around, comes around. 

LIVING PROOF - RIGHT HERE. 
Even a dollar donation towards this cause will likely have some impactful karmic returns - just saying'.  (But the more the merrier : P ) 
And if you cannot afford even a dollar, please pass along this campaign to anyone who you think may even at the very least, may consider donating, or anyone who could benefit from hearing a little bit about the practice.

story:
A PERSONAL STORY

My Grandma suffers from Alzheimer’s Disease. The illness has caused her to forget things that were very important to her. We stay connected by sending her photos through her iPad, in hopes that she would remember us for as long as possible. Her caregiver would give her the iPad and my Grandma would look at the photos. Sometimes she remembers the people in the photos, sometimes she doesn’t, because recognizing people is becoming increasingly difficult. She also needs her caregiver to help her remember to do everyday tasks such as taking medication or making phone calls. Her illness is making difficult for to stay connected with each other.

As the disease progressed, my grandma started to lose track of time and have difficulty managing her daily activities. We set up visual aids around the house to help her remember events, and continued to send her photos, in hope that she would remember us, for as long as possible.

The picture below is the whiteboard we put up for my grandma in her living room. It has my Dad’s phone number on top. In the middle is the phone number of the person she needs to visit and the respective address. "Sunday", the day of the week of this particular day, is written at the bottom in Chinese.

On the left is the iPad that my grandmother uses to look at pictures we sent her.

As time went by, I started to wonder, is there a simple mobile app that could help my grandmother and other Alzheimer’s or dementia patients remember events, stay engaged with friends and family, and recognize people around them? An app that could help my grandmother in the same way that all the things we set up for her helps her remember?

My family hunted extensively for such an app we were sure must exist. But we came away disappointed because in fact, it didn’t.

There are many tools in the market but none of them help patients improve their daily lives. We also found that there were very few apps developed for elderly, due to the stereotype that old people cannot use technology. They are the underserved demographic.

Right at around that time, I started learning how to code in Swift, an iOS Programming Language. So I took the matter into my own hands and developed Timeless.

WHAT IS TIMELESS?

Timeless is a first of its kind, simple, caregiver assisted, easy-to-use mobile app for Alzheimer’s and dementia that helps them remember events, stay connected and engaged with friends and family, and recognize loved ones using artificial intelligence-based facial recognition technology. 

PHASE I of Timeless has four key functions:

The patient signs into Timeless with Touch-ID or Face-ID. Passwords are not needed. 

Timeless is managed by a caregiver. The role of the caregiver is to help set up events, activities, appointments and manage the patients' Timeless circle of friends.

Timeless’ comprehensive feature set addresses the daily challenges faced by Alzheimer’s patients in a unique and simple way.

Timeless works on all Apple devices including all iPhones 6 or above with  iOS 11 or up, and iPads.

Phase I is a foundational phase and once it is built, additional functionalities will be added in Phase II and III.

FUTURE PLANS

PHASE II

PHASE III

DEVELOPMENT PROGRESS TO-DATE

Timeless' concept was incubated in March 2016, and a prototype was built in April 2016. The concept was very well received and garnered many awards and recognitions. I have since worked with Ms. Liliia Mandrino - a Human Experience Designer based in Dallas, Texas, who has provided in-kind support to revamp the app's UX/UI design. Liliia and I then subsequently worked with Dr. Melissa Kramps, an Alzheimer's Disease Specialist, to ensure that the app is designed with the needs of an Alzheimer's patients in mind. 

The app is now completely redesigned. The next step is to complete the development of the app so that it can be piloted with patients and their families.

CHALLENGES AND RISKS

The prototype was developed entirely by myself. Since I am a full-time student, my time is limited and therefore the development progress has been slow.  I can continue to develop the app myself but the risk of not completing the app is high. I realized that in order to scale the development, I need to expand the development resources beyond myself so that I can get the development off the ground quickly.

RESOURCES NETWORK

After many rounds of recruitment research, I connected with a software developer in Cologne, Germany who will join me in the development of Timeless.

With a design expert and a software developer, I believe I have a resources network in place to take Timeless' development to the next level.

What we need now is funding for the development & marketing efforts for Phase I & II. 

FUNDING NEEDS

We are seeking to raise $50,000 to support the development and marketing of Timeless. The breakdown of the required funding is as follows:

1. $10,000 - Complete the design and development of Phase I 

2. $20,000 - Design and development of Phase II 

3. $20,000 - First Year Maintenance & Support + Marketing and Promotion cost

Development Timeline:

THE TEAM

 

ADVISORS

 

TECHNOLOGY SPONSOR

The AI-based facial recognition technology behind Timeless is provided by Kairos, a human analytics start-up based in Miami. 

THE IMPACT

PREVALENCE OF ALZHEIMER’S DISEASE

Today, Alzheimer’s disease is a serious problem around the world. Alzheimer’s is a chronic neurodegenerative disease that affects 50 million people worldwide. In the US, one in three seniors dies with Alzheimer’s disease or another dementia. The disease is the 6th leading cause of death in the US, affecting more than 5 million Americans. Not only does the disease affect the patient, but also caregivers, including family, friends and care professionals. 60% of Alzheimer's and dementia caregivers rate the emotional stress of caregiving as high or very high; about 40% suffer from depression. As a result of the illness, Alzheimer’s patients experience difficulties with their memory, which interferes greatly with their day-to-day life. Unlike other chronic illnesses, Alzheimer’s disease prevalence is on the rise with 13 million Americans and 130 million globally projected to suffer from the disease by 2050. Recent estimates suggest that the illness has become the third leading cause of death in the US, behind cardiovascular disease and cancer. In the absence of a cure for the illness, developing solutions to help Alzheimer’s patients to live better daily life  is increasingly pressing.

Timeless' impact is significant.

AWARDS & RECOGNITIONS

OVERWHELMING FEEDBACK

 

 

WORLDWIDE PRESS COVERAGE

Over the last 18 months, Timeless has received worldwide press coverage and recognitions.

And has been interviewed and/or covered by:

BBC World Service 

http://www.bbc.com/mundo/noticias-37518910

Tech50+ 

https://www.tech50plus.com/alzheimers-app-developer-emma-yang/

https://www.tech50plus.com/meet-the-12-year-old...

Mic  

https://www.facebook.com/MicMedia/videos/123084...

Senior Planet 

http://seniorplanet.org/the-first-app-for-alzhe...

Kairos

https://www.kairos.com/blog/developer-discussio...

Next Avenue 

http://www.nextavenue.org/12-year-old-develops-...

Star 2 (Malaysia) 

http://www.star2.com/people/2016/09/19/this-12-...

El Mundo (Spain) 

http://www.elmundo.es/salud/2016/09/20/57d924c5...

Johns Hopkins University Center for Talented Youth

http://cty.jhu.edu/about/awesome-ctyers/ctyer-s...

The Longevity Network

https://www.longevitynetwork.org/exclusive/entr...

Good News Network

https://www.goodnewsnetwork.org/12-year-old-mad...

iAdvance Senior Care

https://www.iadvanceseniorcare.com/news-item/me...

Sincerely Hueman Podcast

https://sincerelyhueman.com/episodes/timeless

Patient Innovation Platform

https://patient-innovation.com/post/1551

Other Ways You Can Help

Besides contributing, there are other ways you can help:

  • Help us get the word out and create awareness for the campaign
  • Use Indiegogo share tools to promote the campaigns on your social media channels

Use Indiegogo share tools to promote the campaigns on your social media channels

story:
This is where you come in. We need your help to make this a reality. 

We are looking to raise $5000 CAN to cover some of the core costs of film making and the expedition, and ideally $8000 CAN to cover most costs of the project.

We've created a wide range of contribution levels for wherever you're at - from smoothie bottles, to event tickets to inviting us to speak to sponsorship of episodes.

We invite you to explore the options at the right of this page and select a contribution that resonates with you. 

 

The Web Series

The MINDvsMOUNTAIN Web Series will expand the mental health conversation in a unique way, by climbing mountains and sharing the journey, the struggles, the ups and downs leading up to and during the expedition. Between Brent's openness of living with schizophrenia and James' videography and storytelling, the hope is to remove the shame and stigma associated with mental illness and spark dialogue in a powerful way.

 

STORY

After summiting North America's Highest Mountain (Denali) together in 2016, James and Brent  are embarking on a month long expedition to the Himalaya in May, 2018 to explore the parallels between climbing mountains and climbing out of mental health struggles. 

What does it look like to navigate life living with mental illness while pursuing your dreams?

This is the fundamental question Brent (diagnosed with schizophrenia) and James will explore leading up to and during their Himalayan expedition.

The pair of Vancouver-based mountaineers will create a 6-Part web series leading up to and during the expedition. 

During their time in Nepal, they will connect with locals, the culture attempt to summit multiple +6000m mountains and visit Everest Basecamp to see Mt Everest up close and decide whether they truly want to climb it on a future expedition. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise $5000 CAN to cover some of the core costs of film making and the expedition, and ideally $8000 CAN to cover most costs of the project.

There are a host of prizes at various contribution levels from $1 and up. Please check out the prizes on the right hand of this page for all options and select a contribution level that feels right.

Here is a cost breakdown for the money we are raising:

 

The Impact

By shedding light on mental health in an open, empowering way, without the shame and darkness often associated with it, this project will spark dialogue around mental health in unique and powerful ways. No one should have to struggle in silence and this story will help those that connect with it have the confidence to speak up and speak out about their mental health.

By showing people that despite living with mental illness, it's still possible to pursue and fulfill big goals and dreams, the hope is that this story will inspire others to do the same.

By sharing their journey through the video series and through speaking, James and Brent will impact thousands of people who have struggled with their mental health and empower them to not only talk openly about mental health, but pursue their dreams and live full lives.

story:
This is more than helping a centre, it's about doing more for a community...

We (Andy Antoine and Wes Derequito) have moved our facility, the A1A Training Centre in Lasalle since January of last year. Since then we have begun training groups of individuals who are passionate about getting in shape as much as we are passionate about helping them reach their goals. 

We humbly started with virtually nothing. All our equipment, renovations, and interior work put into our facility has come out of pocket, and at least 85% of the work was done ourselves! That was because we believed in our project and what we could achieve. 

Photo: Wes (left) and Andy (right), during their first day of renovations at the A1A Training Centre

Now, our Training Centre is a near 5000 square foot training space, focusing on group classes and semi-private sessions, which we call "Team Training." Our training concept is a much more effective means of fitness training than that of the traditional "bootcamps"  and other forms of cross training. Our current members really enjoy our sessions, especially with our versatility. We offer all sorts of training sessions, such as circuit training, athletics, even combat sports such as Mixed Martial Arts (MMA) and kickboxing to compliment our members' fitness regime. We are also the Headquarters for Senshido  International, a world renowned self-defense organization providing some of the most effective self-defense training around!

We have turned our place into a place people can get motivated, yet with our friendly environment, feel at home! We may even go as  far as saying it is like a family here at the A1A Training Centre! Better yet, much like a group of strong lions, our family is our Pride! However, we really want to be able to accomodate more people and more importantly, help others in our community! And you can help us grow our ''Pride'.'



Photos: "Team Training" Sessions

We are now looking at the bigger picture, and we need a boost to jumpstart our community outreach program: Fit & Safe For Life. Our goal with our facility is to make it a central hub in our community, a place to help the people within the area live a healthy and safe lifestyle. We want to be able to provide/accomodate for groups of people like less fortunate families, people who have suffered from violent crime, and other needy groups in our area, free sessions/workshops in either health & fitness or selfdefense training. We will then be able to truly embark on a Fit & Safe For Life venture!

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are looking at raising $25 000 in order to reach all our goals. If we collect the total funds we are aiming for, 80% of the funds collected will be going into sponsoring the groups and families we wish to accomodate. The other 20% will go into improving the facility, such as new equipment and minor renovations (i.e. improving the changing rooms/showers,) which will also help accomodate more people including our current members!
  • In detail, if we get fully funded, we wil be able to sponsor at  families or small groups of people a year with nutrition plans and training guides, as well as giving them access to our training facility. We would also be able to sponsor another 2-4 groups a year with self-defense training, providing them with our amazing Senshido Personal Protection program, teaching them to be "Safe For Life." There are many families in the area who would benefit from our training programs, but cannot afford our top quality training. With the help of our neighbours (a non-profit  job placement company) we are already sponsoring a group now, but with your help, we would be able to "pay it forward" on a much larger scale in our area! And if you know people who are in need of our kind of services and cannot afford it, please feel free to contact us (info@a1agym.com) so that together we can help them out! 
  • In return, you can claim awesome perks! Some of the perks also directly contribute to sponsoring individuals! Any Perks marked with an asterix (*) allow you to contribute directly in sponsoring an individual.

    For example, if you donate to a perk that involves a membership to our centre, we will match that membership to an individual who needs it! So it's a 2 for 1 deal that we are able to accomodate because of you! You get a membership, and we will Pay it Forward! So,just take a look and see the variety of options as a thank you for believing in our project. We've got memberships to our centre, passes to our training session event, our self-produced workout videos,  online training sessions and customizable workout programs made just for you! You help give to us and to others, and we give back to you! These are basically  the same type of perks t    hat we will be able to give to people who would not otherwise get them because of their living conditions.

    The Impact - A Ripple Effect

We truly believe we can make a difference. A kind gesture, no matter how small can have a profound ripple effect on people's lives. But, collectively, the difference can be much much bigger. This is the reason we are seeking your help. We've done other fundraisers in the past. We've donated our time to train people who couldn't afford quality training for free! We just can't say no to someone who would benefit from our help.

We've helped groups of kids develop into athletes, we've helped local sport teams, and we've even conducted free self-defense seminars for women and community centres. We were even able to invite former UFC veteran, Brian Ebersole to our gym, who volunteered his time to coach our MMA students, with funds going to our self-defense program, Safe For Life. 

Photo: Andy and Wes with Former MMA Star, Brian Ebersole (middle).

photo: Brian Ebersole (2nd from the left) with A1A students having fun after a training session.
We've also finally introduced our Young Heroes program! A class for kids 13 years and younger, in which we cover activities to help them develop athletic skills along with martial arts training!

Hurdles & Challenges

Since we are a small business, like any other business there will be hurdles to overcome. But since both of us are athletes (Andy, former pro-foootball player, and Wes a Mixed Martial Artist), we see any challenge like a sport or game. In this case an obstacle course! We may not reach our total goal, or maybe we will see other expenses along the way that were not expected. However, we've experienced that before and have overcome them all. 

Again, with your help, we make this a much bigger team effort. And with a strong team, we may in fact surpass our goals! If we are able to raise more than our needed goal, we will be able to sponsor more families, and maybe even expand our reach! Sky's the limit!
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Now, we are providing some sweet perks to come along with certain donation amounts. We also understand that some of you realy want to help us out but may not have enough funds yourselves. But really, this is a collective goal, and every little bit helps! No donation is too small to be considered insignificant. Just think about it, if we are able to reach 1000 people with just a small donation of 25$ each, we already reach our goal! 

Even just spreading word about our campaign and help us make some noise about our Outreach project, would be an amazing way to support us! Share our stuff on social media, such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter etc.! 

We thank you all in advance! Please help our team grow into something big!

Regards,
Andy & Wes
