story:
Für die deutsche Version scrollt bitte nach unten, diese folgt nach der englischen Version!


ENGLISH VERSION


They support with it a social project because the manufacturing occurs in social workshops.


The Problem ..

The fridge is a health hazard and the biggest problem in the household because densely populated with germs1) 2).

Spoiled food, mold, bad smell, lack of overview and spoiled in the farthest corner are the daily hassles. Each household is spoiling food at a range of € 350,00 per year and household3).

A necessary cleaning every 4 weeks is done rarely or not at all, because that's far too much trouble.


Facts ..

1) Federal Office for Classificaton of Risks www.bfr.bund.de
   TÜV Süd AG, food quality

2) Yearly over 100.000 illnesses caused by spoiled food are reported to the     Robert Koch Institute. The estimated number of unknown cases ranges at mostly 1 million of toxicopathies, diarrhoeas, vomiting, fever.

3)University of Stuttgart. Findings of food, spoiled per household and year. Februar 2012, ordered by the Federal Republik of Germany, Ministry of Food.


The most common pathogens:

  • Listeria
  • Salmonellae
  • Campylobacter (notifiable)
  • Escherichia Coli
  • Staphylococcus
  • Mold spores (mycotoxins)



The problem solution ..

The TAEBLETT© with multi function fits in 98% of all refrigerators.

An integrated Clean System© (cartridge patented) prevents germs inside the fridge and on food at a range of up to 99,9% (scientifically proven), leaving food freshly for a longer time.

Annoying mold and nasty smell are prevented, too. The Clean cartridge has to be changed monthly, whereby you save more than it costs. Its use is absolutely safe.

On the rotary plate everything is visible at a glance, at the same time you can carry it to the table and back again.

The TAEBLETT© a truly revolutionary advance for hygiene, order, freshness and cost savings in the refrigerator. Daily useful and helpful.

4) According to expert opinion of the University of Hannover, disinfectant action of 90 to 99,9%.


So clean through the TAEBLETT© with Clean System© ..



Function



- Take the glass plate from the fridge.
- The TAEBLETT© adjust the width of the fridge, insert, lock, ready, 


Rotary plate and at the same time the salver to take out
- With the rotary plate, everything at a glance.
- None search in the back most corner of the fridge.
- Especially important are not available for the fridge at eye level. 


Storage surface
- For everything what drips and to thaw.
- Easy to clean.
- A real problem solving.


Millions consumers wait for it.


Suggested retail price including VAT €/Consumer:


State of things:

Prototypes are ready. All developing costs are already financed of one’s own.

For series production large-scale tolls have to be produced, then commerce can be supplied as i.g.:

  • common trade (non-food)
  • producer of fridges
  • teleshopping
  • direct sale
  • online commerce

Stock of fridges in the EU, USA, Canada, Russia, Turkey, 280 millions, all have the same problem! Planned TAEBLETT©  sales at least 0,4% of total fridge stock, starting from the 4th business year – 1,12 million pieces of TAEBLETT©. 

This project fills a real gap in the market with sole position characteristic.


The aim of the campaign

The campaign serves to support the expensive tolls costs, costs for first production and insertion running up to € 40.000,00.


What you get ..

Delivery probably in December 2016.



Standard design

TAEBLETT ONE with Clean System and indicating functions.


TAEBLETT TWO without Clean System and indicating functions.




GOLD EDITION-LUXURY
A Highlight!

TAEBLETT ONE with Clean System and indicating functions.


TAEBLETT TWO without Clean System and indicating functions.


What we achieved amongst others:

  • The mobile POTEMA®MATTRESS CLEANING SYSTEM, without chemicals. Known from several telecasts as i.g.  Milbenalarm in Matratzen. Eine Reportage mit Horst Veith
  • The first Mattress Clean Spray, worldwide patented, 20 years of successful teleshopping.
  • The ANTI-SARS Disinfection Spray which amongst others prevented the spread of the dangerous Corona Virus in South Korea in 2003.
  • Semi-Dry Carpet Cleaning.
  • Pollutant Control for homes.
  • In a stage of development: Disinfection of kitchen working places without chemicals.


Your support ...

As a highly motivated and engaged team we are asking for your recommendations and support.

The TAEBLETT© is for sure a tropic and advantageous for all of us.

It is especially a chance for home sales parties, too.


Exceptionally successful ...

In 1991 BMV GmbH managed by mOnika Wittmann took over the general license of Horst Veith for international inventions and innovations, in each case with sole position characteristics. This was completed succuessfully.

International press and television have frequently reported of those exceptional successes. Horst Veith, inventor and hygiene expert has been present in many television programs.

Contributions on Youtube Horst Veith

BMV GmbH and Horst Veith give their attention to research, development and further inventions, which are useful and give answers to problems in every day's life.


One invention is the intelligent Multi Function TAEBLETT© for fridges making life a little bit easier.

Shown already in ..





DEUTSCHE VERSION


Sie unterstützen damit ein soziales Projekt, weil die Fertigung in sozialen Werkstätten erfolgt.


Das Problem ...

Der Kühlschrank ist eine Gesundheitsgefahr und der größte Problembereich im Haushalt, weil dicht besiedelt mit Krankheitskeimen1) 2)

Verdorbene Lebensmittel, Schimmel, übler Geruch, fehlende Übersicht und Verdorbenes im hintersten Eck sind der tägliche Ärger.  Pro Jahr und Haushalt werden Lebensmittel im Gegenwert von € 350,00 entsorgt3).

Die notwendige Reinigung im Abstand von 4 Wochen erfolgt selten oder gar nicht, weil zu umständlich.

Tatsachen ..


1) Bundesanstalt für Risikobewertung www.bfr.bund.de
    TÜV-Süd AG, Lebensmittelqualität

2) u.a. werden jedes Jahr dem Robert Koch Institut über 100.000 Erkrankungen
    gemeldet. Verursacht durch verseuchte Lebensmittel. Die Dunkelziffer liegt
    bei ca. 1 Mill., mit Vergiftungen, Durchfall, Erbrechen, Fieber.

3) Universität Stuttgart. Ermittlung der weggeworfenen Lebensmittelmengen
    pro Haushalt und Jahr, Febr. 2012, im Auftrag der Bundesregierung
    Ministerium Ernährung.


Die häufigsten Krankheitserreger:
  • Listerien
  • Salmonellen
  • Campylobacter (Meldepflichtig)
  • Escherichia Colli
  • Staphylococcus
  • Schimmelsporen (Mykotoxine)




Die Problemlösung ..

Das TAEBLETT© mit Multifunktion passt in 98% aller Kühlschränke.
Ein integriertes Clean System© (Patrone patentiert), verhindert Bakterien im Kühlschrank und auf Lebensmitteln von bis zu 99,9% (wissenschaftlich bestätigt), damit bleiben Lebensmittel länger frisch4) . Auch der lästige Schimmel und üble Gerüche werden verhindert. Die Clean-Patrone wechselt man monatlich und spart mehr als diese kostet. Die Anwendung ist absolut unbedenklich.

Auf die Auffangfläche kommt alles was tropft wie z.B. beim Auftauen.
Mit dem Thermometer, Hygrometer und Türalarm hat man alle wichtigen Kontrollfunktionen im Blick.

Auf dem Drehteller ist alles überschaubar, zugleich geht man damit zum Tisch und wieder zurück.

Das TAEBLETT© ein wirklich revolutionärer Fortschritt für Hygiene, Ordnung, Frische und Kostenersparnis im Kühlschrank. Täglich nützlich und hilfreich.

4) Lt. Gutachten Universität Hannover, desinfizierende Wirkung 90-99,9%.


So sauber durch das TAEBLETT© mit Clean System© ..





Funktion



- Ablagefläche aus dem Kühlschrank nehmen.
- TAEBLETT© auf Kühlschrankbreite auseinanderziehen, einschieben,   
   arrettieren, fertig.


Drehteller und zugleich Serviertablett zum herausnehmen
- Auf dem Drehteller alles im Blick.
- Kein suchen und verderben im hintersten Eck.
- Besonders wichtig für Kühlschränke die nicht auf Augenhöhe stehen.


Abstellfläche
- Für alles was tropft und zum auftauen.
- Leicht zu reinigen.
- Eine echte Problemlösung.
- Weil nicht mehr der Kühlschrank ausgeräumt und gereingt werden muss,
   wenn etwas ausläuft.


Darauf warten Millionen Verbraucher ..


Empfohlener Verkaufspreis inkl. MwSt. €/Endverbraucher:




Stand der Dinge ..

Prototypen sind fertiggestellt. Die gesamten Entwicklungskosten wurden bereits Eigenfinanziert. Für die Serienproduktion müssen aufwendige Werkzeuge gefertigt werden, danach kann der Handel beliefert werden wie z.B.:

  • Allgemeiner Handel (Non-Food)
  • Kühlschrankhersteller
  • Teleshopping
  • Direktvertriebe
  • Onlinehandel

Bestand an Kühlschränken in der EU, USA, Kanada, Russland, Türkei,  280 Mill., alle haben die gleichen Probleme! Geplante TAEBLETT© - Verkäufe ab 4. Geschäftsjahr pro Jahr mind. 0,4% vom Gesamt-Kühlschrankbestand = 1,12 Millionen Stück TAEBLETT©. 

Dieses Projekt füllt eine wirkliche Marktlücke mit Alleinstellungsmerkmal.


Ziel der Kampagne

Die Kampagne soll dazu dienen die Aufwendigen Werkzeug, Erstserie und Markteinführungskosten von € 40.000,00 zu unterstützen.


Du bekommst ..

Lieferung geschätzt Dezember 2016



Standard-Ausführung

TAEBLETT ONE mit Clean System und Anzeigefunktionen.


TAEBLETT TWO ohne Clean System und Anzeigefunktionen.




GOLD EDITION-LUXURY
Ein Highlight!

TAEBLETT ONE mit Clean System und Anzeigefunktionen.


TAEBLETT TWO ohne Clean System und Anzeigefunktionen.





Das haben wir geleistet u.a. ..

  • das mobile POTEMA® Matratzenreinigungssystem, chemiefrei. Bekannt aus vielen Fernsehsendungen u.a. Milbenalarm in Matratzen. Eine Reportage mit Horst Veith
  • weltweit erstes, patentiertes  Matratzen Clean Spray.  20 Jahre erfolgreich im Teleshopping;
  • das Desinfection-Spray Anti-SARS, verhinderte u.a. die Ausbreitung 2003 des gefährlichen Corona-Virus in Süd-Korea;
  • SemiDry Teppich-Reinigung;
  • Schadstoffprüfsystem für Wohnungen;
  • in Entwicklung: Die chemiefreie Desinfektion für Küchenarbeitsflächen.

Eure Unterstützung ..

Wir sind ein hochmotiviertes und engagiertes Team und bitten daher um Eure Weiterempfehlung und Unterstützung.

Das TAEBLETT© ist sicher ein Gesprächsthema, weil mit Vorteilen für alle. 
Eine besondere Chance auch für Home-Verkaufs-Partys.


Ein außergewöhnlicher Erfolg …

1991 übernimmt die BMV GmbH, unter der Geschäftsführerin Monika Wittmann, die Generallizenz  von Horst Veith für internationale Erfindungen und Innovationen jeweils mit Alleinstellungsmerkmal die erfolgreich realisiert wurden.

Die internationale Presse und das Fernsehen würdigen in vielen Berichten die außergewöhnlichen Erfolge. Horst Veith ist in vielen Fernsehsendungen als Erfinder und Hygieneexperte präsent.

Die BMV GmbH und Horst Veith mit Team widmen sich der Forschung, Entwicklung und weiteren Erfindungen, die im Alltag nützlich und hilfreich eine Problemlösung sind.

Eine davon ist das,
intelligente TAEBLETT© mit Multifunktion für Kühlschränke.
Eine Erfindung die das Leben ein wenig leichter macht.

story:
The deterioration of health is sending a wave of destruction throughout humanity. You cannot go a day without being bombarded with news and articles surrounding health issues like heart disease, cancer, Alzheimer's, diabetes, or depression. While those issues cause serious harm to the individuals who suffer from them, our society has also become rampant with atrocious events causing harm to masses of people that are provoked by individuals suffering from mental illnesses. In order to turn the tide, we must empower individuals with an understanding of why this epidemic is occurring and the tools to improve overall health.

The Gist

My name is CK, and my core mission is to make the world a better place. In essence, everything in my life thus far has led me to pursue this endeavor now in an attempt to make the biggest impact I possibly can on humanity.

Quite a statement, huh?

Advances in technology have made it easy for us to fall into a comfort zone that essentially hijacks our biology and turns off many of the processes our body systems are meant carry out. #NETT90 is designed to bring awareness back to those processes and show you how to implement simple practices into your daily life in order to reclaim your body's naturally healthy capacity.

The approach I'm taking all boils down to spreading awareness of evolutionarily-minded functional health practices to empower individuals with the means to make effective decisions and utilize the body's natural design. Better health makes everything in life better. When our body systems function how they're meant to, we're able to perform better and make better choices. I believe that cultivating this foundation of health is a prominent catalyst to generate positive advances for the greater good.

In order to make the biggest impact, I want #NETT90 to be as accessible as possible to anyone and everyone, so my intention is to make the cost of the program $0.00. Yes, that's right... FREE!

Who is CK?

I’m not a medical professional, I don’t have any health or fitness certifications, I’m not a professional athlete. In many respects, I’m just a pretty average 30-something guy. I have a (standing dancing) desk job, I pay a mortgage, I’m in a long-term relationship…

While there are many others who are much more knowledgeable and experienced than I am, I believe I possess a history of diverse experiences that allow me to relate with a wide range of personalities, which gives me the ability to disseminate information effectively. Furthermore, if high IQ is a sign of competence, I am a Mensan - I reveal this not to brag, but as a hasty indicator to let you know I'm not a (completely) delusional idiot. I wish to utilize this degree of understanding to synthesize valuable concepts about well-being and connect people with more accurate and useful information.

I've always been pretty keen on health, but I really began diving deep into research, studies, and self-experimentation when I turned the ripe old age of 30. Over the past 6+ years, I have been clocking an average of around 15 hours per week learning about various health topics on my own, totaling thousands of hours grasping fundamentals of the health sciences while uncovering cutting-edge research and the latest discoveries - a lot of which flies against the annals of conventional wisdom many of us have grown up buying into.

(If you'd like an idea of my health influences, I've listed them at the end of this page.)

What is #NETT90?

#NETT90 is a 90-day program I developed with the objective to enable anyone to easily benefit from it. It basically consists of daily installments containing information and simple recommendations to implement into your lifestyle. The program encompasses most everything around the mental, physical, and social aspects of health, including guidance around fitness and nutrition.

You may find conventional medical professionals, trainers, health programs, and the like focusing on just one or two aspects of health and doing so in a generalized manner. What they tend to neglect is how everybody is different and the body works as a system comprised of many intricate parts that only function optimally when they are all healthy and in sync with each other.

Have you ever wondered why certain diets or workouts that work miracles for your friends seem to do nothing for you other than make you miserable and result in disaster no matter how much effort you put in to adhering to the plan? It's because your body is not the same as your friends' or anyone else's for that matter.

Without maintaining a proper balance all throughout, you may be spinning your wheels or even doing yourself more harm than good. #NETT90 encompasses all aspects of health and provides you with the foundation to gain awareness of functional health to empower you to determine what is best specifically for your own body.

Who is this for?

#NETT90 is for everybody! While it may be most effective for beginners who are unsure of where to start their journey, even if you are well into another program or already have your regimens dialed in, this program is so different from anything else that's out there (and it's so easy) that you should be able to stack it on top of what you are already doing, and it will exponentially improve what you're already doing. Many of the practices take just seconds to complete and others take just minutes. The hardest part may be to remember implementing the practices, but the program aids with that too!

#NETT90 isn't an extreme diet or workout program that will take up a lot of time and effort. It's a program that helps you incorporate simple techniques to build habits that utilize the human body's inherent design to your benefit. These techniques bring awareness back to processes that have been overlooked due to the patterns we have developed in the comforts of the modern lifestyle. The basic practices in #NETT90 will benefit anybody, and are foundational to health. Implementing them into your lifestyle and developing them into habits will add a positive synergistic effect to everything else you do.

All you need is a few minutes every day to read the installments, and then what you do with the material is completely up to you. Implementation of the bare minimum practices takes up just a minute or two out of your day. If you were to implement everything recommended in #NETT90, you could spend as little as 15-20 minutes of total time to complete your practices over a few minutes here and there throughout your entire day. The goal is to build the practices into habits so they eventually become a natural part of your lifestyle.

The Impact

I spent the past few months taking a few of my friends through an alpha testing run of #NETT90. While I certainly appreciate their trust and participation, it was also a selfish move on my part to get my ass in gear and put my thoughts into action as well as to keep myself accountable and write out the program in a timely manner. I encountered a few bumps throughout the process, as expected, but the first draft of the program has far exceeded my expectations.

So, I already have a draft of the entire #NETT90 program completed. While the alpha run was quite raw in that it was simply a daily text email and I didn't prepare other elements I would like to incorporate in order to keep participants motivated and engaged, some of my friends took off with it anyway, and their results have been utterly astounding.

For example, my friend Audrey had been suffering from Crohn's disease over the past few years and maintains a highly stressful management position at a Fortune 50 company. Not only did she reverse practically all of her symptoms of Crohn's, she now wakes up happier and starts her days off in a much better mood, she is able to sustain this happiness as well as her energy levels throughout her day, and she is enjoying a more fulfilling life overall! Not to mention, while I want to emphasize that this is not an extreme weight loss program, Audrey's tremendous improvement in health manifested in an amazing body transformation!

Audrey had experienced mixed results with advice from others and many different programs over the years. She describes #NETT90 as:

"The best non-diet available today for those who want to FEEL healthy. A total brain-to-body health program which aligns your mental state with your physical being to become aligned into a happier and more fulfilled you."

The Challenges

I have been developing #NETT90 on my own time. For my job, I run my own business as a digital marketing consultant in which I wear many hats. Not to mention, my newfound health over the past few years has led me to dabble in the semi-pro ranks of soccer where I try to keep up with much younger players who are trying to break into the professional ranks, some of whom are literally half my age. I also spend time donating my marketing skills to various non-profit organizations.

Since I've been getting more and more into the intricacies of upgrading health and performance, I have become less and less active in selling my business services. While I never really found it necessary to market myself since I had been able to get more than enough business through word of mouth and referrals from colleagues, I haven't been networking very much in that sphere over the past few years. Therefore, I've been finding myself having to put more time into the process of obtaining clients lately. Rather than being left to do what I do best, this has led me to spend more time being a terrible salesperson and chasing leads, which leaves me quite taxed and frustrated.

Ironically, as I finish up the initial testing round of #NETT90, I also find myself at the worst health I've been at for quite awhile. The extra work I've been having to do plus the time I've been putting into this program everyday has led me to sleep terribly, and I have also lost six pounds of muscle mass over the past two months.

I have also been dealing with a torn muscle in my rotator cuff and a severely bruised hip, and to top it all off, I broke my middle toe completely through, and now it requires surgery!

While you might interpret this as a ruse to gain your sympathy, it's actually an attempt to show my empathy toward those of you who go about every day in a sub-optimal state of health. I want you to know that I can relate to how you feel! It sucks!!

Not to undermine your own struggles if you have them, but my quick downturn in health could be considered to be even more devastating since I know what it feels like to be on top of my game and perform at a high level on a daily basis. Fortunately for me, I knowingly put myself at risk of my current sufferings and I know how to mitigate the harmful effects. Being able to relate to poor health just motivates me even more and I want to pass on the foundations of what I have learned on to you.

What I Need & What You Get

I really want to get this out to the masses as soon as possible, so you can help me devote more time toward developing #NETT90 by contributing just $5 (or more if you want!) to get in on the beta testing round. I know I said I want to make this program free for everyone, but hopefully $5 isn't too much to ask in exchange for behind-the-scenes access and being one of the first participants to go through this life-changing program.

In addition, you will be given access to a private Facebook group where you may ask questions and share your own thoughts and experiences with other beta testers as well as myself and a few of my friends who completed the alpha testing round.

I don't think I've ever seen a comprehensive program like this being offered for the price of a cup of coffee, or for free, no less. Many of them go for at least $100!

The program will commence with an introductory email on Sunday, June 5, 2016 to get you ready for Day 1 on Monday, June 6, 2016. Since #NETT90 is so simple, especially over the first few weeks, this campaign is set to run through Wednesday, June 8, 2016, because it will be easy for you to catch up.

Since I want to make #NETT90 free, there is not much else I could offer, though I suppose you could also consider helping me bypass the dreaded part of my actual job where I have to put on my salesperson hat. I happen to be a 12+ year veteran in the digital marketing space who specializes in organic search. I'm well-respected among my peers for my SEO (Search Engine Optimization) abilities, and over the years I have also immersed myself in related channels like social media, paid search, and conversion optimization.

Please don't use this campaign or my website as an example of my marketing proficiency. I haven't had the need to put much of any work into my website until recently. As for this Indiegogo campaign, it was a last minute idea, and I have less than two weeks before the beta run begins. I'm pretty much doing everything wrong when it comes to conventional marketing and "experts" would probably shake their heads at the way I'm going about here. With that said, while I've always been one to think outside the box, I also want to take the marketing aspect out of your health. That is the main reason why I want to launch this program for FREE.

I would love to make a career out of this, so I do want to make money from it, but not directly from people who want to improve their health. While there's high value in the exchange of knowledge, a lot of what I have learned over the years has been made freely available by the generosity of experts who share the mindset to spread goodwill. Even so, one reason you may not be as aware of functional health practices is because all you need to implement them is yourself, and there's no money in that! Pharmaceutical companies certainly don't want you to know that you inherently possess the abilities to do what their pills do, gyms and trainers don't want you to know that you don't necessarily need them to reach your goals, and other programs and diets don't want you to learn exactly how and why they do or don't work (if they even know). Fortunately, I can perpetuate the generosity and utilize my skills in marketing to spread awareness of functional health for free while implementing other methods to generate income.

I take the same approach with digital marketing as I do with health. There are many practitioners who follow a single-minded approach or chase an irrelevant metric. A business' online presence is comprised of many intricate parts that only function optimally when they are all optimized properly and in sync with each other.

I am known for defining "holistic SEO":

A synergistic website marketing strategy that utilizes a variety of online channels and other related elements of marketing and web development in conjunction with search engine optimization (SEO).

A Great Deal for Businesses - 50% OFF!

I've been kicking around a new service and I'd like to offer it exclusively via this campaign for half off to see if I can get it off the ground. It's what I'm currently referring to as an SEO Brain Dump, which is exactly what it sounds like. I will spend an hour to analyze your web presence and provide you with any and all of the recommendations I can come up with to improve it.

My colleagues who provide a level of work comparable to mine post hourly rates of $500 or more. I've been laying low over the past few years, so I have set my hourly rate at $300. Therefore, my offer here for my SEO Brain Dump is $150.

A Greater Deal for Health-Conscious Businesses - 50% OFF!

Over the past few years, I have also become a lot more conscious about the type of projects I work on and who I'm making money for. As I become more and more mindful of health and making a positive impact on the world, I want to do my best to align that with my business as well. So, for businesses that focus on functional health and/or green, eco-friendly, organic, sustainable offerings, I will discount my SEO Brian Dump service to a mere $100.

Where the Money Will Go

By selling my services at a deep discount, I will actually lose money with this campaign, unless a lot of people sign up for the beta run. However, since I'm developing #NETT90 on my own time, knowing I won't have to worry about putting on my sales hat to secure $2500 worth of work will basically allow me to spend more time on #NETT90 over the first month of the beta testing round. Whatever you can contribute will help!

Flex Goals

If this happens to catch on, $5000 will carry me through two months of being able to spend more time on #NETT90, and $7500 will carry me through to the end of the beta testing round!

My ultimate vision is to have #NETT90 bundled up into a full-featured app, so anything extra will go toward fulfilling that vision.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't have the means to contribute, but are desperate to get your health in gear, please feel free to contact me and I will grant you free access to the #NETT90 beta.

You can also help by making some noise about #NETT90 and sharing my vision with the world! Please share this page through your social media accounts and tell all of your friends and family about it (there are share buttons toward the top of this page that you may use). Everybody can benefit from better health!

My Health Influencers

I hold the following professionals and experts in the realm of functional health in very high regard, and their work has greatly influenced me to develop #NETT90:

The deterioration of  health is sending a wave of destruction throughout humanity. You cannot go a day without being bombarded with news and articles surrounding health issues like heart disease, cancer, Alzheimer's, diabetes, or depression. While those issues cause serious harm to the individuals who suffer from them, our society has also become rampant with atrocious events causing harm to masses of people that are provoked by individuals suffering from mental illnesses. In order to turn the tide, we must empower individuals with an understanding of why this epidemic is occurring and the tools to improve overall health.
The Gist
My name is CK, and my core mission is to make the world a better place. In essence, everything in my life thus far has led me to pursue this endeavor now in an attempt to make the biggest impact I possibly can on humanity.
Quite a statement, huh?
Advances in technology have made it easy for us to fall into a comfort zone that essentially hijacks our biology and turns off many of the processes our body systems are meant carry out. #NETT90 is designed to bring awareness back to those processes and show you how to implement simple practices into your daily life in order to reclaim your body's naturally healthy capacity.
The approach I'm taking all boils down to spreading  awareness of evolutionarily-minded functional health practices  to empower individuals  with  the means to make effective decisions and utilize the body's natural design. Better health makes everything in life better. When our body systems function how they're meant to, we're able to perform better and make better choices. I believe that cultivating this foundation of health is a prominent catalyst to generate  positive advances for the greater good.
In order to make the biggest impact, I want #NETT90 to be as accessible as possible to anyone and everyone, so my intention is to make the cost of the program $0.00. Yes, that's right... FREE!
Who is CK?
I’m not a medical professional, I don’t have any health or fitness certifications, I’m not a professional athlete. In many respects, I’m just a pretty average 30-something guy. I have a (standing dancing) desk job, I pay a mortgage, I’m in a long-term relationship…
While there are many others who are much more knowledgeable and experienced than I am, I believe I possess a history of diverse experiences that allow me to relate with a wide range of personalities, which gives me the ability to disseminate information effectively. Furthermore, if high IQ is a sign of competence, I am a Mensan - I reveal this not to brag, but as a hasty indicator to let you know I'm not a (completely) delusional idiot. I wish to utilize this degree of understanding to synthesize valuable concepts about well-being and connect people with more accurate and useful information.
I've always been pretty keen on health, but I really began diving deep into research, studies, and self-experimentation when I turned the ripe old age of 30. Over the past 6+ years, I have been clocking an average of around 15 hours per week learning about various health topics on my own, totaling thousands of hours grasping fundamentals of the health sciences while uncovering cutting-edge research and the latest discoveries - a lot of which flies against the annals of conventional wisdom many of us have grown up buying into.
(If you'd like an idea of my health influences, I've listed them at the end of this page.)
What is #NETT90?
#NETT90 is a 90-day program I developed with the objective to enable anyone to easily benefit from it. It basically consists of daily installments containing information and simple recommendations to implement into your lifestyle. The program encompasses most everything around the mental, physical, and social aspects of health, including guidance around fitness and nutrition.
You may find conventional medical professionals, trainers, health programs, and the like focusing on just one or two aspects of health and doing so in a generalized manner. What they tend to neglect is how everybody is different and the body works as a system comprised of many intricate parts that only function optimally when they are all healthy and in sync with each other.
Have you ever wondered why certain diets or workouts that work miracles for your friends seem to do nothing for you other than make you miserable and result in disaster no matter how much effort you put in to adhering to the plan? It's because your body is not the same as your friends' or anyone else's for that matter.
Without maintaining a proper balance all throughout, you may be spinning your wheels or even doing yourself more harm than good. #NETT90 encompasses all  aspects of health and provides you with the foundation to gain awareness of functional health to empower you to determine what is best specifically for your own body.
Who is this for?
#NETT90 is for everybody! While it may be most effective for beginners who are unsure of where to start their journey, even if you are well into another program or already have your regimens dialed in, this program is so different from anything else that's out there (and it's so easy) that you should be able to stack it on top of what you are already doing, and it will exponentially improve what you're already doing. Many of the practices take just seconds to complete and others take just minutes. The hardest part may be to remember implementing the practices, but the program aids with that too!
#NETT90 isn't an extreme diet or workout program that will take up a lot of time and effort. It's a program that helps you incorporate simple techniques to build habits that utilize the human body's inherent design to your benefit. These techniques bring awareness back to processes that have been overlooked due to the patterns we have developed in the comforts of the modern lifestyle. The basic practices in #NETT90 will benefit anybody, and are foundational to health. Implementing them into your lifestyle and developing them into habits will add a positive synergistic effect to everything else you do. 
All you need is a few minutes every day to read the installments, and then what you do with the material is completely up to you. Implementation of the bare minimum practices  takes up just a minute or two out of your day. If you were to implement everything recommended in #NETT90, you could  spend as little as 15-20 minutes of total time to complete your practices over a few minutes here and there throughout your entire day. The goal is to build the practices into habits so they eventually become a natural part of your lifestyle.
The Impact
I spent the past few months taking a few of my friends through an alpha testing run of #NETT90. While I certainly appreciate their trust and participation, it was also a selfish move on my part to get my ass in gear and put my thoughts into action as well as to keep myself accountable and write out the program in a timely manner. I encountered a few bumps throughout the process, as expected, but the first draft of the program has far exceeded my expectations.

So, I already have a draft of the entire #NETT90 program completed. While the alpha run was quite raw in that it was simply a daily text email and I didn't prepare other elements I would like to incorporate in order to keep participants motivated and engaged, some of my friends took off with it anyway, and their results have been utterly astounding.
For example, my friend Audrey had been suffering from Crohn's disease over the past few years and maintains a highly stressful management position at a Fortune 50 company. Not only did she reverse practically all of her symptoms of Crohn's, she now wakes up happier and starts her days off in a much better mood, she is able to sustain this happiness as well as her energy levels throughout her day, and she is enjoying a more fulfilling life overall! Not to mention, while I want to emphasize that this is not an extreme weight loss program, Audrey's tremendous improvement in health manifested in an amazing body transformation!

Audrey had experienced mixed results with advice from others and many different programs over the years. She describes #NETT90 as:
"The best non-diet available today for those who want to FEEL healthy. A total brain-to-body health program which aligns your mental state with your physical being to become aligned into a happier and more fulfilled you."
The Challenges
I have been developing #NETT90 on my own time. For my job, I run my own business as a digital marketing consultant in which I wear many hats. Not to mention, my newfound health over the past few years has led me to dabble in the semi-pro ranks of soccer where I try to keep up with much younger players who are trying to break into the professional ranks, some of whom are literally half my age. I also spend time donating my marketing skills to various non-profit organizations.
Since I've been getting more and more into the intricacies of upgrading health and performance, I have become less and less active in selling my business services. While I never really found it necessary to market myself since I had been able to get more than enough business through word of mouth and referrals from colleagues, I haven't been networking very much in that sphere over the past few years. Therefore, I've been finding myself having to put more time into the process of obtaining clients lately. Rather than being left to do what I do best, this has led me to spend more time being a terrible salesperson and chasing leads, which leaves me quite taxed and frustrated.
Ironically, as I finish up the initial testing round of #NETT90, I also find myself at the worst health I've been at for quite awhile. The extra work I've been having to do plus the time I've been putting into this program everyday has led me to sleep terribly, and I have also lost six pounds of muscle mass over the past two months.

I have also been dealing with a torn muscle in my rotator cuff and a severely bruised hip, and to top it all off, I  broke my middle toe completely through, and now it requires surgery!

While you might interpret this as a ruse to gain  your sympathy, it's actually an attempt to show my empathy toward those of you who go about every day in a sub-optimal state of health. I want you to know that I can relate to how you feel! It sucks!!
Not to undermine your own struggles if you have them, but my quick downturn in health could be considered to be even more devastating since I know what it feels like to be on top of my game and perform at a high level on a daily basis. Fortunately for me, I knowingly put myself at risk of my current sufferings and I know how to mitigate the harmful effects. Being able to relate to poor health just motivates me even more and I want to pass on the foundations of what I have learned on to you.

What I Need & What You Get
I really want to get this out to the masses as soon as possible, so you can help me devote more time toward developing #NETT90 by contributing just $5 (or more if you want!) to get in on the beta testing round. I know I said I want to make this program free for everyone, but hopefully $5 isn't too much to ask in exchange for behind-the-scenes access and being one of the first participants to go through this life-changing program.
In addition, you will be given access to a private Facebook group where you may ask questions and share your own thoughts and experiences with other beta testers as well as myself and a few of my friends who completed the alpha testing round.
I don't think I've ever seen a comprehensive program like this being offered for the price of a cup of coffee, or for free, no less. Many of them go for at least $100!
The program will commence with an introductory email on Sunday, June 5, 2016 to get you ready for Day 1 on Monday, June 6, 2016. Since #NETT90 is so simple, especially over the first few weeks, this campaign is set to run through Wednesday, June 8, 2016, because it will be easy for you to catch up.
Since I want to make #NETT90 free, there is not much else I could offer, though I suppose you could also consider helping me bypass the dreaded part of my actual job where I have to put on my salesperson hat. I happen to be a 12+ year veteran in the digital marketing space who specializes in organic search. I'm well-respected among my peers for my SEO (Search Engine Optimization) abilities, and over the years I have also immersed myself in related channels like social media, paid search, and conversion optimization.

Please don't use this campaign or my website as an example of my marketing proficiency. I haven't had the need to put much of any work into my website until recently. As for this Indiegogo campaign, it was a last minute idea, and I have less than two weeks before the beta run begins. I'm pretty much doing everything wrong when it comes to conventional marketing and "experts" would probably shake their heads at the way I'm going about here. With that said, while I've always been one to think outside the box, I also want to take the marketing aspect out of your health. That is the main reason why I want to launch this program for FREE.
I would love to make a career out of this, so I do want to make money from it, but not directly from  people who want to improve their health. While there's high value in the exchange of knowledge, a lot of what I have learned over the years has been made freely available by the generosity of experts who share the mindset to spread goodwill. Even so, one reason you may not be as aware of functional health practices is because all you need to implement them is yourself, and there's no money in that! Pharmaceutical companies certainly don't want you to know that you inherently possess the abilities to do what their pills do, gyms and trainers don't want you to know that you don't necessarily need them to reach your goals, and other programs and diets don't want you to learn exactly how and why they do or don't work (if they even know). Fortunately, I can perpetuate the generosity and utilize my skills in marketing to spread awareness of functional health for free while implementing other methods to generate income.
I take the same approach with digital marketing as I do with health. There are many practitioners who follow a single-minded approach or chase an irrelevant metric. A business' online presence is comprised of many intricate parts that only function optimally when they are all optimized properly and in sync with each other.
I am known for defining "holistic SEO":
A synergistic website marketing strategy that utilizes a variety of online channels and other related elements of marketing and web development in conjunction with search engine optimization (SEO).
A Great Deal for Businesses - 50% OFF!
I've been kicking around a new service and I'd like to offer it exclusively via this campaign for half off to see if I can get it off the ground. It's what I'm currently referring to as an SEO Brain Dump, which is exactly what it sounds like. I will spend an hour to analyze your web presence and provide you with any and all of the recommendations I can come up with to improve it.
My colleagues who provide a level of work comparable to mine post  hourly rates of $500 or more. I've been laying low over the past few years, so I have set my hourly rate at $300. Therefore, my offer here for my SEO Brain Dump is $150.
A Greater Deal for Health-Conscious Businesses - 50% OFF!
Over the past few years, I have also become a lot more conscious about the type of projects I work on and who I'm making money for. As I become more and more mindful of health and making a positive impact on the world, I want to do my best to align that with my business as well. So, for businesses that focus on functional health and/or green, eco-friendly, organic, sustainable offerings, I will discount my SEO Brian Dump service to a mere $100.
Where the Money Will Go
By selling my services at a deep discount, I will actually lose money with this campaign, unless a lot of people sign up for the beta run. However, since I'm developing #NETT90 on my own time, knowing I won't have to worry about putting on my sales hat to secure $2500 worth of work will basically allow me to spend more time on #NETT90 over the first month of the beta testing round. Whatever you can contribute will help!
Flex Goals
If this happens to catch on, $5000 will carry me through two months of being able to spend more time on #NETT90, and $7500 will carry me through to the end of the beta testing round!
My ultimate vision is to have #NETT90 bundled up into a full-featured app, so anything extra will go toward fulfilling that vision.
Other Ways You Can Help
If you don't have the means to contribute, but are desperate to get your health in gear, please feel free to contact me and I will grant you free access to the #NETT90 beta.
You can also help by making some noise about #NETT90 and sharing my vision with the world! Please share this page through your social media accounts and tell all of your friends and family about it (there are share buttons toward the top of this page that you may use). Everybody can benefit from better health!
My Health Influencers
I hold the following   professionals and experts in the realm of functional health in very high regard, and their work has greatly influenced me to develop #NETT90:




Abel James
Andreo Spina, DC
Ben Greenfield
Brad Pilon

story: <3

Don't Miss Our Special Offer!

$250 Limited to 50 Devices!


GreenVaro (Patent Pending. Application No. 15/088,658) is a comprehensive hardware and software system designed for complex environmental monitoring applications that alerts you when your environment is not safe.

14 dedicated sensors provide capabilities for collection and analysis of various environmental parameters, allowing for the results to be displayed on your smartphone and for the data to be transmitted to a server for further processing and monitoring.

GreenVaro differs from all known environmental monitoring solutions as it allows extensible integrated environmental monitoring of up to 14 parameters simultaneously. Moreover, the number of these parameters can be increased with additional sensors.

GreenVaro can be provided as a single block including some basic sensors or as a modular system with multiple sensors for collection and analysis of a wide range of different environmental factors.

Due to the system’s modular structure, the user can easily set the required sensor configuration, as well as upgrade or replace the actual sensor modules.

The software part of the system consists of a cloud solution and a mobile application that allows flexible access to information and provides opportunities for further server-side data analysis with results being displayed on the mobile application.

Since the system is an end-to-end hardware and software solution allowing data transmission via 3G, Bluetooth and Wi-Fi, it opens a variety of possible usage opportunities, including outdoor and indoor installations (e.g. in homes, restaurants, manufacturing facilities, etc.). Full access to the information can be provided through a mobile phone application or the system’s website.



                 

GreenVaro mobile application allows you to connect to the server via 3G Internet or Wi-Fi in order to provide full access to the expert data analysis system and tips and recommendations for improving environmental conditions in specific situations or according to the concentration of certain substances in the air.

  • Available for iOS and Android
  • Regular updates of environmental measurements
  • Measurements History Management via data transmission with the server
  • User alert feature when one of the parameters goes above or below the accepted range
  • Display of the analytical information from the expert system and recommendations for environmental conditions improvements
  • Management and configuration of the system and sensors
  • Interaction with smart watches based on iOS and Android (to be implemented)
  • Initialization of communication with the device with a special QR code (found on the actual device). The QR code contains a unique number of the device’s Bluetooth adapter (or other unique number). This number is used to ensure that the software only works with this specific device. Also at this stage, the user profile can be created on the system’s website.


GreenVaro was developed by Softarex Technologies, Inc., a global provider of full-cycle custom software engineering, data science, UX/UI design and IT consulting services headquartered in Alexandria, VA, USA. It operates in three locations worldwide: Alexandria and two R&D centers in Europe. The company specializes in a number of industry domains, including: Healthcare, Energy and Utilities, E-commerce, Internet of Things, Industry 4.0, eLearning and Manufacturing.

ALEXANDER LIPANOV – PRESIDENT & CEO

A seasoned executive with more than 15 years of broad international experience in software development, as well as product and project management for both start-ups and well-established international corporations.


ALEX CHELOMBITKO – VP HEALTHCARE & MOBILE DEVELOPMENT

Over 10 years of experience in managing and coordinating Java, C# and PHP projects. Alex is also responsible for architecture development and customer communication.

If you have any questions or require changes to your order, please contact us at info@softarex.com.



If you are a retailer interested in distribution partnership, please email us at: info@softarex.com. 



Our official website can be found at: http://greenvaro.com.


If you have any questions, please contact us at info@softarex.com.

story:
Diabetic Eyes are Unique!

Believe it or not, the pupils of individuals with diabetes act differently!

 

We can turn that "uniqueness" into some pretty amazing math.

With this math, we can determine whether your glucose is high, low, normal.

This "math" allows us to look at your pupil for eight (8) seconds, analyze those results, and show you results that will eliminate the need to lance your finger to get blood. 

So instead of the lance, you just glance!

And the results are shown to you on a simple phone app!

Why are we on Indiegogo?

It's all about patient safety! Translation, we need to go through a series of clinicial trials before we can release the product to market.  

These trials cost money!  A lot more than the mere $45K we are raising but this first tranche of money will fund our first clinicial trial and open the door to further development.  

This ultimately leads to our other FDA trials and your access to this device!

What are you getting for your donation?

Simple....knowing that someday (soon?) adults, children, and the elderly anywhere in the world may have a better chance of controlling their diabetes.

Your donation will allow us to conduct the most important phase of medical innovation, proof.

We have the math. We have the early bench studies. We have the prototypes.

All we need now is the data.

Your donation will also count toward the future purchase of GlucoSight. So, when you donate, we will keep your information and contact you when the product is available.  

Sounds like a deal for $10, right?

The End Game!

 Once all the trials are done and we can rightfully go to market (with the blessing of the FDA), we are planning on selling the GlucoSight solution as a SERVICE. Yup, you read that right!  Sign up for $10, pay $5/month and have UNLIMITED USE!!!!  No hassle. For the prices of a coffee, you can get the unlimited ability to test your blood sugar.

How is that for awesomeness?

Who are we?

We are a small team of scientists, doctors, and executives.

Ken Steinberg, Founder, Principal
Ken has over 30 years in medical technology including devices and software. Ken is a prolific innovator with patents in medical devices, cybersecurity, and data analytics.

His career spans a collection of personal startups and Fortune 100 companies such as Softbank, the National Science Foundation, GE, and Hitachi.

Jason Clark, Founder, Engineering
20 Year industry veteran with an extensive background in mechanical, electrical, and software engineering. Jason has developed numerous products ranging from medical devices to lighting to robotics.

Past Engagements include Navisite, Digital Realty, Cambridge Surgical Instruments, Cambridge Research

James Wilkie, Head of Regulatory Affairs
A medical industry executive with extensive experience in M&A, R&D, regulatory affairs and operations in biotech, catheter and surgical product companies.

Past engagements include companies such as Pluromed, Cambridge Surgical Instruments, ConMed Endoscopic Technologies, and Surgical Sealants

Advisors

John L. Brooks III
An industry stalwart with over two decades of work in diabetes including executive leadership at Joslin Diabetes Center, Pfizer, and Insulet.

Currently CEO at Arete Worldwide, Chairman of CellNova, and Board member at Hygieia.

Dan Grunberg, PhD EECS, MIT
Founder of and Chief Science Officer for Immedia Semiconductor and President of Chainwave Systems, Dan is well-known for his expertise in imaging.

Currently a principal at Apollo Partners specializing in health insurance services

Dave Hall
20 years of sales, marketing and business development experience in multiple verticals including manufacturing, medical device, IT consulting, electronic and industrial markets.

story:
ABOUT THE ALLN-1: Functional Fitness Bench
 


As a US Army Veteran, software architect and ISSA certified fitness trainer with over 30 years of first-hand software development, personal training, and competition fitness experience, I originally came up with the ALLN-1: Functional Fitness Bench idea when I operated my own fitness studio in San Diego.  And as an ex-competitive bodybuilder and personal trainer, I understand that to buy enough good equipment to thoroughly stock a fitness studio, can easily cost upwards of $30k.  So I spent the past 18 years with a goal to develop a single piece of fitness equipment that would 1) allow users to get an EFFECTIVE total body workout, 2) required minimal SPACE, 3) easy to continually UPGRADE and most importantly, 4) simple enough so that it’s EASY to teach others how to use it...while still being commercially durable.

As I got further along in development I began to realize it could do so much more if I incorporated my software architecting skills into designing the bench. 
 

​VIDEO: ALLN-1 Configuration Overview

 

Specifically, I set a goal of making the ALLN-1® modular, reusable, extensible and componentize.  And that's what I ultimately accomplished!

WHILE THE ALLN-1 WILL WORK FOR ANYONE...IT'S NOT FOR EVERYONE
Please watch this video to make sure its 110% right for you - because I really want you to be happy with your purchase!

 
See What it Can Do!

 

What We Need & What You Get

Today, I’m proud to say that I’m 90% complete and have done it at a fraction of the price, and because of its innovative design, it can be used in commercial fitness settings or at home! 


 

 

After 17 months of putting approximately 100k of my own sweat and skin in the game for this venture, then going through the process of developing, refining, consumer testing and obtaining sales and satisfied customers…it’s showtime and TrainChange Fitness needs to scale up.  
 

Video: ALLN-1 Total Booty Solution

 
 

As the sole owner of TrainChange Fitness, the buck always stops with me, and I am committed 110% to making the ALLN-1 an industry, disrupting success.  You can rest assured in knowing that when you partner with me by backing this venture, failure will not be an option, because continuous improvement is a MUST!

 

 

Risks & Challenges

The common, initial risk associated with developing a viable product and wondering if people will be interested has already been mitigated. 

I’m glad to say that I’ve received GREAT FEEDBACK and interest as the ALLN-1 Exercise Bench has begun to go viral on social media (and at the time of this writing, the campaign is scheduled to go live in 3 days and I've already received over 2,000 emails from people interested in  the ALLN-1!).    

However, I'm currently a  1 man operation with 2 contractors that assist me as sales come in, and have gotten this far using a JUST IN TIME operation model.  But, 7 to 10 business days is our normal processing time after an order has been received, and sometimes it can require every day to get it out on time.  And that needs to be improved. 

 

Video: ALLN-1 Overdrive Sled 

 

Like any startup company on the verge of growth, when we get more than 2-3 orders a week we aren’t poised to scale efficiently because all though we have all of the raw products in-house, we still have to package them up and do some preassembly which can easily become a bottlenecked thereby decreased customer satisfaction and product quality.  It’s a good and bad problem to have—I love seeing orders come in, and yet dread seeing orders come in.  So to get in front of, and resolve this problem, we’d like to create a slightly larger inventory of 100 ALLN-1 Benches and ALLN-1 Configuration Options on hand so that we can still run LEAN but scale our just-in-time model so that as orders come in we can ship within 24 hours, and start building others to replace the inventory. 

 

ORDER FULFILLMENT SCHEDULE


 

In exchange for helping us accomplish this next goal, we’ll be able to offer the ALLN-1 Exercise Bench and ALLN-1 Configuration Options at DISCOUNTED PRICES and in the form of UNIQUE PERKS to our backers.  For example, we’ll send you some of the actual prototype parts that we used in the beginning of the development process and possibly name a new Configuration Option after you!  So to get the ALLN -1 through the finish line, the price for the ALLN-1 Base Unit will start at just $219 or Buy 1 Get 1/2 OFF a Second (while the perk supplies last of course), during my crowdfunding campaign,  

The Impact

In closing, as a Lean Six Sigma Black Belt, I will still run a Lean operation, however, I will optimize purchasing, packaging, and shipping operations so that products will be shipped within 24 hours of being ordered.  Additionally, funds will be used to bring on additional part-time resources so that I can complete several other innovative ALLN-1 Exercise Bench Options that I haven’t been able to complete because I’ve been wearing all of the other hats in the business—and innovating, is really what I want to continue focusing on.    So, let’s change the fitness industry together!

 

ALLN-1 Exercise Bench h23

Other Ways You Can Help

And hey, we know that not everyone is in a place to make a monetary contribution, but if you're as excited about the ALLN-1 Exercise Bench as we are and you want to get involved, please share our link and if you're a member of a gym ask them to bring an ALLN-1 Exercise Bench on board!
story_txt:
ABOUT THE ALLN-1: Functional Fitness Bench 



As a US Army Veteran, software architect and ISSA certified fitness trainer with over 30 years of first-hand software development, personal training, and competition fitness experience, I originally came up with the ALLN-1: Functional Fitness Bench idea when I operated my own fitness studio in San Diego.  And as an ex-competitive bodybuilder and personal trainer, I understand that to buy enough good equipment to thoroughly stock a fitness studio, can easily cost upwards of $30k.  So I spent the past 18 years with a goal to develop a single piece of fitness equipment that would 1) allow users to get an EFFECTIVE total body workout, 2) required minimal SPACE, 3) easy to continually UPGRADE and most importantly, 4) simple enough so that it’s EASY to teach others how to use it...while still being commercially durable.


As I got further along in development I began to realize it could do so much more if I incorporated my software architecting skills into designing the bench.  
​VIDEO: ALLN-1 Configuration Overview

 
Specifically, I set a goal of making the ALLN-1® modular, reusable, extensible and componentize.  And that's what I ultimately accomplished!

WHILE THE ALLN-1 WILL WORK FOR ANYONE...IT'S NOT FOR EVERYONEPlease watch this video to make sure its 110% right for you - because I really want you to be happy with your purchase!

story:
I am a Registered Nurse, Certified Case Manager, and Geriatric Care Specialist in Jacksonville, FL. In my professional role as an elder care manager I see the need for our senior citizens to stay as strong and mobile as possible. When discussing issues such as falls, mental decline, and social isolation with other healthcare professionals and family members of seniors, I have decided to establish a fitness/wellness center (Active Living Fitness Center) that will concurrently address the fitness and social needs of our seniors.

  In the current reimbursement climate many seniors are prematurely discharged from formal rehabilitation programs (i.e. in-patient rehabilitation facilities, out-patient rehabilitation clinics, home health services, etc.) before fully recovering and returning to a safe functional status.

  The proposed fitness/wellness center will provide our senior citizens with a safe, non-intimidating environment for participation in fitness programs that are supervised by licensed health care professionals who are on-site at all times.

  In this venture I am partnering with my son, a Doctor of Physical Therapy, and other physical/occupational therapists. In addition, Active Living Fitness Center will also offer ongoing health/wellness educational programs, and will provide opportunities for social interaction between members. Education will also be integral to the overall success of promoting a more active lifestyle, with classes offered frequently by experts in different fields. Fitness classes, yoga, private personal training sessions and massage will also be available. A “Cool-Down Corner” with healthy refreshments and comfortable seating will provide the opportunity to relax, talk, watch TV and socialize with others during their time at the Studio. Drivers, care-givers, spouses, friends, etc. will also be able to utilize this area while our well trained staff helps the client complete their exercise regimen.

  The key to successfully exercising when challenged with health issues and advancing age is SAFETY. At Active Living Fitness Center, licensed healthcare professionals (RN’s, CNA’s, Physical Therapists, Licensed Physical Therapist Assistants, and Certified Personal Trainers trained in geriatric exercise) will assist with developing a customized exercise program for each client.

We are seeking to raise $15,000 to help fund Active Living Fitness Center. The studio will be open to those 55 yrs. and older, any adults with chronic medical issues, and also those with impairments that may limit their ability to join other fitness/wellness facilities such as:

·  Dementia (must be able to follow instructions with help)

·  Previous strokes

·  Cardiovascular and Respiratory Issues (MD approval must be given in writing to exercise first)

·  Neuromuscular Diseases/Problems

·  Bone and Joint Diseases/Problems

·  A desire to exercise in a safe, friendly, non-intimidating, full service fitness studio

Your generous support is desperately needed to help fund this innovative, safe haven for exercise in our community. We are committed to providing our seniors and those with other medical conditions and/or disability with a well-equipped, first class facility, staffed by licensed professionals and a compassionate staff.

Your donation is greatly appreciated, and may be made by check to:

Active Living Fitness Center

3948 South Third Street, Box #254

Jacksonville Beach, FL 32250

Or by donating online by going through the link on this Indiegogo page!

Thank you in advance for caring and helping. All donations will be appreciated. Donations greater than $1,000 will be recognized on our “Wall of Appreciation” at the fitness studio. Again, thank you.

Susan Brubaker, RN, CCM, LNC

Geriatric Care Manager

Scott Entsminger, PT, DPT, CMPT

Doctor of Physical Therapy

story:
Not An Autoimmune Disease

The possible leading cause of childhood type 1 diabetes is revealed in the digital book “The Curing and Prevention of Childhood Type 1 Diabetes.”  

Cost High

The danger of the dietary practice to children’s pancreatic beta cells has not been generally recognized.  It has resulted in a high incidence of childhood diabetes in European and North American countries and a skyrocketing rise in developing countries. 

Key Questions Answered

1.  Why was the incidence of CT1D in the United States 15 times higher than the rate in China between 1990 and 1994 when the WHO survey was conducted?

2.  Why is the average annual incidence rise in China 12 times higher that that  in the United States since the WHO survey was completed?  and 

3.  Why is the honeymoon phase of the disease always a short-lived stage?  

Helpful to All

The new hypothesis stands ready for the test. Once the dietary practice is changed,

1.  Newly diagnosed patients may be cured, 

2.  Patients in the honeymoon phase may never end; and

3.  Chronic patients may stop the progression of the disease. 

Supported Needed

Your contribution will be used in the interests of the public to

(1) Build a discussion website, and

(2) Make the book animated.

Concentration on Research

I have been doing all the research, website and publishing by myself so far. With your help, I can concentrate on my research with the holistic and integrative approach. 

My subsequent writings on other types of diabetes and obesity will be in the same style: independent, revolutionary and instructional.  

www.himedicine.com

story:
Healthcare is expensive—very expensive.

Now more than ever, we are challenged with increasing out of pocket costs for our medical care. But we have no easy way of predicting how much our care will cost. Imagine trying to buy a car or a house without any clue about prices. This is what it is like for most Americans before they receive medical care. Most of us enter the healthcare system blindly and don’t even have a ballpark estimate of the costs before getting our care. 

The Solution - www.OpRate.com

We've made a site that aims to disrupt the healthcare system by giving people true, unbiased data regarding healthcare expenses—BEFORE you get treated.

Why is our data collection method important to you? 

  • Unbiased data—no interference from hospitals or insurance companies 
  • Data collected is not purchased from anyone—it is data collected from people who are using our healthcare system
  • Data aims to provide total costs but also break down these costs for you so insurance costs and out of pocket expenses are plainly evident

We hope our site becomes a database of real healthcare expenses posted by real people.

How do we intend to collect this data?

This is where we NEED YOUR HELP!

Go to www.OpRate.com and tell us...

...your medical procedure

...where you had it done

...what insurance plan you used

...what you paid for your care

The more people who post this data the bigger the database. The bigger the database the closer we all get to achieving true healthcare cost transparency

Posting is FREE and ANONYMOUS.

This isn't about the money. Our main goal is accumulating your data.

Take a look at what we've set up for you:


The Ultimate Solution

With every post, our database becomes a powerful tool. A tool that will allow consumers to do what has never been easy to do before—make informed decisions about where to put their healthcare dollars. 

With your data we can answer questions about your care...

How much did folks pay for a cataract surgery in your hometown?

Will an MRI of your back be cheaper at one facility versus another?

Would it be cheaper with your insurance plan or a different plan?

OpRate wants to help answer these questions for you. 

But we need data in order to accomplish this ultimate goal. 

Be the Solution.

Be the first to participate in a transparent healthcare system by donating and posting your medical expenses.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share the love on Twitter: www.twitter.com/opratedotcom

Like the OpRate revolution on Facebook: www.facebook.com/opratedotcom

Follow the OpRate Team's posts on our blog: https://blog.oprate.com

And check us out on Medium too: https://medium.com/@TheOprateTeam

story:
Our first patient in Ecuador, Juan Suquillo, picking fruit native to his homeland.

 

Ret. US Army Sgt. Garrett Anderson lost his right arm due to a roadside bomb in Iraq. PSYONIC is working with him to build an affordable, advanced bionic arm with sensory feedback. Help 11.4 million people with amputations just like Sgt. Anderson

 

Our Story

When PSYONIC CEO and Co-Founder Dr. Aadeel Akhtar was 7 years old, he met an amputee for the first time. She was his age, living in poverty in Pakistan. At the time, he wondered how they could share the same ethnic heritage but have such vastly different qualities of life. As he grew older, he realized that this was due to a lack of resources. For that reason, he started PSYONIC, a company whose mission is to develop advanced prostheses that are affordable for everyone worldwide. Our team consists of neuroscientists, electrical engineers, mechanical engineers, and computer scientists from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

Find out more about us at http://www.psyonic.co

 

Our Impact

The most prevalent prosthetic hand in the world is a hook, technology that hasn’t changed since the 1800s and is unintuitive to control. State-of-the-art hands can be controlled through residual muscles, but cost up to $30000. They also break all the time, are still clumsy to control, and do not give the user any sensory feedback. PSYONIC’s hand solves all these problems while costing less than a tenth in raw materials compared to state-of-the-art commercially available hands.

This is our latest prototype. All 5 fingers can individually flex and extend and the thumb also rotates. Most commercially available hands are large and sized only for males. Ours is 50th percentile female-sized and weighs 20% less than an average human hand. It’s also USB-rechargeable.

 

The hand is controlled through muscle signals from the forearm that are processed by our muscle processing unit. We use a machine learning algorithm that can detect when the user is making different hand movements including hand close, hand open, a fine pinch, a three-finger grasp, and rest. After a quick 2-minute training session, the hand recognizes the different hand movements and responds accordingly.

 

NO commercially available bionic hand gives users useful sensory feedback. We give that ability back to users by using low-cost pressure sensors embedded in the fingertips. These sensors are in everyone’s cell phones and GPS devices, but we repurpose them as highly sensitive touch sensors. When the user touches an object, the skin is stimulated electrically, feeling like a tingling, vibration, or even pressure.

 

After interviewing dozens of clinicians and patients, we found that the number one problem with $30,000 bionic hands is that they are breaking all the time. Our fingers are made of polyurethane and silicone giving them compliance, which allows them to withstand blunt force impacts. Our experiments show that our compliant finger design absorbs at least 10x more energy on impact when compared to fingers using a conventional rigid finger design. In fact, our finger survived impact that not even a 1045 HR steel bar could withstand. Even though they’re flexible, each finger can still hold up to 38 pounds, and the assembled hand can hold over 50 pounds.

 

We’ve already enabled two people with below-elbow amputations with this technology. We met our first patient, Juan Suquillo, in 2014 in Ecuador. He had lost his left hand 30 years prior due to a border war between Ecuador and Peru. After only a couple hours of using one of our first prototypes, he felt as though a part of him had come back. We went back to Ecuador last year with a newer prototype. This was the first time he moved his new prosthesis on his own. He was also able to easily feel light and strong touch from the fingertips on his first try.

 

Earlier this year, we met with Juan again in Ecuador where he used our latest hand to drive a car and pick fruit native to his homeland.

 

In the US, we’ve enabled Retired Army Sgt. Garrett Anderson who lost his right hand due to a roadside bomb in Iraq in 2005. With our technology, he’s now able to grasp eggshells without cracking them while blindfolded. He’s also easily able to grasp cups of water, climb stairs, exercise, and hammer nails into wood.

 

Challenges

Our biggest challenge is getting FDA approval for our hand. Prosthetic hands are categorized as Class II medical devices, which will require at least 6-12 months of extensive testing and consulting in order to get approval. These costs can run up to $100,000. With your contribution, we can get this hand approved in the US, get it covered by insurance, and make it available to patients at no out-of-pocket cost. This will be a huge game changer in the prosthetics industry.

Another challenge is taking our hand from being university research to a commercial product. For that reason, we’ve spent the last 3 months in Shenzhen, China, the electronic hardware capital of the world, furthering our prototypes and optimizing manufacturing for the various components of our hand. To decrease our costs further and make our hand even more affordable for everyone worldwide, we need your help to purchase parts at volume so we can make our first 50 hands and get them on people as soon as possible.

We aim to finish our prototyping and product designs by the end of the year, to obtain FDA approval and insurance coverage in 2018, and to start selling in 2019.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need your help to make our technology available to the 11.4 million people with hand amputations worldwide. We are asking for $250,000 to help defray the costs of going through FDA approval, getting covered by insurance in the US, finishing our final prototypes, and manufacturing our first 50 hands. Twenty percent will also be going towards Indiegogo fees and rewards.

Our perks can be purchased on the right and are pictured below:

With your contribution, we can change the world, one hand at a time.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, you can still help!

  • Help us spread the word and let everyone know about our campaign.
  • Share our campaign on Facebook and Twitter the Indiegogo share tools, as well as Reddit, LinkedIn, Instagram, Google+, and others!
