Thanks in advance..."Garfield 


Natural health products' (NHP) capacity to address neurodegeneration is well documented in the scientific literature. This should not be surprising since the increase in neurodegenerative diseases followed revolutionary changes in Western diets that resulted in an exponential rise in the consumption of highly processed foods, which either lack the appropriate nutrients for long-term support of the central nervous system (CNS) and systemic metabolic functions, or contain added ingredients that impair protective actions of natural food substances. (Moving forward with nutrition in Alzheimer's disease. Scheltens, 2009)Current research in academia are leading to a greater understanding of the underlying pathologies causing many
neurodegenerative diseases including Alzheimer's disease (AD), Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS), Multiple Sclerosis (MS) and Parkinson’s disease. Implicated in the pathogenesis of neurodegenerative diseases, is the compromise of the Mitochondria via an overproduction of reactive oxygen species (ROS), which leads to oxidative damage. ROS (e.g. superoxides and hydrogen peroxide) are created during respiration - the process by which cells convert the nutrients we consume into energy, specifically Adenosine triphosphate (ATP). Respiration itself takes place in the Mitochondria.
Impairment of the Mitochondria leads to reduce ATP production and increased ROS production. This in turn leads to cellular inflammation, protein aggregation,  mutant DNA formation, as well as other neurodegenerations. As a result of these neurodegenerative processes, the body's own immune system get turned against the impaired neuronal cells, causing further damages that can lead to neuronial demyelination and eventually cell death. (Mitochondrial Medicine for Aging and Neurodegenerative Diseases.
Reddy, 2008; Is multiple sclerosis a mitochondrial disease? Mao et al., 2009). 
Another fascinating finding from preclinical research is that excessive cholestrol build-up in brain tissue resembles early stage Alzheimer's disease (Increasing membrane cholesterol of neurons in culture recapitulates Alzheimer’s disease early phenotypes. Marquer et al. 2014)
Interestingly, if neurogenerative diseases are actual metabolic diseases, it's possible that they have their origins not in the brain, but rather in a distant organ, namely the liver. Ceramides build-up in the liver can migrate to the brain where it causes insulin insensitivity. Insulin is an extremely important hormone that's produced in the pancreas and which is involved in numerous metabolic processes, including ATP production in the Mitochondria  (Sphingolipids, insulin resistance, and metabolic disease: new insights from in vivo manipulation of sphingolipid metabolism.  Holland et al. 
2008).
Ceramides are are a family of waxy lipid molecules containing, sphingolipids, which are toxic to neuronal cells. They are lipid signaling molecules that causeinsulin resistance by activating pro-inflammatory cytokines. (Insulin-like growth factor-1-dependent maintenance of neuronal metabolism through the phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase-Akt pathway is inhibited by C2-ceramide in CAD cells. Gibson 2007) 
A final note on ceramides, if you have neurodegeneration and don't think ceramides are implicated, you may want to answer this question. Do you have Nonalcoholic Fatty Liver Disease (NFLD); this is where you have an apparent beer belly without being a major beer drinker? NFLD is a dysfunction of the liver, and long before your gut started protruding, your liver was pumping out ceramides into your brain, (Role of Ceramides in Nonalcoholic Fatty Liver Disease Pagadala et al. 2012)
That initial insulin insensitivity brought on by the invading ceramides from the liver could be what starts the entire neurodegeneration cascade. That nudge causes the Mitochondria to misfire like a sputtering engine producing too much smoke (ROS) for the antioxidants in the cells to extinguish and not enough power (ATP) to give each cellular component enough energy to execute their respective tasks (the brain only makes up 2% of our body mass, but consumes 20% of the energy our body produces). Once the process builds up steam, it becomes like a runaway train or an avalanche.

 

Why should you believe that we can successfully complete this project?
Well, in one word... EXPERIENCED! Put simply, we have traveled this developmental pathway before, successfully. COORGA Nutraceuticals is one of the relative few US registered dietary supplements developers with products sold in stores in Canada. This is because all natural health products (NHP) legally sold in Canada must first receive a license from Health Canada. Before such license are granted, the NHP undergoes an extensive review to assess both its efficacy and safety. 
Health Canada is widely regarded as one of the toughest regulators of NHP with an approval rate of 40% as of 2010, the last time figures were available.COORGA Nutraceuticals has developed some innovative treatments in the past despite an environment replete with naysayers. 



TumorDefence™, is a NHP we developed as an adjuvant treatment for chemo and radiation therapy, with an indication for fighting cancer metastasis. It employs the body's own immune capacity to fight tumor growth. TumorDefence™ is currently undergoing Health Canada evaluation for sale in Canada. 
**Those looking for an effective therapeutic tool to complement  their current treatment regime to target tumors, should check out the "I hate Cancer"  perk to the right.**

Our product brainJOLT!™, was first developed for a good friend who was always complaining about feeling incredibly fatigued, unfortunately, she has since been diagnosed with Multiple Sclerosis. She is also the reason we decided to tackle the problem of neurodegeneration; we have no desired to see her confined to a wheelchair, especially not when we have the capabilities to prevent it from happening. brainJOLT!™ worked so well for her that we expanded its capabilities to boost short-term working memory among other things. Today brainJOLT!™  is the only  NHP approved by Health Canada  with an indication to boost working memory, not just the wish-washy claim of "supporting" working memory, our product actually boosts it.
** Do you have a neurodegenerative disease that leaves you fatigued all the time? Then check 
out the featured perk  "Perk Me Up, I am Fatigued" to the right.**

Finally, we were the first to develop a dietary supplement (Grey Defence®)
 shown to reverse greying, for which we have a US patent. This product 
was also approved by Health Canada to re-mediate cellular oxidative 
stress and lipid peroxidation caused by reactive oxygen species (ROS). This product works best for people who started greying within 7 years of when they started using it. Essentially, normal greying is due to oxidative stress and lipid peroxidation caused by ROS (specifically, hydrogen peroxide) build-up at the base of the hair follicle. The hydrogen peroxide (H2O2) bleaches the follicle as it grows while preventing the hair from being able to repair itself. Removing the H2O2 stops these processes and since the hair follicle is still producing melanin, hair color returns overtime. For those following closely, you will note the similarity in terms of ROS dysfunction remediation approved for Grey Defence® as those proposed herein. The main difference being that Grey Defence® targets oxidative stress in hair follicle cells, while the multi-functional therapeutic agent will target oxidative stress in neuronal cells.


Despite the achievements listed above, you should be aware that the FTC has sued COORGA Nutraceuticals and its principals, claiming there is no scientific basis for our products. Yeah... we don't understand their thinking either, even if they think our conclusions are wrong (though they aren't), this still does not make what we are doing not science. After all science, is a methodology, that's why it's oft referred to as the scientific method (oh well. maybe they think we are 
doing voodoo or something else magical). At any rate, we have refused their offer to settle out of court and are aggressively defending our products and our good name in court.

It's important to keep in mind that this project is one that is a research and development (R&D) effort. R&D by its nature is risky and this one is no different. Specific risks to consider are: 

 The inability to overcome the inherent limitations of the compounds in question, as a result, failing in our effort to optimize their oral bioavailability to create an enhanced bioparticle that survives travel through the digestive system. Even if we create an enhance bioparticle, this particle may be such that it fails to transit the blood brain barrier (BBB). Failure to transit the BBB means that the bioparticle would not be able to get into the neurons to deliver its payloads.
Even if the bioparticle is efficient at transiting the BBB and releasing its payload, that payload may be ineffective in initiating any useful therapeutic effects with regard to neurodegeneration.
Finally, even if the bioparticle efficiently transit the BBB, delivers an effective payload that remediate certain aspects of neurodegeneration, the bioparticle itself or the compounds it contains, may be cytotoxic, making it a poor therapy overall.

To address these risks and challenges we have divided the overall project into four (4) primary phases outlined below.
 

PHASE ONE
BioParticle Development
Budget: $20,000

In this first phase of the project, we will seek to develop a highly orally bioavailable bioparticle containing Trehalose.  
In lab experiments on animal models, the injection of Trehalose has been shown to significantly increase autophagy. Trehalose is the sugar used to sweeten chewing gum. Unfortunately, when taken orally, it is broken down within the stomach, the intestine and blood serum to glucose, loosing any inherent therapeutic value long before it can get anywhere near the central nervous system.  
Autophagy is how cells rid themselves of unwanted debris such as damaged proteins, microorganisms, etc.
Trehalose is aggressively digested and converted into glucose, this occurs in the stomach, the intestines and blood serum. Oral supplementation with Trehalose leads to negligible serum/cellular bioavailability. 
The goal of this initial step is to develop a biocompatible, bioavailable particle that mostly survives the journey through the digestive tract intact. 
Milestone: 
1) Lab report from third party lab showing whether the bioparticles successfully exists the digestive tract and enters the body proper.

PHASE TWO
Bio-Particle Optimization 
Budget: $25,000
The molecules of natural health products are not renown for their ability to transist the BBB because they are generally too large and too insoluble. Big pharma employs techniques such as nanorization (particle size in the nanometer range) and surface modifications to make drugs better able to transit the BBB, these techniques are well documented in the scientific literature.
Neuronal cells are cordon off by the BBB and presents a challenge for NHP compounds to transit.  

The goal of this phase is to optimize the bioparticle such that it can efficiently transit the BBB. As in the previous phase, we will be drawing heavily on well documented pharmaceutical manufacturing techniques to help us optimized the bioparticle for efficient BBB transit.
Milestone: Third party Lab reports using animal models to:
1) Optimized bioparticle that transits the BBB. 
2) Pharmacokinetic study assessing the toxicological profile of the
Optimized bioparticle.


PHASE THREE
Fully Multi-functional Therapeutic Agent (MfT-A)
Budget: $90,000

One very important conclusion that can be drawn from a review of current research in neurodegenerative diseases is that the concept of using mono-therapy (a Big Pharma preference, using patented compounds) to treat neurodegernation is wrong, and instead, multiple targets must be attacked simultaneously and over a prolonged period of time. (Why pleiotropic interventions are needed for Alzheimer's disease, Frautschy et al. 2010).This is where the multi-functional therapeutic agent comes in.
In this phase of the project, the previously optimized bioparticles will be complexed with other compounds to develop a multi-functional therapeutic agent to slow, stop and/or reverse the underlying pathological pathways that leads to neurodegeneration.
Specifically we will be adding Superoxide Dismutase (SOD), Curcumin, Catalase and thirty additional compounds to the original Trehalose bioparticle.
Neurodegeneration does not have only one causatory element, therefore attacking only on a single dimension (e.g. aberrant inflammatory response) will not be sufficient. The problem needs to be attacked from multiple angles to reflect the multiple pathways to possible dysfunctions (e.g. oxidative stress, protein & DNA mutation, aberrant inflammation, demyelation, impaired autophagy, insulin resistance, transition metal ions build-up, cholesterol build-up, liver ceramides build-up, activated microglia macrophages, etc.). The additional thirty plus compounds were selected because in preclinical or clinical research they showed either a moderate to significant impact on one of these causative elements. 
In this phase we will broaden out the therapy to include additional key natural compounds that addresses additional areas that leads to neurodegeneration. 
Milestone: 
1) Multi-functional therapeutic agent. 
2) Toxicology safety report on multi-functional therapeutic agent.
PHASE FOUR
Assess Multi-functional Therapeutic Agent Against Disease Models
Budget: (see sub-phase)
Sub-phase
a) Alzheimer's disease = $150,000
b) Multiple Sclerosis = $75,000

This, the validation stage is where the rubber hits the road. In this phase we try to answer the question as to whether the multi-functional therapeutic agent we developed through phases 1 - 3 is able to preform as an effective advanced neuroprotectant & neurodegeneration remediator.  To help us to answer this question we will employ two (2) classical models of neurodegeneration, namely the Alzheimer's disease animal model and the Multiple Sclerosis disease animal model
The multi-functional therapeutic agent (MfT-A) will be a dietary supplement not a drug, as a result, there are legal restrictions placed on what can be claimed. 
In the US, a dietary supplement cannot claim to prevent, treat or cure any specific disease. 
In Canada, all dietary supplements must receive pre-approval from Health Canada before they can be sold. As a result of this more rigorous approval process, dietary supplements (NHPs) are permitted to make disease prevention, treatment and cure claims to the general public. However, Canada has a blanket prohibition on any drug, device, food or NHP from making any treatment or cure claims covering a limited list of diseases found on Schedule A of the Canadian Food and Drug Act, these are generally referred to as Schedule A Diseases. Prohibitions notwithstanding, with approval, a NHP may be permitted to make disease prevention claims for a Schedule A disease. Please note, these prohibitions on Schedule A diseases are only for marketing and advertising to the general public and do not apply to health care practitioners (e.g. doctors, pharmacists, etc.). 
The goal, therefore, of the preclinical studies will be to assess whether the MfT-A have any impact on the underlying neurodegeneration that can cause these diseases and not whether it treats the diseases themselves. 

Therefore the questions we hope to answer in each mouse model concerning the neurodegeneration are:
Does the MfT-A accelerate the removal of mutant/damage proteins, damaged or inactivated mitochondria, etc.?

Does the MfT-A reduce oxidative stress and lipid peroxidation markers?
Does the MfT-A reduces the markers for aberrant inflammation and inappropriate cytokine activation?

Does the MfT-A enhances remyelation of neuronal cells?

Does the MfT-A reduces the amount of ceramides present in the brain?

Does the MfT-A bring about an increase in the average survival time of treated animals as compared to controls?

Does the MfT-A bring about an improvement in social measures for the animals (more happy, energetic, etc.)?

What is the appropriate dose to see an impact (low, medium, high)?

Milestone: Lab reports answering the questions above on each disease state reviewed.



Checkout the free ONLINE COGNITIVE HEALTH SUMMIT 2015 an industry forum event that we recommend anyone who is interested in this topic to review. There are many insightful presentations that you will benefit from. This event is not associated with our company in any way.

story:
FRANÇAIS - ENGLISH

The technology developed by FYN™ and implanted in GENOME™ fin has the ambition to be part of surf evolution in providing more performance and surfing sensations than never before.

The innovation of this new generation of surf fin resides in the "ADAPTIVE & DYNAMICS ATTACK & CAMBER" technology developed by FYN(Patent n°14/02226).

This concept works as a smart rudder or a wing modern plane, that modifies and adjusts its attack angle to follow the trajectory sought.

GENOME fin adapts itself to various phases, turns or accelerations of the surfer on waves. This aeronautics system, unique and patented, optimizes the profile and the direction angle of the fin by combining ideally the properties of five materials that compose it.


The auto-orientability of the GENOME reduce the distance necessary to perform a move. Indeed the fin adapts itself at the movement generated by the surfer during a curve,  during a below wave move or a radical up move.


The adaptive camber of GENOME allows to offer extreme hangs during radical curves.

All of this, associated at a minimal loss of energy, provides to the surfer an optimal speed for an amazing return to the top of the wave.


In rapid waves sections, when the surfer sticks to the wave in research of speed, the lesser component of vertical skid is exploited by the fin to propels the surfer.


The "ADAPTIVE & DYNAMICS ATTACK & CAMBER" technology integrates a unique property: each laterals movements applied at GENOME is transcribed in projection. A surfer performing a pump movement will be powered as never before! GENOME acts like a caudal shark or a dolphin fin, that provides an animal surf sensation.


During the paddling, the alternative movements of arms generates natural ondulations that, associated with the fin, create a movement pushing forward: ideal before the take-off or during a fast placement to the peak.


During a fall, or in too crowded surf spot, the classic fin is the first enemy for a surfer. That's why, in agreement with the efficiency, we can offer a safe product.

That is possible through:

- an articulate shape

- a smooth and flex skin

- fuzes parts that protect the surfer from his board and possible impacts and his fin fixation box.


Made of technical materials, GENOME ensures an amazing hydrodynamic quality and a durability.

Optimized to withstand wear and impacts, GENOME will give you best sensations and performances for a long time!



Risk and challenges

Together with our industrial technology specialists network, we have developed a product 100% made in France, efficient, durable and eco-friendly.



Our story

At the beginning, we were far from considering the invention of a new type of surf fin, since there is already a lot of models and we did not claim to be able to do better than what exists. We were just curious to understand how our fins work; to take the best of our sessions. Each answer generated even more questions and we realized that a dynamic aspect seemed relevant in the evolution of fins. To go to the end of our idea, we applied this principle in a series of prototypes to validate this. To objectively measure the efficiency of ADAC SYSTEM ™, we made comparative tests in wake-surfing conditions with a constant wave for better measures, results were clear: this new type of fin provides natural dynamics trajectories and purely instinctive pulses! It was just impossible to go back to our static fins! So we decided to share this feeling and create an evolved version, that met all the expectations of new sensations a surfer is looking for: FYN™ and his GENOME™ starts here.


Why we need you!

Surfing is a passion, a sport, a work for some! It has to evolve, mutate, to improve to provide more feelings of pleasure and moments to share.

For us it's important to share this adventure with the surfing community, to contribute at his expansion, by making our dream part in the surf evolution.

To complete this adventure of GENOME, all contributions: professionals, amateurs, beginners, are essentials for FYN. Give us your opinion and share our project on social networks and on your spot!


What is already done

The technical development is now completed, the technology was validated, patented (Patent No. 14 / 02,226) and the model registered (No. 15/1713).

Industrial prototypes are currently in final testing, pre-order your GENOME and receive it in June 2015.



Why use Indiegogo to pre-order?

Indiegogo will allow you to participate in the project and ensure its production! You can already pre-order your FYN fin and receive it immediately after the first production (June 2015), to enjoy this summer!

Contribute now and pre-order your GENOME!

GENOME interested in? Visit our YouTube channel where you can find videos and demonstrations, all you need to understand the ADAC SYSTEM.


FOLLOW US

      


FRANÇAIS - ENGLISH
___________________________________________________________________________

La  technologie  implantée dans l'aileron GENOME™ de FYN™  a l'ambition de s'inscrire dans l'évolution du surf, en procurant une performance optimale et une sensation de glisse hors du commun, jamais atteinte auparavant.

L'innovation de cette nouvelle génération d'aileron de surf réside dans la technologie " ADAPTIVE & DYNAMICS ATTACK & CAMBER " développée par FYN  (Patent n°14/02226). 

Cet aileron innovant fonctionne comme une aile d'avion moderne qui modifie sa forme et ajuste son angle d'attaque selon la trajectoire recherchée. 

L'aileron GENOME s'adapte ainsi aux diverses phases, virages ou accélérations du surfeur sur la vague. Ce système aéronautique, unique et breveté, optimise le profil et la direction de l'aileron, en combinant idéalement les propriétés des 5 matériaux qui le composent.


L'auto-orientation du GENOME réduit la distance nécessaire à n'importe quel surf pour effectuer une manœuvre. En effet, l'aileron s'adapte au mouvement généré par le surfeur lors d'une courbe, aussi bien en bas de vague que lors d'une manœuvre radicale en haut de vague.


Le cambre adaptatif du GENOME lui permet d'offrir une accroche extrême lors des courbes radicales.

Ces avantages, associés à une perte minimale d'énergie, confèrent au surfeur une vitesse incroyable lors d'un retour en haut de vague.


Dans les sections de vagues rapides, lorsque le surfeur colle à la paroi en recherche de vitesse, la moindre composante de dérapage vertical est exploitée par l'aileron de FYN et propulse le surfeur.


La technologie " ADAPTIVE & DYNAMICS ATTACK & CAMBER " possède une propriété unique : chaque mouvement latéral appliqué au GENOME est retranscrit en projection vers l'avant! Un surfeur effectuant un mouvement de pompe se verra alors propulsé comme jamais! GENOME agit comme une nageoire caudale de requin ou de dauphin, ce qui procure une sensation de glisse animale!


Lors de la rame, les mouvements alternés des bras génèrent naturellement des ondulations qui, associées à l'aileron, produisent une composante de propulsion. Il s’agit d’un apport idéal avant le take-off ou lors d'un placement rapide vers le pic.


Lors d'une chute, ou dans un spot fréquenté, l'aileron classique est l'ennemi numéro 1 du surfeur. C’est pourquoi nous proposons un produit hautement sécuritaire tout en étant extrêmement performant, notamment grâce à :

- une structure articulée ;

- une peau en matière souples ; 

- des pièces fusibles protégeant ainsi le corps du surfeur mais aussi sa  planche lors de collisions pouvant arracher les boîtiers de fixation.


Constitué de matériaux issus de l'aéronautique, GENOME assure une hydrodynamique et une durabilité de qualité « marine ». 

Optimisé mécaniquement pour résister à l'usure et validé sur banc d’essais de fatigue,  le GENOME atteindra un niveau de performance et vous fera vivre des sensations de glisse inégalées pendant longtemps!



Risques et défis

Grâce à notre réseau de spécialistes en techniques industrielles et en matériaux, nous avons pu développer un produit fabriqué 100 % en France, performant, durable et écoresponsable.


Notre histoire

Au début, nous étions loin d'envisager l'invention d'un nouveau type d'aileron, car il en existait déjà de nombreux modèles et nous n'avions pas la prétention de pouvoir faire mieux que ce que le marché proposait. Nous étions simplement curieux d'approfondir notre compréhension du fonctionnement des ailerons qui équipent nos planches, afin de profiter au mieux de nos sessions. Le travail opposé des ailerons latéraux, ainsi que la traînée engendrée par leurs angles soulevaient chez nous des questionnements. Chaque réponse amenait de nouvelles questions et nous avons pris conscience que la dynamique des ailerons devait être revue afin que ceux-ci évoluent de manière optimale. Afin d'aller au bout de notre réflexion, nous avons donc appliqué ce principe dans une série de prototypes pour valider ce constat. Pour mesurer objectivement l'efficacité de l’ADAC SYSTEM™, des tests comparatifs ont été effectués en wake surf sur des conditions de vague constante pour de meilleures mesures. Le résultat fut sans appel : ce nouveau type d'aileron procurait une dynamique naturelle de trajectoires grâce à ses impulsions purement instinctives! Il était impossible pour nous de revenir à des ailerons classiques! Nous avons donc naturellement décidé de partager cette découverte et d’en créer une version évoluée répondant à toutes les attentes d'un surfeur en recherche de nouvelles sensations. C’est ici que commence l’histoire de FYN et de son GENOME.


Pourquoi nous avons besoins de vous!

Le surf est une passion, un sport, même un métier pour certains! Il se doit d'évoluer, de s'améliorer, pour fournir toujours plus de sensations de plaisir et de moments de partage.

Pour nous, il est essentiel de partager cette aventure avec la communauté surf et de contribuer à son expansion, en apportant notre part de rêve dans l'évolution du surf.

Nous sollicitons votre contribution dans le but de maximiser l’expérience de GENOME. Toutes les contributions, de professionnels, d'amateurs, ou de débutants sont précieuses pour FYN. Donnez-nous votre avis et partagez notre projet via les réseaux sociaux et sur vos spots!


Ce que nous avons déjà fait

Le développement technique du produit est désormais terminé; la technologie a été testée, validée, brevetée (Patent n°14/02226), et le modèle déposé (n°15/1713).

Les premiers prototypes industriels sont actuellement en phase de test final. 

Si vous souhaitez participer à ces tests, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter pour recevoir votre exemplaire de test et contribuer à l'évolution du projet.


Ce qu'il nous reste à faire

Nous en sommes bientôt à la phase de production, avec la création du premier moule pour la production à grande échelle. 

La mise au point du packaging écologique, du site web de vente en ligne, ainsi que les accords de distribution en points de ventes spécialisés sont en cour. Si vous souhaitez faire partie des premiers points de ventes officiels de cette nouvelle génération d'ailerons, vous pouvez participer au projet en tant que partenaire surf-shop ou shaper.

Vous pouvez dès à présent précommander votre GENOME, vous le recevrez en juin 2015.



Pourquoi passer par Indiegogo?

Indiegogo vous permettra de participer concrètement au projet et d'assurer son aboutissement! Ce site vous permet également de réserver votre aileron FYN et de le recevoir immédiatement après sa première mise en production (Juin 2015), et donc d'en profiter cet été!

Contribuez maintenant et précommandez votre GENOME!

« ... Prendre des risques, c'est accroître ses chances de gagner. C'est vrai d'une personne comme d'une entreprise. Pour cela, il faut affronter la peur: celle de l'échec, de la faillite, ou, pour un sportif, celle de la chute et de la défaite. C'est la prise de risque matérialisée par les nouveaux projets de recherche en laboratoire qui permet la découverte, l'invention et, en définitive, l'innovation, bénéfique pour la société tout entière... »        

Extrait de  Surfer la vie  de  Joël DE ROSNAY 


Intéressé par GENOME? Consultez notre chaîne YouTube où vous trouverez des vidéos explicatives des démonstrations et tout ce qu'il faut pour comprendre la technologie ADAC SYSTEM.


SUIVEZ-NOUS
story_txt:
FRANÇAIS - ENGLISH



The technology developed by FYN™ and
implanted in GENOME™ fin has the ambition to be part
of surf evolution in providing more
performance and surfing sensations than never before.



The innovation of this new
generation of surf fin resides in the "ADAPTIVE & DYNAMICS ATTACK & CAMBER" technology developed by FYN(Patent n°14/02226).
This concept works as a smart
rudder or a wing modern plane, that modifies and adjusts its attack angle to follow the trajectory sought.
GENOME
fin adapts itself to
various phases, turns or accelerations of the surfer on waves. This aeronautics
system, unique and patented, optimizes the profile and the direction
angle of the fin by combining ideally the properties of five materials that
compose it.



The auto-orientability of the
GENOME reduce the distance necessary to perform a move. Indeed the fin adapts itself at the movement generated by the surfer during
a curve,  during a below wave move or a
radical up move.



The adaptive camber of GENOME
allows to offer extreme hangs during radical curves.
All of this, associated at a
minimal loss of energy, provides to the surfer an optimal speed for an amazing
return to the top of the wave.



In rapid waves sections, when
the surfer sticks to the wave in research of
speed, the lesser component of vertical skid is exploited by the fin to propels the surfer.





The "ADAPTIVE & DYNAMICS ATTACK & CAMBER" technology integrates a unique property: each laterals movements applied at
GENOME is transcribed in projection. A surfer performing a pump movement will be powered as never before! GENOME acts like a caudal
shark or a dolphin fin, that provides an animal surf sensation.



During the paddling, the
alternative movements of arms generates
natural ondulations
that, associated with the fin, create a movement pushing forward: ideal before the take-off or during a fast placement to
the peak.



During a fall, or in too crowded
surf spot, the classic fin is the first enemy for a surfer. That's why, in agreement with the efficiency, we can
offer a safe product.
That is possible through:
- an articulate shape
- a smooth and flex skin
- fuzes parts that protect the
surfer from his board and possible impacts
and his fin fixation box.



Made of technical materials, GENOME ensures an amazing hydrodynamic
quality and a durability.
Optimized to withstand wear and impacts, GENOME will give
you best sensations and performances for a long time!


Risk and challenges

Together with our industrial
technology specialists network, we have developed a product 100% made in
France, efficient, durable and eco-friendly.
Our story


At the beginning, we were far from considering the invention of a new type of
surf fin, since there is already a lot of models and we did not claim to be
able to do better than what exists. We were just curious to
understand how our fins work; to take the best of our
sessions. Each answer generated even more questions and we
realized that a dynamic aspect seemed relevant in the evolution of fins. To go
to the end of our idea, we applied this principle in a series of prototypes to
validate this. To objectively measure the efficiency of ADAC SYSTEM ™, we made comparative tests in wake-surfing conditions
with a constant wave for better measures, results were clear: this new type of
fin provides natural dynamics trajectories and purely instinctive pulses! It
was just impossible to go back to our static fins! So we decided to share this
feeling and create an evolved version, that met all the expectations of new
sensations a surfer is looking for: FYN™ and
his GENOME™ starts here.

Why we need you!

Surfing is a passion, a sport, a work for some! It has
to evolve, mutate, to improve to provide more feelings of pleasure and moments
to share.
For us it's important to share this adventure with the
surfing community, to contribute at his expansion, by making our dream part in
the surf evolution.
To complete this adventure of GENOME, all contributions: professionals, amateurs, beginners, are essentials for FYN.
Give us your
opinion and share our project on social networks and on your spot!
What is already done

The technical development is now completed, the technology
was validated, patented (Patent No. 14 / 02,226) and the model registered (No.
15/1713).
Industrial prototypes are currently in final testing,
pre-order your GENOME and receive it in June 2015.

Why use Indiegogo to pre-order?

Indiegogo will allow you to participate in the project
and ensure its production! You can already
pre-order your FYN fin and receive it immediately after the first production
(June 2015), to enjoy this summer!
Contribute now and pre-order your GENOME!
GENOME interested in? Visit our YouTube channel where
you can find videos and demonstrations, all you need to understand the ADAC
SYSTEM.


FOLLOW US

      

FRANÇAIS - ENGLISH
___________________________________________________________________________
La  technologie  implantée
dans l'aileron GENOME™ de FYN™  a l'ambition de s'inscrire dans
l'évolution du surf, en procurant une performance optimale et une sensation de
glisse hors du commun, jamais atteinte auparavant.
L'innovation
de cette nouvelle génération d'aileron de surf réside dans la technologie " ADAPTIVE & DYNAMICS ATTACK & CAMBER " développée par FYN  (Patent
n°14/02226). 
Cet aileron innovant fonctionne comme
une aile d'avion moderne qui modifie sa forme et ajuste son angle d'attaque selon
la trajectoire recherchée. L'aileron GENOME s'adapte
ainsi aux diverses phases, virages ou accélérations du surfeur sur la
vague. Ce système aéronautique, unique et breveté,
optimise le profil et la direction de l'aileron, en combinant idéalement
les propriétés des 5 matériaux qui le composent.





L'auto-orientation
du GENOME réduit la distance nécessaire à n'importe quel surf pour effectuer
une manœuvre. En effet, l'aileron s'adapte au mouvement généré par le surfeur
lors d'une courbe, aussi bien en bas de vague que lors d'une manœuvre radicale
en haut de vague.




Le
cambre adaptatif du GENOME lui permet d'offrir une accroche extrême lors des
courbes radicales.
Ces avantages, associés à une perte minimale
d'énergie, confèrent au surfeur une vitesse incroyable lors d'un retour en haut
de vague.





Dans les sections de vagues rapides,
lorsque le surfeur colle à la paroi en recherche de vitesse, la moindre
composante de dérapage vertical est exploitée par l'aileron de FYN et propulse
le surfeur.




La technologie " ADAPTIVE & DYNAMICS ATTACK & CAMBER " possède une propriété unique :
chaque mouvement latéral appliqué au GENOME est retranscrit en projection vers
l'avant! Un surfeur effectuant un mouvement de pompe se verra alors propulsé
comme jamais! GENOME agit comme une nageoire caudale de requin ou de
dauphin, ce qui procure une sensation de glisse animale!




Lors de la rame, les mouvements alternés
des bras génèrent naturellement des ondulations qui, associées à l'aileron,
produisent une composante de propulsion. Il s’agit d’un apport idéal avant le
take-off ou lors d'un placement rapide vers le pic.




Lors d'une chute, ou dans un spot
fréquenté, l'aileron classique est l'ennemi numéro 1 du surfeur. C’est
pourquoi nous proposons un produit hautement sécuritaire tout en étant
extrêmement performant, notamment
grâce à :
- une
structure articulée ;
- une peau en
matière souples ; 
- des pièces fusibles protégeant ainsi
le corps du surfeur mais aussi sa  planche lors de collisions pouvant
arracher les boîtiers de fixation.






Constitué de matériaux issus
de l'aéronautique, GENOME assure une hydrodynamique et une durabilité de
qualité « marine ». 
Optimisé mécaniquement pour résister à
l'usure et validé sur banc d’essais de fatigue,  le GENOME atteindra un
niveau de performance et vous fera vivre des sensations de glisse inégalées pendant
longtemps!






Risques et défis


Grâce à notre réseau de spécialistes en
techniques industrielles et en matériaux, nous avons pu développer un produit
fabriqué 100 % en France, performant, durable et écoresponsable.



Notre histoire

Au début, nous étions loin
d'envisager l'invention d'un nouveau type d'aileron, car il en existait déjà de
nombreux modèles et nous n'avions pas la prétention de pouvoir faire mieux que
ce que le marché proposait. Nous étions simplement curieux d'approfondir notre
compréhension du fonctionnement des ailerons qui équipent nos planches, afin de
profiter au mieux de nos sessions. Le travail opposé des ailerons latéraux,
ainsi que la traînée engendrée par leurs angles soulevaient chez nous des
questionnements. Chaque réponse amenait de nouvelles questions et nous avons
pris conscience que la dynamique des ailerons devait être revue afin
que ceux-ci évoluent de manière optimale. Afin d'aller au bout de notre réflexion, nous avons donc appliqué ce
principe dans une série de prototypes pour valider ce constat. Pour mesurer
objectivement l'efficacité de l’ADAC SYSTEM™, des tests comparatifs ont été
effectués en wake surf sur des
conditions de vague constante pour de meilleures mesures. Le résultat fut sans
appel : ce nouveau type d'aileron procurait une dynamique naturelle de
trajectoires grâce à ses impulsions purement instinctives! Il était impossible
pour nous de revenir à des ailerons classiques! Nous avons donc naturellement
décidé de partager cette découverte et d’en créer une version évoluée répondant
à toutes les attentes d'un surfeur en recherche de nouvelles sensations. C’est
ici que commence l’histoire de FYN et de son GENOME.

Pourquoi nous avons besoins de vous!

Le surf est une passion, un sport, même
un métier pour certains! Il se doit d'évoluer, de s'améliorer, pour fournir
toujours plus de sensations de plaisir et de moments de partage.
Pour nous, il est essentiel de partager
cette aventure avec la communauté surf et de contribuer à son expansion, en
apportant notre part de rêve dans l'évolution du surf.
Nous sollicitons votre contribution
dans le but de maximiser l’expérience de GENOME. Toutes les contributions, de
professionnels, d'amateurs, ou de débutants sont précieuses pour FYN. Donnez-nous
votre avis et partagez notre projet via les réseaux sociaux et sur vos spots!




Ce que nous avons déjà fait

Le développement technique du produit
est désormais terminé; la technologie a été testée, validée,
brevetée (Patent n°14/02226), et le modèle déposé (n°15/1713).
Les premiers
prototypes industriels sont actuellement en phase de test final. 
Si vous souhaitez participer à ces
tests, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter pour recevoir votre exemplaire de test et
contribuer à l'évolution du projet.


Ce qu'il nous reste à faire


Nous en sommes bientôt à la phase de
production, avec la création du premier moule pour la production à grande
échelle. 
La mise au point du packaging écologique, du
site web de vente en ligne, ainsi que les accords de distribution en points de
ventes spécialisés sont en cour. Si vous souhaitez faire partie des premiers
points de ventes officiels de cette nouvelle génération d'ailerons, vous pouvez
participer au projet en tant que partenaire surf-shop ou shaper.
Vous pouvez dès à présent précommander votre GENOME,
vous le recevrez en juin 2015.






Pourquoi passer par Indiegogo?

Indiegogo vous permettra de participer
concrètement au projet et d'assurer son aboutissement! Ce site vous permet
également de réserver votre aileron FYN et de le recevoir immédiatement après
sa première mise en production (Juin 2015), et donc d'en profiter cet été!
Contribuez maintenant et précommandez
votre GENOME!
« ... Prendre des risques,
c'est accroître ses chances de gagner. C'est vrai d'une personne comme d'une
entreprise. Pour cela, il faut affronter la peur: celle de l'échec, de la
faillite, ou, pour un sportif, celle de la chute et de la défaite. C'est la
prise de risque matérialisée par les nouveaux projets de recherche en
laboratoire qui permet la découverte, l'invention et, en définitive,
l'innovation, bénéfique pour la société tout entière... »    
   
Extrait
de  Surfer la vie  de
 Joël DE ROSNAY 

Intéressé par GENOME? Consultez notre
chaîne YouTube où vous trouverez des vidéos explicatives des démonstrations et
tout ce qu'il faut pour comprendre la technologie ADAC SYSTEM.

SUIVEZ-NOUS

story:
Summary:

  • my name is Christine and I am a healthcare aid and registered pedicurist at a hospital. We are under staffed and are given limited resources to make a difference .
  • I am trying to raise some money to get better body care products for the patients and to cover some of the costs to do footcare on the patients of need.
  • For years now US the staff have bought as much as we can afford to try to help.. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • the funding from this goes to body wash, shampoo, conditioner, better  razors, replace razer blades, body creams , shaving gel, deodorant, ladies hair ties, head bands, clips and foot care products ( nail file, foot files, clippers and Pumas stone)
  • For ever $50 raised a patient will receive a free pedicure.( normally a $47 )
  • if we don't reach our goal we will keep trying to raise more and only purchase what we can afford 

Risks & Challenges

unfortunetly Staff has been cut back .

I over the years have put hundreds of dollars into buying body washes, shampoos, conditioner and other products..

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please spread the word and let's give these people better products .

If you are unable to supply money and want to help you can send un opened donated products to me for the patients .

Please email me for a

List of Much neede products.cquance@ymail.com

Thank you 

And that's all there is to it.

story:
As most of you know, I'm Benjamin. I've been transitioning for about 3 years now. It's been a journey that's made me finally feel confident in myself. Those close to me know that for most of my life I struggled greatly to just feel an ounce of comfort in myself. Looking in the mirror was something that made every morning seem like the worst I ever had. Some might say that seems a bit dramatic or ridiculous and from an outside view I can understand. But I guess to paint it better, it's like looking into your own eyes in the mirror and seeing your real self only there .. because once you start to see the rest of yourself you feel more anxiety and pain than you ever thought possible.

So here I am, I took the chance and stood up for myself. I fought to be this person I knew all along. So many of you have been there for me from day one, without even batting an eye. And I still don't  have the words to thank you or tell you just how much that all means to me. The love and support I have been given is completely mind blowing. I am incredibly lucky and grateful.

Now there's the next, and for me most crucial and important part of my journey. I have been trying to come up with every way but this way to get this taken care of for myself. But life and all of its expenses have gotten in my way as I'm sure you've all been through yourselves. I'm looking to have my top surgery performed this year. To finally be free, to be my whole true self. To wear a shirt and not have insane anxiety and check the mirror every 20 mins to make sure nothing is "showing", that my binder isn't causing me more back issues. It's an incredibly important part of my life, and something I need to be my true self. 
I know it's alot to ask, but anything, even word of mouth to help would mean the world to me. I appreciate you all so much and everything you've done to make me feel comfortable in myself. Thank you again

story:
Short Summary

Hi Everyone, I'm Marta, I'm a senior in University of West Hungary, studying painting. I tend to find hobbies certainly not related to my job, it was the same with the blog. I was diagnosed with hypothyroidism about a year ago, it was pretty obvious that something was going on, I had huge migraines about 3-4 times a week, I gained a lot of weight and was tired all the time around my 24th birthday, my right sided  thyroid popped and got huge, I was rushed into the emergency by my boyfriend and was in the hospital all night. All my symptoms were clear but "not as bad" so I did not get treated ... Then it all made sense, I needed to change my lifestyle. It took me some time, about half a year (but you need time for the good work right?) So it took me about 5-6 months, I started, a daily blog, "Csípős Fahéj" (which means Spicy Cinnamon in Hungarian, writing down all my thoughts, about eating clean, being healthy, finding our own way of feeling good about ourselves .

I got better, I lost 15 kilos already, I rarely get headaches (well about 3-4 a month) I feel motivated and good about myself.

While daily motivating other people, helping them, giving them advices on how to start off a healthy - on a daily bases - life. It turned out, people actually liked the idea, so I snooped around in the era and got to know clean eating, raw vegan, vegan and vegetarian food and lifestyles as well, so when people tell me about themselves I try to help them create what's best for them, in their own needs.

I also started to make facial, body and hair creams with only organic oils and base butters. I uploaded all of my organic cream recipes and my followers loved them, I even started to create gluten, sugar, lactose free meals and deserts to improve the intake of my followers and my level of thinking about eating good food.

I believe that, being healthy comes from what we put inside AND onto our bodies. My  main purpose of the idea is a better, improved website for my blog where I can help more easily everyone 24/7 , whom would ask for help. Whether it's just a piece of advice, a whole month of a meal idea, ideal daily calorie intake, personal shampoo - conditioner or body/ facial butter personally made for the person who asks for it.

My dream is to create a place where I can  help people with all my heart and time and this is it. Please, please help me create my dream and donate to my campaign, Thank you so much!

story:
IL TUO AIUTO E' IMPORTANTE.  BASTA 1 EURO.

Una ricerca complessa come quella sulla SLA necessita tanto di medici che da anni se ne stanno attivamente occupando, quanto di fondi per giungere alla soluzione del problema. Abbiamo bisogno anche del tuo aiuto per giungere finalmente a completare la “carta d’identità” genetica della SLA che consentirà di sviluppare una cura efficace.

La SLA blocca la libertà di muoversi, ma negli ultimi 7 anni il Prof. Vincenzo Silani dell’Istituto Auxologico Italiano è andato avanti con la ricerca, riuscendo a isolare la regione di un cromosoma su cui può essere presente un gene mutato, responsabile della malattia. Ora, per mancanza di fondi, anche la ricerca è paralizzata. E per trovare una cura, c’è bisogno anche della tua donazione. Abbiamo solo 2 mesi per raccogliere i fondi necessari: aiutaci a fermare la malattia.

Un malato di SLA non si muove. La ricerca può muoversi grazie a te.


QUANTO ABBIAMO GIA' FATTO, QUELLO CHE ORA VOGLIAMO FARE 

Con un vasto sforzo che si è allargato alla comunità scientifica internazionale partendo da ricercatori italiani, utilizzando le più moderne tecnologie (GWAS), è stato caratterizzato il DNA di oltre 13.000 pazienti per la definizione di una predisposizione genetica alla Sclerosi Laterale Amiotrofica (SLA). 

E’ stata identificata una regione (locus) sul cromosoma 17 dove potenzialmente potrebbe risiedere il gene responsabile di malattia. Nel locus risiedono però più di 10 geni che vanno sequenziati e definiti individualmente nel ruolo causale. Tra essi vi è SARM1 che appare essere un ottimo candidato per causare la SLA per le funzioni correlate alla crescita del prolungamento della cellula motoneuronale. 

L’ identificazione del gene causale in una popolazione così ampiamente studiata di pazienti SLA rappresenta un passo fondamentale per comprendere i meccanismi di malattia ed elaborare una terapia mirata efficace. 

Il passo è breve per la conclusione di un lavoro poderoso ma necessita di un aiuto: i ricercatori sono motivati e pronti a concludere la corsa verso l’identificazione della causa della SLA.


PERCHE' E' IMPORTANTE E COSA CAMBIEREBBE NELLA LOTTA ALLA SLA

I casi studiati sono sporadici ed i pazienti affetti da SLA sporadica sono anche i più numerosi. Individuare un gene patogeno significa scoprire una proteina che malfunziona ed armarsi per correggere un difetto metabolico. La strada per la terapia passa attraverso questo momento identificativo di un meccanismo alterato per costruire una terapia quanto più personalizzata.

COME USEREMO I FONDI?

Il Crowdfunding ha come obbiettivo il sequenziamento della regione già identificata sul cromosoma 17 quale responsabile di SLA dove risiedono più di 10 geni. L’approvvigionamento del materiali necessari rappresenta il limite al completamento del progetto. 

UN PROGETTO INTERNAZIONALE

Ecco la testimonianza del professore Stanley H. Appel, Direttore dello Houston Methodist Neurological Institute: 

"So please give and be generous! Because research is the hope for ALS patients."


Alcune recenti pubblicazioni scientifiche del team di ricerca del Prof. Silani

Human Molecular Genetics

Neuron

Lancet Neurology


CONTATTI STAMPA
Pierangelo Garzia
Responsabile Ufficio Stampa e Comunicazione
IRCCS Istituto Auxologico Italiano
Piazzale Brescia, 20 
20149 Milano
tel. 0261911.2896 
garzia@auxologico.it
story_txt:
IL TUO AIUTO E' IMPORTANTE.  BASTA 1 EURO.Una ricerca complessa come quella sulla SLA necessita tanto di medici che da anni se ne stanno attivamente occupando, quanto di fondi per giungere alla soluzione del problema. Abbiamo bisogno anche del tuo aiuto per giungere finalmente a completare la “carta d’identità” genetica della SLA che consentirà di sviluppare una cura efficace.La SLA blocca la libertà di muoversi, ma negli ultimi 7 anni il Prof. Vincenzo Silani dell’Istituto Auxologico Italiano è andato avanti con la ricerca, riuscendo a isolare la regione di un cromosoma su cui può essere presente un gene mutato, responsabile della malattia. Ora, per mancanza di fondi, anche la ricerca è paralizzata. E per trovare una cura, c’è bisogno anche della tua donazione. Abbiamo solo 2 mesi per raccogliere i fondi necessari: aiutaci a fermare la malattia.Un malato di SLA non si muove. La ricerca può muoversi grazie a te.QUANTO ABBIAMO GIA' FATTO, QUELLO CHE ORA VOGLIAMO FARE 
Con un vasto sforzo che si è allargato alla
comunità scientifica internazionale partendo da ricercatori italiani,
utilizzando le più moderne tecnologie (GWAS), è stato caratterizzato il DNA di
oltre 13.000 pazienti per la definizione di una predisposizione genetica alla
Sclerosi Laterale Amiotrofica (SLA). E’ stata identificata una regione (locus)
sul cromosoma 17 dove potenzialmente potrebbe risiedere il gene responsabile di
malattia. Nel locus risiedono però più di 10 geni che vanno sequenziati e definiti
individualmente nel ruolo causale. Tra essi vi è SARM1 che appare essere un ottimo candidato per causare la SLA per le
funzioni correlate alla crescita del prolungamento della cellula motoneuronale. L’ identificazione del gene causale in una popolazione così ampiamente studiata
di pazienti SLA rappresenta un passo fondamentale per comprendere i meccanismi
di malattia ed elaborare una terapia mirata efficace. Il passo è breve per la
conclusione di un lavoro poderoso ma necessita di un aiuto: i ricercatori sono
motivati e pronti a concludere la corsa verso l’identificazione della causa
della SLA.

PERCHE' E' IMPORTANTE E COSA CAMBIEREBBE NELLA LOTTA
ALLA SLA
I casi studiati sono sporadici ed i pazienti
affetti da SLA sporadica sono anche i più numerosi. Individuare un gene
patogeno significa scoprire una proteina che malfunziona ed armarsi per correggere
un difetto metabolico. La strada per la terapia passa attraverso questo momento
identificativo di un meccanismo alterato per costruire una terapia quanto più
personalizzata. COME USEREMO I FONDI?
Il Crowdfunding ha come obbiettivo il sequenziamento
della regione già identificata sul cromosoma 17 quale responsabile di SLA dove
risiedono più di 10 geni. L’approvvigionamento del materiali necessari
rappresenta il limite al completamento del progetto. UN PROGETTO INTERNAZIONALEEcco la testimonianza del professore Stanley H. Appel, Direttore dello Houston Methodist Neurological Institute: "So please give and be generous! Because research is the hope for ALS patients."Alcune recenti pubblicazioni scientifiche del team di ricerca del Prof. SilaniHuman Molecular GeneticsNeuronLancet NeurologyCONTATTI STAMPA
Pierangelo GarziaResponsabile Ufficio Stampa e ComunicazioneIRCCS Istituto Auxologico ItalianoPiazzale Brescia, 20 20149 Milanotel. 0261911.2896 garzia@auxologico.it

story:
The Project

My project started years ago, when I began dreaming of facility that would house our community swim teams in the Olentangy School District.  I wanted a facility that focused on the education of swimmers of all ages and interests.  There are a few fitness centers in the area that just don’t ‘get’ swimming.  They teach lessons, host swim teams but in a mixed use facility this all ends up overcrowded and just not enough.  I wanted a place where swim lesson kids could have their own warmer pool.  A place where a swim team can train like athletes, not recreational participants.  I understood that such a place would not be publicly funded.  So, here we are.  I & Buckeye Swim Club, now own 10 acres at 1895 Peachblow Rd.  The architects are busy doing their thing and sending me bills!  The bank LIKES my project (woohoo)!  I will try to update this site with pics, drawings, funding information and everything in between.

Thanks for visiting and THANKS for your support!

Laurie Karr
Head Coach  & Owner
Buckeye Swim Club

What We Need & What You Get

The project currently needs about $30,000 more to pay the rest of our architect and engineering fees.  We are hoping to raise a portion of that here.  We have lots of perks, from t-shirts to a wave with your name on our pool wall!

The Impact

The Central Ohio area has 65 High School teams, but only 6 high schools have pools on their campus.  3 are public, 3 are private.  The taxpayers just don't build education based swim facilities.  Most high schools and swim clubs rent time at local fitness facilities such as the YMCA.  Our club  (Buckeye Swim Club) rents time at 3 different pools each winter just to house our kiddos.  This facility will impact most of Southern Delaware County in such a positive way.  Swim teams aside, our swim lessons will help educate thousands of local children and keep them safe near the water!

Challenges

We have already purchased land and a dome to enclose the facility. We are well on our way!  Our next challenge is finishing the architectural & engineering and getting the building permits in place.  

Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to help with donated goods rather than funds, please let us know!  We will take anything from locker room supplies, to exercise equipment to pool supplies and equipment.  Goods donors could also be recognized on our giving wave wall!

Your Business can show it’s support by purchasing a giving wave tile.  Our giving wall will be prominently displayed at the pool.

BENEFITS TO YOUR BUSINESS 

•Daily customer impressions 

•Support of community activities 

•Ongoing web-banner on team sites 

•Direct access to facility clients 

•Discounted employee benefits 

Corporate supporters have the potential for daily “impressions” as members, families, and visitors enter the facility. Additional impressions will be included on the facility and competitive team websites, printed materials, and team apparel.

Family and Individual Support:

Families are invited to support the facility by donating “Family Support Tiles” which will be located inside the entry to the facility.  This is a great opportunity for you to show your support for swimming in Central Ohio.  You may include your family name, or your own wording– let your, or your children’s, creativity “flow.”  Grandparents are invited to support the facility and their young swimmers as well!

Corporate Sponsorship:

Corporate supporters have the potential for daily “impressions” as members, families, and visitors enter the facility.  Additional impressions will be included on the facility and competitive team web-sites, printed materials, and team apparel.  While printed impressions are renewable, the Sponsors Wall is a permanent opportunity that will be prominently featured.

Level I:  Breaking Waves

Permanent “Corporate Tile” on Sponsors Wall in facility

One year of the following benefits:

·  Linked banner on team web-site

·  ¼ page ad featured in team handbook (distributed to all team families)

·  Employee discount of 5% for programming fees (does not include competitive teams)

·  1-time 10% rental discount for corporate event hosted at facility (up to 2 hours)

·  Corporate materials available at reception desk for members and visitors

Level II:  Tidal Waves

Permanent large-sized “Corporate Tile” on Sponsors Wall in facility

Two years of the following benefits:

·  Linked banner on team web-site

·  ½ page ad featured in team handbook (distributed to all team families)

·  Employee discount of 7% for programming fees (does not include competitive teams)

·  Twice annual 15% rental discount for corporate event hosted at facility (up to 4 hours)

·  Corporate materials available at reception desk for members and visitors

Level III:  Tsunami Waves

Permanent mega-sized “Corporate Tile” on Sponsors Wall in facility

Three years of the following benefits:

·  Linked banner on team web-site

·  Full-page ad featured in team handbook (distributed to all team families)

·  Large Corporate logo included on team t-shirts

·  Employee discount of 10% for programming fees (does not include competitive teams)

·  Three-time annual 20% rental discount for corporate event hosted at facility (up to 4 hours)

·  Corporate materials available at reception desk for members and visitors

story:
My name is Bret Kantola.  My partner is Jackie from Amsterdam where I also lived for a few years in the past.  Jackie is our inspiration but not connected to the campaign directly.  

 I have been a master grower gardener and cannabis activist for many years.  Cannabis as a medicine in all its forms is my passion and teaching about it and helping patients is what I do best. 

With legalization and acceptance I have become aware of the lack of good information and have seen many families with patients come to Colorado and find they have a difficult time getting accurate information on where to get it and how to use it. 

My goal is to open a Sanctuary that will be both a learning and healing retreat. By using Crowd funding for the majority of the start up and improvement cost's I will be able to offer much lower rates to our students, patients, and guests.  I will re-invest any profits to improve the sanctuary and possibly open another in the future. We think other states as well as Western Europe could use this idea too. 

I will invite patients, students, and guests to stay with me and acquire the knowledge to pass on to others in their home areas.  For students it will be learning all about the plant from seed planting, to cloning, to harvest and cure.  I will teach all the ways to process it into a proper dietary supplement.  We will have fun making edibles, tinctures, soap, and of course the life saving oil.  I will also focus on diet and lifestyle modification by providing home grown fruits, vegetables, herbs, spices, etc., all grown on site.  For patients it will be a place to start the high dose oil treatment that has helped so many and learn how to use cannabis in an effective manor.  They will also learn about a proper mindset, diet, and lifestyle to help the cannabis work its best. I expect to feature classes taught by gifted teachers from around the globe. They will come and stay with us to share their crafts and talents. I have several very excited to come and be involved. 

I have a great plan and a great genetics library to get started with. I have been collecting the high CBD and other medicinal strains for almost 20 years.


My first step is to raise the seed money needed to launch our project.  I will secure a property that we can live and work on.  It will have enough space for greenhouses, a large outdoor garden, a bunkhouse that will double as a class room and some cabins for our students and patients.  I plan to raise and earn enough funds to acquire the property this summer with a goal of being able to host patients and students before year end.  


Jackie (our inspiration) currently lives in Amsterdam.  She has been spending a lot of time in Colorado since legalization of cannabis over the last 6 years and she understands the issues better then most.  Jackie has severe Crohn’s disease and has used cannabis via a doctor’s prescription for almost 20 years.  Cannabis saved her life and she is a living testament to it's healing powers.  She has become an expert on the plant and its proper use.  She fought for the right to grow and supply her own cannabis and is a hero in the international cannabis community for winning that battle.   She has more knowledge about the healing powers then most by far. 

I supplied cannabis to patients out of a church basement in Denver long before the first dispensaries opened.  It was people like us that made legalization possible. 


I have the qualifications.  I have the passion and desire.  This is a rest of our lives commitment.  We are humble people with the information patients and students really need and want to find the best way to help as many as possible.

I just need the seed money to make it happen.  I have a complete business plan and are excited about getting this done.  I am open to new ideas, potential partners, investors, and help of any kind including donations of materials, time, and knowledge.  Please consider all these things and help us raise the three hundred twenty-five thousand I need to launch this project and help others ASAP.  


Below is an outline of my business plan with expenses and potential earnings. It is a work in progress and will be tweaked as things come together. Again, please help me  help others by contributing to our campaign.  If you can't donate monetarily, then please share as far and wide as you can. It could help your friends or family in the future. 


                                                          Business Plan for

                           Jackie’s Cannabis Sanctuary, a healing retreat

Objective:

Establish a safe secure peaceful retreat in the Colorado Mountains.  Specifically for patients and students to learn about the medicinal and therapeutic benefits of the cannabis plant. This would include, growing and harvesting the plant.  Learning how the different strains have different properties. Making the extracts, tinctures, and concentrates for the patients to use.  Teaching about healthy diet including a large food-producing garden. Teaching about the spiritual side of using the plant.  And much more.  We envision gifted guest teachers from all over the world coming to teach their craft.

Location:

Paonia, Colorado area.

Paonia is the self-proclaimed capital of farm to table restaurants. It is also home to many small organic farms, fruit tree orchards, and wine producing vineyards.  It is in Colorado’s banana belt and protected on both sides by the Elk Mountain range. It has a great alternative lifestyle vibe and a very friendly population of 1600+.  Land and homes are still affordable being near the national average whereas much of Colorado is higher then that average due to the popularity of out of state investors and buyers.  Once Delta County accepts medical and or recreational cannabis we predict the prices will go up and be equal to the rest of the state.

Costs:

Property              $350,000.00

Improvements  $250,000.00

Property would consist of 10 to 20 acres with main house.  Assuming 20% down the up front cost for this would be $70,000.00 down and approx. a $1300.00 monthly mortgage payment. 

Improvements include building green houses, several cabins, and a bunk house/classroom.  Some land improvements including fencing , etc., would round out the improvement costs.  This figure is based on Exhibit A. (see below)

Income:

Each student or patient would pay an all inclusive $100.00 per day/night.  With room for 20+ students and or patients total this could easily be $2000.00 per day.  Even at a 50% occupancy rate, it would be $1000.00 per day or $30,000.00 per month.  At 25% occupancy it is still $15,000.00 a month.  With a couple of employee’s, mortgage payment, supplies and upkeep, we expect a positive cash flow almost from the beginning.  With crowd funding supplying the Improvements cost there should be a lot of equity in the property from the opening.  We hope to offer stays to some that can't afford it as well.  Their stay will be on us as it is the right thing to do. 

         Goal of Indiegogo fund raising campaign should be $325,000.00


                           Jackie’s Cannabis Sanctuary, a healing retreat.

                                                  Exhibit A

Main Property:

3 to 5 bedroom home with multiple bathrooms                                  $350,000.00

It will have a large commercial style kitchen.

And a great room for entertaining guests.

Main property will be paid as indicated, 20% down

And a traditional mortgage of approx.   $1,300.00 a month. 

Improvement costs:

5 Cabins can be built and furnished for approx. $30,000.00 ea.  $150,000.00

These cabins will sleep 4 to 6 and have all important amenities.

2 - 1500 Sq. Ft. Greenhouses to grow both food                                 $  30,000.00

and the Sanctuary cannabis.

1 Bunk house/class room for interns and on site employees         $  55,000.00

This should sleep 5 to 10 people and have men’s and woman’s

bathrooms.  It will be two story with sleeping quarters on top

and classroom/learning center on the main floor.

Grounds improvements including fencing and out buildings          $  15,000.00

TOTAL IMPROVEMENT COSTS                                                              $250,000.00


This is $600,000.00 total for the property and all improvements.  I hope to raise just over half to make it happen and will finance the rest through a traditional mortgage. 

Some people have asked what will we do if I don't reach my goal.  The answer is simple.  We will use 100% of the funds collected to make this happen.  Worst case is we down size some and start with the property and add the improvements once we are more established.  Best case is we raise more then we anticipate which only helps it all to happen faster.  No money will be spent on anything except this specific project.

be two story with sleeping quarters on top
and classroom/learning center on the main floor.
Grounds improvements including fencing and out buildings          $ 
15,000.00
TOTAL IMPROVEMENT COSTS                                                              $250,000.00This is $600,000.00 total for the property and all improvements.  I hope to raise just over half to make it happen and will finance the rest through a traditional mortgage. Some people have asked what will we do if I don't reach my goal.  The answer is simple.  We will use 100% of the funds collected to make this happen.  Worst case is we down size some and start with the property and add the improvements once we are more established.  Best case is we raise more then we anticipate which only helps it all to happen faster.  No money will be spent on anything except this specific project.

story:
Transport crashes statistics  is critical:

  • In road crashes every year die over 1 million people, 20 - 50 million are injured.
  • Annual cost of road crashes is over $500 billion globally ($200 b. in U.S.A.)
  • Recent trend indicate that without proper action road traffic accidents will become #5 leading cause of death by 2030.                                              

Inspiration for the project

In 2012 was published my first book FFmpeg Basics about a popular multimedia framework (www.ffmpeg.tv) and received many good reviews including from experts and professionals. But the number of sold copies was low and my decision was to work on a topic useful for more people. 

Message from investors

In January was published my second book Global Integrated Transport on Amazon.com (www.gitran.net/book). The GIT project was presented to several investors and their response was positive, but their opinion was that the realization of the project is in a far future. They also wanted more precise documentation made in CAD, 3D models, etc.

Organization of the GIT viaducts

Transport stations in the GIT viaducts are divided to the ports and nodes. Ports are simple stations providing input and output points for the passengers, freight and other distribution lines. Nodes are complex stations where intersect 2 or more transport lines.


Funding

Now the project's priority is to improve its documentation by creating 3D models of the Intermodal Container Conveyor, multideck and multiline viaducts, etc. We need funds to

  • pay CAD designers
  • create the concrete construction projects that will use the GIT models
  • organize a meeting/conference where will be all fans, team members and potential investors.


Please share our project

The Global Integrated Transport project is for everyone and please share it with your family, friends, etc.
Thank you very much.

story:
What is the Highway For Health Project?


The Highway For Health project is a nationwide effort to take back our children's future, bring quality of life back to the family unit and prevent premature health complications or death.

The Goal


Our goal is to raise awareness for, and support the fight against Childhood Obesity and Bullying. 

No parent, no matter location nor financial circumstance, wants to endanger the life of their child and promote a life of difficultly and health concerns. It's time to take charge and take back the health of our nation's youth! 

The Impact


The Highway For Health project will be an ongoing effort to help families all throughout the country.

Proceeds raised through the Highway for Health Project will be allocated to mission programs including:

  • Fitness Programs
  • Community Gardens
  • Education Materials
  • Children's Bike Giveaway

Other Ways You Can Help

We will be updating subscribers to our newsletter with news from the project, and resources for helping fight against Childhood Obesity.

story:
Over the years my partner and I have gained insight into the dynamics of the fitness industry. Our peers often expressed their reservations as to why they could not commit to a healthy change. We could relate to how they yearned for a better life, yet lacked motivation and persistence to lead a healthier existence.  The same struggles were constantly echoed: “I don’t know how, it’s too difficult,” or most commonly, “I don’t have anyone to work out with”.

We made it our mission to help everyone build a foundation of health by starting Every Fit!  Whether you want to lose thirty pounds, or simply be more active, Every Fit is a company dedicated to helping you meet your fitness goals.

Every Fit’s first product is a mobile app called, “SPOTTER FITNESS”; it allows you to view and share fitness schedules with your social media network. We are confident that Spotter Fitness will help you find your motivation and keep it, and here is how:

By utilizing Facebook, phone contacts, current location and 4Square, SPOTTER FITNESS will help you find like-minded exercise partners in your general vicinity. If you’re unsure of what type of exercise is for you, you can search with SPOTTER FITNESS to find specific exercises, what local facilities offer them and see who is doing them. SPOTTER FITNESS will enable you to create a vast fitness network that will enhance your exercise experience. This is not just a gym app! We have spent years of late nights locked in our laboratory grooming the motivational and community aspect to help everyone become or remain comfortable with their exercise choices.

Alan’s Story

When I began my fitness journey I was clueless. I weighed just over 120 pounds and lived a very fast and unhealthy life. When life slowed down I was stuck in a body that I didn’t want to have. I knew things had to change, but I did not know where or how to begin. I went through a LONG period of trial and error, and in the beginning I often failed at staying consistent. That is no longer the case, because I met Junior, a perfect fitness buddy, whose aspirations matched mine.

Juniors Story

I guarantee you know someone who has been affected by Cancer. 1 out of 3 people in today’s world are affected by cancer in their lifetime. I was diagnosed at the age 19.  2 surgeries and 5 months of intense chemotherapy later, I was in remission. Doctors told me I wouldn’t be able to have children, which was one of my lifelong dreams. Fast forward 16 years; I am now 35 years old, married with two beautiful miracle children, whom were conceived naturally and are in good health.  

Why am I telling you all this? This is what has brought me to you. I strive for everyone to believe in themselves enough to care about their health. Post cancer, I sought out a healthy lifestyle like the drowning seek air. I researched nutrition, exercise, and spirituality so I could pass on my newly acquired knowledge to others.

Our Story

We realized that when we exercised together, we were much more motivated by each other’s energies.  However, it was extremely difficult to align our schedules with others. Multiple group text messages, voicemails & phone calls temporarily solved our problem.  There had to be an easier way. That’s when it hit us! We both invested our life savings into this project in hopes that we can help the masses discover and or hold onto a healthy lifestyle. Little did we know our life savings would only take us so far! This app can revolutionize people’s lives, but unless people know about it, the likelihood of change is small.

Now we’re getting close to our launch & we are seeking out funding to help with our market penetration. The success of the app is contingent on the volume of users; the more that use it, the more that people will be motivated to live a healthy lifestyle. Good health is contagious and sometimes all it takes is a little inspiration from a friend. Help us enable “SPOTTER FITNESS” to be that channel of inspiration. Donate 10, 5 or even 1 dollar to promote fitness! If you feel compelled to donate 50 BUCKS or more we will send you a SWEET Spotter Fitness protein shaker!

We understand if you cannot manage to contribute financially. But being as passionate as we are about our project we realize you can still make a HUGE difference with our campaign. Make noise, tell your friends to like our Facebook page “SPOTTER FITNESS” and visit our website www.spotterfitness.com. Help us make a positive difference in the world by spreading the word!

Our mission is to change lives through fitness and motivate people to pay our concept forward to those in your community! Teamwork is the Dreamwork.
