story:
Caddieye

Caddieye is the first rangefinder available, which works in conjunction with your smartphone and which is designed for sports. The device is attached to the phone’s back cover, after which it is ready to be used. Rangefinder includes a separate battery, so it doesn’t consume power from phone. With Caddieye Rangefinder and applications you can enhance the experience playing regular golf, but it can be also used playing disc golf.


Help us to reach our dream and join the Caddieye family and pre-order now!


How does it work?

Caddieye Rangefinder technology is based on regular distance meter. It utilizes a powerful laser pulse, which is aimed at the target by using optics. Reception optics include a filter, which lets only a particular wavelength of light to receiver. This eliminates sunlight and other disturbances, which would otherwise affect measuring. The technique is based on measuring the time between sending the laser pulse and receiving it from desired target. Caddieye can be recalibrated as many times as required, so it can be used with multiple phones.

Caddieye Rangefinder is controlled by Arm Cortex-M3 -based microcontroller. The measurement results are sent via Bluetooth connection to your smartphone, which in turn displays the results as camera images with an integrated application view. The device is controlled by phone, and target selected with phone’s touch screen. The smartphone’s camera works as binoculars for the device; this has enabled reducing the size of the gadget to minimum. The phone camera object detection is also utilized in measuring.

Preliminary Features of the Device

  • Maximum measuring distance 250 meters (or more, depending on the object and its size)
  • Measuring accuracy +/- 2 meters
  • Bluethooth 4.0 LE or Dual Mode
  • Micro-USB connector for charging the battery
  • Battery operating time a minimum of 300 measurements


Application

Caddieye app works in conjunction with the rangefinder. Smartphone requires a camera, since the rangefinder uses it for aiming. Applications are available for Android and iOS platforms. There are two different versions: for regular golf, and for disc golf. It is possible to create your own player profile, which allows you to save data and examine it afterwards. You can also add friends to your profile and compare the results. Caddieye app also includes a scorecard as well as a possibility for real-time performance monitoring. The golf application includes information about courses around the world, which enables specifically guided tours and distance information.
Caddieye Golf (Android & iOS)
  • Scorecard 
  • All the essential information on over 50,000 golf courses around the world
  • Personal statics in app and cloud service
  • Group games and tournaments
  • Handicap-system
Caddieye Disc Golf (Android & iOS)
  • Scorecard
  • The opportunity to create your own tracks
  • All the essential data on over 5,500 disc golf courses around the world provided by the PDGA (www.pdga.com)
  • Personal statics in app and cloud service
  • Group games and tournaments
Our first application of disc golf is out now, you can find it Google Play Store!

     

                                      




Why Choose Caddieye Product Range?

Caddieye is the first rangefinder for golf and disc golf courses which utilizes laser technology as well as smartphone technology. With the application it is possible to combine different features. Using the scorecard alongside with the distance meter enables quick action, and you can rest assured your playing data is stored reliably. You can use the course information to explore a specific course and plan your round in advance – and naturally analyse your results afterwards. We are also developing a cloud service integrated with the application, so you can survey the statistics and compare your results from a longer period of time.

Thanks to recharging with Micro-USB, the device is always ready to be used, unlike the older models with disposable batteries. You can recharge your device in your car en route to a golf course. Additionally, the advanced GPS tracking allows you to view functions on the course. Our aim was to develop an application, which is as simple and as user-friendly as possible, and which is easy to modify according to your own preferences. You can select the information shown on default display and enter the preliminary information of your choosing.

Caddieye Product Range is a brand new way to keep track of your game!


Why We Raise Money?

  • Certifications
  • Mold costs
  • Testing
  • Manufacturing

Team


Involved in the project




Q & A 


Which platforms the Caddieye apps is avaible?
Applications are available for Android and iOS platforms.

Which phone models are suitable for Caddieye rangefinder?
You must have Android or iOS platform phone. Caddieye attaches to the rails to the phone so it is suitable for most phone models. 

Does Caddieye work with all Android and iOS smartphones?
No. You must have a camera on your smartphone. In addition, the better the camera, the easier it is to use the Caddieye Rangefinder.
Is Caddieye waterproof?
Caddieye’s shell is water repellent. However, it should be remembered that as the Caddieye Rangefinder contains high-quality electronics, we recommend keeping the device dry.
When you are going to ship the Caddieye rangefinders?

We believe that the final product is ready for shipping in summer 2016. The first device applications are launched in late 2015. We also keep customers updated on product development every week.

Can I change my order information afterwards?
Yes, by contacting us by email: info@caddieye.com. We will also send a verification email before shipping the Caddieye to you. 
Can I use the applications before I get my Caddieye?
If you have bought some perks which include free access to applications, we will send you a code which allows you to use the apps. If you don’t receive a code and you see the application is running, you can contact us with email: info@caddieye.com.

Can I support the main campaign otherwise than by buying some perks?

Naturally: You can like and follow us on social media, and share the information with friends. We appreciate all the support we receive from our customers.

story:
Justin Marshall is a natural soccer player. He was born 
September 2, 2005 and began his soccer career at the age of 5. He 
started by playing house league and it was obvious very quickly that 
he was ready for Rep.
He advanced at the age of 7 to play on the U9 Rep team. One year ago 
he tried out for the academy and was successful at getting on to the 
U10 team with Toronto Skillz. This summer he was chosen as one of the 
players to travel to
Barcelona on the U11 team.
      Justin was selected for this special opportunity and has been a 
unique player because of his fearless attitude and he never seems to 
think about injury. The fact that he has been called on to play in 
the older age group illustrates how polished his soccer skills are. 
His focus is on the game and giving each opportunity his very best. 
From a young age he had a passion and dedication to soccer. It is 
clear in his playing that he loves the game. Justin has a hard 
working approach to soccer that makes him shine on and off the field. 
He is a very positive team player and his easy going personality 
makes him fun to interact with.
      Justin demonstrates excellent strength for his age and can call 
on that power when needed during any game situation. He has very 
solid shooting and finishing skills, he shields the ball naturally 
and has a very important ability to read plays and adapt to where the 
ball needs to be. He will be an integral part of the U11 team 
traveling to Barcelona for this very special opportunity. The trip is 
from March 19-28, 2016 and is going to be a once in a lifetime chance 
to play in the Mediterranean International Cup Tournament. This will 
be a chance for a young, dedicated player like Justin to be a part of 
an amazing skill building trip that he will never forget.


Thank you for your support!

Justin

story:
Who?

Hey I'm comedian Justin Perez. You may know me from doing various comedy things (standup, videos) or you may know me from reading this right now.

What?

Here's the deal. 

  • I want to sponsor my adult coed soccer team this season so their jerseys have my face on it. 
  • Can you picture how funny that is??? MY DUMB FACE ON ALL THE JERSEYS. Also it will be great promotion for my website, JustinPerezComedy.com
  • I will treat every game like a professional soccer game with everything from professional looking Instagram interviews with our team's hottest players, dramatic shots of our team winning (probably losing, but it's fine)
  • A  TON of photos of comedian James Coker.

Where?

The JustinPerezComedy.com players will be at Brooklyn Bridge Park playing their lil hearts out. 

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

NYC FOOTY WILL PRINT MY FACE ON THE TEAM'S JERSEY FOR $2,300. THIS WILL BE SO FUNNY. 

BUT now I need your help.

If I can raise $2,300 my team can actually wear these jerseys and it will be so funny and great. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Follow the team on Instagram @JustinPerezComedyFC
on Twitter @JustinPerezFC

story:
Bellyminator helps maintain core body strength and improve posture by reminding you to keep your stomach muscles tight.


Core muscular strength - vital to a healthy existence

Our core muscles are literally at the center of everything we do - from lifting a child to turning and looking over our shoulder in the car. Core muscles are what keep our back aligned, cause us to stand up straight, and keep our stomach from showing that oft-familiar 'pooch' or even a subtle sagging over the belt. But an alarming amount of people struggle to maintain a strong and toned core.     

 

The problem is that we train our abdominal muscles while working out, but fail to maintain this core muscle tension when we're not. If any pause in exercise lasts more than only a few days, we lose some of what we gained in the gym and end up feeling sluggish and showing a gut due to our lax stomach. Worse yet, if we remain out of the gym for weeks or even months due to a busy work schedule or travel, this may lead to a weakening of our core muscles - something that can cause poor posture, lower back pain and a number of other ailments later on in life. 



Most trainers say that in order to keep our abdominal muscles strong and looking sharp, we need to regularly train them in the gym and focus on tightening them up between workouts. But who is able to do this consistently? Can we really focus our minds on keeping our abs tight throughout the day when there are so many other things vying for our attention?


Our friend Nik before the Bellyminator

A helping hand

The Bellyminator was designed to solve this problem by focusing on your abdominals remaining tight throughout the day, so that you don't have to.  

While most abdominal machines work to rebuild and strengthen your muscles, they often forget one key ingredient: muscle memory. 

Not anymore!

Bellyminator works by using the core concept of classic conditioning. It simply reminds you when you’ve let your tummy muscles loosen, and eventually you will maintain the posture needed to provide optimal conditioning. After just a few days, you'll subconsciously stand taller and straighter, looking leaner and more confident. Eventually, your muscles and your mind will do the work for you. 

Discharged Bellyminator with Level 1 Pad.

For those of us who lack discipline and require extra encouragement - Level 2 Pad a.k.a. "The Watchdog".  It has sharper teeth and accelerated "habit development".

Because Bellyminator requires you to stand up straight and pull your abdominal muscles in, you are naturally placing yourself in good anatomical alignment. Since Bellyminator offers a subtle reminder each time you slouch and/or release your belly, you are less likely to find yourself slipping back into bad posture habits.

The best part is, not only are you toning your abs, but studies show that good posture increases self-confidence and overall well-being! 

To use it, simply tighten up your stomach muscles, strap on the Bellyminator, adjust the belt so it fits snuggly around your waist, and position the tension monitor just to the side of your belly button. As you go about your day, a simple spring-activated lever provides a sharp tap every time you relax your abs and let out your stomach, thus reminding you to stand or sit up straight and tighten back up. After only two weeks of a few hours per day, the result is a mind that has been programed to tighten up the abs even before a tap is received and, ultimately, a core that remains conditioned and toned in-between workouts. Whenever your core muscles begin to lapse back into old habits, you just strap the Bellyminator back on! 



That said, the Bellyminator does not take away the need for workouts.  As active people we all understand that nothing is free when it comes to fitness.  But imagine you are about to take a family vacation for a week and will be away from your regular workout routine or maybe you’re a weekend warrior with little time for the gym during work days. With the Bellyminator, you can maintain your hard earned results while on that vacation or working throughout the week without taking any steps backward. When you finally make it back to the gym, you can start right off from where you left things.

How is it different from a high intensity gym workout?

Gym workouts that incorporate crunches and sit-ups engage your core muscles during a few sets of burst-like deep impact motions, where your abs are under very strong and intense pressure for a short amount of time. Allowing muscles to recover and repair after such workouts is important, but when your abs are allowed to relax for an excessive amount of time, you lose most of what you achieved during the workout and your next session amounts to simply recovering your past results.  Basically you embark on a “formula” of 2 steps forward one step back (provided your workouts are productive).  

Now, imagine taking a single 5-pound dumbbell and holding it in front of you at 90 degrees for 15-20 minutes every day between your workouts. You wouldn’t feel anything within the first 5 minutes, but after a full 20 minutes your biceps would be sore from the low intensity effort at keeping that weight up. The Bellyminator works the same way - training your mind to keep your abs tight and your back straight in a low intense mode throughout the day. It takes a minimal amount of energy to use, but when it’s worn over an extended amount of time, this keeps your core muscles fit and toned when a higher intensity workout is not possible. It’s not a substitute for more intense workouts, but rather a supplement to them.

Check it out!  (same guy).

The beauty of it is the Bellyminator can be used virtually anywhere and anytime since it fits discreetly beneath your clothing. You can wear it to the office, put it on before an evening walk, or even take it to the laundromat. The world's the limit. 

You wear the Bellyminator under clothes so  your "undercover workouts" are discrete and unnoticeable. 


The Bellyminator's origins

I initially thought of the Bellyminator while working on a different product back in 2008 - which I affectionately named the 'Fit Kit'. The Fit Kit was a vest-like device that could be worn by people with back problems to help them train their upper body without lifting weights. However, when testing the vest I noticed that abdominals were left completely out of the equation and it did not address a crucial aspect of what often caused back pain in the first place - weak core muscles. I quickly went to the drawing board and came up with a draft plan for what would later be known as the Bellyminator. 

Early draft images of the Bellyminator

It took two years to reach a workable prototype. I gave copies of the prototype to friends and family, and improved the design until finally arriving at a working model - the Bellyminator Generation 1 (G1).

 It is designed around an inbuilt mechanism inside us all called conditioned reflex, which was well researched and described by Dr. Ivan Pavlov way back in 1904. Conditioned reflex enables us to do things on an instinctive and subconscious level, just like learning to keep our head up when we’re toddlers. Following the same Pavlovian logic, using the Bellyminator I was able to teach my stomach muscles to remain tight on their own even without thinking about it.

Developing conditioned reflex with the Bellyminator in 'slo-mo'.

In addition to promoting better posture and a stronger core, development and subsequent testing of Bellyminator on a group of close friends revealed a number of other “side effects”, which I had never aimed for. Various friends reported improved metabolism, greater energy level, increased attention from peers and colleagues (due to a tighter stomach), and improved confidence/self-esteem. My team and I continue to observe and record these effects and we encourage our users to share their findings with us.

After these initial rounds of testing, I produced a small batch of a couple thousand units and began marketing them, but a marriage to my beautiful wife in 2011 brought my efforts to a standstill. This year I've decided to pick things back up and am excited to debut the Bellyminator G1 to all of you at Indiegogo! 

Goals moving forward

Since picking things back up, I've been able to formulate a few improvements to the model.  The Generation 1 is a full time model – i.e. it does not have the “inactive mode”.  Sometimes, when attending an important meeting or driving, you don’t want to be distracted by any taps or clicks.  Generation-2 will be equipped with inactivation switch so you can put Bellyminator into inactive mode when you want to focus your attention on something important.  It can also be useful, if you want to go for a light run during a walk.  Generation-2 will also have different tension levels for discharge so you can adjust it to a required level.

The purpose of this campaign is not only to efficiently get the Bellyminator into the hands of sophisticated end users, but also to raise the necessary funds to produce and market a next generation (G2) model. If our goal of $60,000 is met, this model will be ready to market and sell by Spring of 2016. 

Though one of the main advantages of the Bellyminator G1 is its simple analog design, my ultimate goal is to digitize the device in order to store data and expand its capabilities.  Once this is ready, my team and I plan to get it into the hands of health professionals and trainers, who can use it for a number of different clients.

 Achieving our stretch goal of $100,000 would allow us to go directly to G3 and make the device digital within a year!  Digital Bellyminator will count taps, number of hours and days of use, number of sizes lost, store data, transmit it to your smart phone, etc.  This will enable us to offer two designs to our customers: one - analogue (Gen2), and the other one - digital (Gen3).


 We look forward to communicating more with all of our backers as the campaign continues and answering any of your questions. We are working on a shoestring budget, so any and all backers are important to us!


Questions and answers



Risks and challenges

As the first batch of Bellyminators is already made, we don't foresee any difficulties in getting them out to our first backers, so you can start using it and benefiting from it right away.  The most significant challenges will arise in incorporating all the improvements we want into our next generation of the product. While we have good ideas in the works already, we're also looking forward to hearing back from our backers about their own experiences with the Bellyminator and using that knowledge to further improve.

The other challenge facing our team is to distance ourselves from the endless ab cruncher machines, sit-up chairs, ab-belts, and other devices that have sprung up over the years. While these serve a purpose for some enthusiasts, we feel they are generally marketed to people wanting a quick fix to tone up their stomach fat. With the right approach, our hope is to attract a user base that is already physically active and can effectively use the product to formulate new habits and supplement what they're already doing.

We look forward to communicating more with all of our backers and friends throughout this process!

Bellyminator helps
maintain core body strength and improve posture by reminding you to keep your
stomach muscles tight.


Core muscular strength - vital to a healthy existence
Our core muscles are literally at the center of everything we do - from lifting a child to turning and looking over our shoulder in the car. Core muscles are what keep our back aligned, cause us to stand up straight, and keep our stomach from showing that oft-familiar 'pooch' or even a subtle sagging over the belt. But an alarming amount of people struggle to maintain a strong and toned core.     

 
The problem is that we train our abdominal muscles while working out, but fail to maintain this core muscle tension when we're not. If any pause in exercise lasts more than only a few days, we lose some of what we gained in the gym and end up feeling sluggish and showing a gut due to our lax stomach. Worse yet, if we remain out of the gym for weeks or even months due to a busy work schedule or travel, this may lead to a weakening of our core muscles - something that can cause poor posture, lower back pain and a number of other ailments later on in life. 





Most trainers say that in order to keep our abdominal muscles strong and looking sharp, we need to regularly train them in the gym and focus on tightening them up between workouts. But who is able to do this consistently? Can we really focus our minds on keeping our abs tight throughout the day when there are so many other things vying for our attention?




Our friend Nik before the Bellyminator

throughout the day, so that you don't have to.

eventually you will maintain the posture needed to
provide optimal conditioning. After just a few days,

story:
Life is full of transformations, some are just you simply aging, while others hold a greater meaning. One which molds you, and brings you closer to yourself, and God.


    I've personally had 6 that have molded me into the man I am today, and that has helped me become closer to God myself. My first was my moving to Colorado to create a life with my amazing wife Dorene. The second was the birth of my beautiful daughter Angelica, who was named after my deceased sister. Third was my becoming a part of a fraternity which prides itself on making good men better. The Fourth was the birth of my son Derrick, to carry on the Rovegno name, Fifth, was an amazing woman who I call Aunt Bon, (such an appropriate name) had helped us get into this wonderful home, and to whom I am so grateful for, and my final transformation was having a gastric sleeve, to help lengthen my time here, and be there for my children.

    All these combined has guided me to this journey I am embarking on today, but my health concerns is what brought us together with our dairy goats. Through it I had done a great deal of research into living a healthier lifestyle, one which involves eating more natural foods, foods which are not filled with chemicals, and hormones, or have tons of pesticides dumped on them, or genetically modified. In turn helping not only myself, but helping my family, and those with similar concerns.

    I have noticed a tremendous difference in my life now, as apposed to post surgery. My skin is clearer, I am happier, more energetic, my motivation is through the roof, and I'm 90 lbs lighter. I can now say that my lifestyle has changed, for the better, and gave me back the years I thought lost. 

    I now have the motivation to march forward, and climb that mountain in front of me, the one that will help my family, and community at the same time;  the idea of Zen Dairy Goats. This journey would be one which will heal me mentally, emotionally, and spiritually, and that is why we decided to call it Zen.

    So, my friends, I am asking you, for your support by making a nice contribution. This will help us build this idea into a reality, and ensure a healthier lifestyle for not only us, but for those around us. We will accomplish this through raising hormone free, chemical free, and pesticide free livestock, and produce.

     We are situated on a beautiful 3 acre farm, capable of producing more than 600 gallons of quality goats milk a year, and thousands of other products. Our milk, and products will be sold and distributed via CSA, (a weekly milk subscription) and at the local farmer markets. The goal of our dairy farm is to add more variety, freshness, and awareness to the many benefits of goat milk, while creating a healthy, financially productive farm manageable by our small family. 

    The world needs livestock farmers who are innovative, producing a diverse variety of foods for a healthier ecosystem, and distributing them to their local communities. The United States alone could use at least 4 million new farmers to make this healthier lifestyle a reality! 

     Please take a look at what all our campaign dollars will be going  towards, and help us reach our goal of the $50,000. Thank you!


    Take advantage of some of our great perks when you decide to contribute to our campaign and invest in our farm, or just help us spread the word through sharing this campaign on your Facebook, Twitter, Instagram pages or any other way you feel would be beneficial..

 

Thank You, and see you soon on the Zen Dairy Farm!! 

WB Eric, Dorene, Angelica and Derrick Rovegno


If you would like more information, please feel free to contact us personally at: zendairygoats@gmail.com or give us a call at (719) 251-0588


You can also follows us on: 

Facebook at: Zen Dairy Goats

By following us you can see our specials, products, baby kids (goats), and our progress as we move forward on this journey..


P.S. We have an amazing game which gives you the opportunity to win some cash, by simply referring contributors to our campaign.

Here are the rules. Signup for IndieGoGo, share our campaign via Facebook, twitter, Instagram, Google, whatever platforms of social media you use, and that's it. At the end of the campaign, the winner will be selected by the amount their referrals contributed. We will track it through our campaign, give updates weekly on the leader, and will announce the winner at the end of the campaign.

OK, so the prize.. If we reach at least half of our goal, which is $25,000, I will give $500 to the winner. If we reach $12,500 the prize will be $250. Is that enough of an incentive? No, I didn't think so either. If we reach or exceed our goal of $50,000, we will give the winner $1,000, that's right $1,000 to the one who has the highest amount given by their referrals, and if we manage to double our goal, well how does a grand prize of $5,000 sound??

Better get to sharing, and encouraging contributions!

Good Luck!!

story:
IC Medicals is currently developing a convenient and effective electronic device which will help improve one's health. This device sends electromagnetic signals derived from biologically active substances, such as medications. These signals are called Informational Copies or IC's. You can now receive full benefits from your medication free of side effects.

Electromagnetic signals derived from biologically active substances (BAS) can cause biological effect which is the same to the effect from BAS themselves. (See supporting research here)

In general ICs are applicable in health, agriculture, veterinary and even metallurgy.

Currently there are already 60 informational copies (IC) of different biologically active substances (pharmaceuticals, medical plants etc.).

IC Med device is used to apply healing signals to the body

By using your personal computer, laptop, tablet or smartphone and while connected to the Internet, you can receive and apply IC informational influence to your body. With permission from you primary health practitioner, you may start using IC Medicals in addition to your current method of treatment. Implement this technology, observe the renewed state of your health and send us your results... Start Now!

Clinical results and testimonials:

See more results...


Our goals:

  • Production and testing of wireless-wearable versions of the device ( $ 10 000)
  • Release 1000 devices and offer them for free to motivated people ($ 30 000)
  • Create App for more convinient use of infoceuticals ($ 10 000)
  • Promote new approaches in healthcare on a global scale 
  • Help millions people become healthy

You can:

  • Order IC Medicals Tech for yourself, friends and family
  • Participate in our IC Medicals Tech development program
  • Participate in our IC Medicals Global Experiment to Treat Hyperglycemia
  • Help spread information about new opportunities in healthcare


You will:

Improve your health, help your family, friends and other people to be more healthy



Additional materials:

IPM (World Custom Organization Project) - An internationally recognized and frequently implemented technology for encoding labeling, has an unprecedented level of security and can ensure the quality of the manufacturer for any product.

IPM Technology of Information Security allows for the secure and reliable operation of IC Medicals - Health Technology of New Generation.


Water Conference Materials

Digital Biology (Jacques Benveniste)

How to use IC Medicals (instruction)
What are Informational copies (ICs) and IC Medicals?
Results of Experiments
 Technology patent
Disclaimer

Release 1000 devices and offer them for free to motivated people ($ 30 000) 
Create App for more convinient use of infoceuticals ($ 10 000)

Promote new approaches in healthcare on a global scale 
Help millions people become healthy
You can:

Order IC Medicals Tech for yourself, friends and family
Participate in our IC Medicals Tech development program

Participate in our IC Medicals Global Experiment to Treat Hyperglycemia 

Help spread information about new opportunities in healthcare

You will:
Improve your health, help your family, friends and other people to be more healthy
Additional materials:
IPM (World Custom Organization Project) - An internationally recognized and frequently implemented technology for encoding labeling, has an unprecedented level of security and can ensure the quality of the manufacturer for any product.IPM Technology of Information Security allows for the secure and reliable operation of IC Medicals - Health Technology of New Generation.

Water Conference MaterialsDigital Biology (Jacques Benveniste)How to use IC Medicals (instruction)
What are Informational copies (ICs) and IC Medicals? Results of Experiments
Technology patentDisclaimer

story:
Sometimes life takes a strange turn and makes it somewhat difficult to do what you are passionate about. But with persistence and strength – everything is possible.

We help make it happen – we support the dreams and passions of those with obstacles. We are motivated. We are persistent. We know no limits. We are Sirius Open – a wheelchair tennis tournament in Croatia.

Sirius Open 2015 is a small but friendly and loving wheelchair tennis tournament organized in Zagreb (Croatia) by a group of friends. It is a family tournament. :) We are all volunteers, passionate about tennis and most important – striving for equality! Our mission with this project is to prove that sport knows no limits!

In its sixth edition, Sirius Open tournament will be held from July 10th to July 12th 2015. The tournament will host over 30 wheelchair tennis players from all around the world. Those players aren’t just a name on a list – they are our friends that keep coming back to perform on the tournament and have a great time.

We need your help to make it happen. Since we are a non-profit association, the whole tournament organization is based on sponsors and donations. Every year we knock endless doors in Croatia seeking for help and funding, and every year less and less people answer.

We don’t need millions. We don’t spend funds recklessly. We are humble and thankful. We need you to help us get started and to be one step closer to achieving our goal – promote equality and show what willpower can do!

In addition to the desire for sport achievement to all players, the idea of ​​the project is to promote wheelchair tennis in Croatia, encourage people with disabilities to start playing sports, either recreational or competitive. With sincere hope that as ambassadors of Croatian wheelchair tennis we initiate changes, every year we create global friendships which give us the motivation for further work. That is why we have started this crowdfunding campaign. We are reaching out to you, kind reader, to show you what we see every year: sport knows no limits!

The organization costs of this tournament are significant. We strive for perfection and we want our players to have an unforgettable experience. If you decide to support our project you should know where your donation will be spent. Our goal is 5000$ and we will use it to fund some of the most important items/services on Sirius Open tournament. Take a closer look how will we distribute the funds!

If we don’t achieve our 5000$ goal, the funds will still be invested to provide this items/services – and we will find the rest of the funds throughout Croatia, one cent at a time. No matter how many funds we have – the tournament will be organized but in a smaller scale.

Perks

First of all – thank you for still reading this text. :) To thank our contributors, we have prepared some perks as a small token of our gratitude! There is no small and big donation for us – our gratitude is always big.

·  5$ donation - You will receive a personalized e-mail Thank You note from tournament director Bojan Kovac.

·  10$ donation - You will be listed as a contributor on our website  http://bit.ly/SiriusOpenContributors

·  20$ donation - You will have a chance to see Sirius Open tournament organization team making a fool out of themselves saying Thank You for your generous donation on a personalized video. All videos will be posted on our YouTube channel. We are soooo looking forward to film this! :)

·  50$ donation - You will receive a tennis ball from the tournament with signatures of the whole organization team.

·  100$ donation - You will receive official tournament T-Shirt and become a part of our gang. The shirts are cool and a “uniform” that we proudly wear.

·  500 $ donation –You will receive a T-Shirt (photo below) signed by a tennis player that is currently among ATP's Top 10 best players in the world - Marin Čilić. A truly unique and valuable collectible item! We hope that tennis fans will love this.

That is our story. Help us show people that sport knows no limits and that you can do anything if you set your mind to it. If you can’t make a donation – it’s not a problem. You can help by sharing this campaign on your social networks and spreading the word.

With a big smile and a spark in our eyes, we are looking forward to go further.

Best regards from the Sirius Open organization team. :)

story:
Did you ever wish you could keep your nails healthy, or improve the look of your nails by doing nothing more than pressing a button?

So did we, and IllumiNail was the result....

A Little Background

  • Onychomycosis is a progressive fungal infection that affects the nails.  Toenails are affected more often than fingernails because the fungus that causes this disease thrive in a dark, warm, moist environment that is most often found in our shoes. This condition is the most common cause of discoloration, thickness, and deformities.  An infected nail can initially appear yellow, white, or green in some areas.  If left untreated, the entire nail may eventually become discolored, thick, and crumbly.
  • Current treatments include: applying mildly effective topical solutions, taking oral medications that may be toxic to the body, or undergoing costly laser treatments  at your doctor's office.

Our Product

  • The IllumiNail device is a self contained, rechargeable "clip" that emits a blue light aimed specifically at your toes.  Simply apply the device to the toe you want to treat, push the button on the device and let it do the  rest.  It runs through a treatment cycle, then shuts off automatically.  Put device on the next toe and repeat until all affected toes are treated.  It's that easy! 
  • There is no pain, no damaging UV radiation, nothing more to buy.  
  • Use it daily to prevent thickening of healthy nails, treat affected nails and prevent recurrence.
  • Our product can be used alone, or in conjunction with your doctor's treatment to achieve the best outcome.
  • Our initial study successfully controlled a fungal cultures growth, taken from infected nail clippings.  
  • We are looking forward to patient studies on a larger scale, so share the project!

**Combined therapy of laser and IllumiNail

Clinical Studies

  • A study published in the Lasers in Surgery and Medicine December 2008L 40(10); 734-737 discovered that 405 nanometres (nm) blue light was an effective treatment for microbial infections.  The follow up study conducted in 2009 demonstrated that ultraviolet (UV) light is not necessary to successfully kill the pathogens. 
  • Blue light therapy was actually FDA approved over a decade ago for the treatment of severe acne. Many of the blue light treatments for acne use the same wavelengths needed to kill antibiotic-resistant bacteria like MRSA, which means the technology is already tested as safe and effective against micro-organisms. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • The funding we obtain will be used to pay for a clinical study using you, the average end user, as the beta tester!  We are ready to move into the final stages of testing and need  a large population to demonstrate its effectiveness.  We will provide you access to the product (one IllumiNail device with charger), and access to a  web page for you to share your thoughts with us, and the ability to upload anonymous photos of your progress.

story:
We provide Water Filter Systems to communities that don't have access to clean drinking water, worldwide.

  • We are a group of environmentally conscious surfers and photographers, with backgrounds in renewable energy, water distribution/treatment, and the will to make a difference in the world.
  • We have several retailers selling our Surf Wax, Lip Balm, Mustache Wax and Beard Tamer, throughout California, which generates most of our funding.
  • We have already delivered many of our filter systems to Tanzania, Africa, South Africa, Mexico, India, Costa Rica, Philippines, and Nicaragua.
  • This campaign is to raise enough money to provide 200 Filters Systems, each rated at 5,000 gallons, totaling 1 Million Gallons of Filtered Water! 

      

What We Need:

1.  We need to raise funds that allow us to build more water filters.

2.  The more we can raise, the faster we can get our water filters to people that are in desperate need.

The Impact:

You will have the most direct impact on families in need of water, around the globe. 

  • The success of this campaign will generate 2,000,000, yes, 2 Million gallons of clean water, and hopefully much more.
  • You will be able to see your filter system installed as it is tracked on Facebook and Instagram.

   

Other Ways You Can Help:

  • Don't Surf, or have a Beard or Mustache, or like Lip Balm or Candles?   You can always donate!
  • No change to spare?  Spread the word on Instagram or Twitter @HuevosWax  
  • Check out one of our recent projects with the Newport Harbor High School Surf Team, covered by the Orange County Register: http://www.ocregister.com/articles/water-650281-surf-clean.html 

And that's all there is to it!

Thank you so much for your contribution, or for just spreading the word!

The Huevos Wax Team

www.HuevosWax.com

story:
Hello everyone!

My name is Vlad, and this year I am involved with a great volunteer student-run organization called Queen's Health Outreach (QHO). QHO aims to promote health through peer-based education locally in Kingston, nationally in Northern Canada, and even internationally, with initiatives in Kenya, Guyana, and Belize. This means that students from Queen's University go teach about relevant health topics to children in elementary schools, teens in high schools, and adults in the community worldwide in a non-threatening and open environment! Topics range from sexual and mental health, to nutrition, to bullying and healthy relationships. Our organization works with like-minded partner organizations to tailor lesson plans depending on a community's needs. Did I mention that we are a United Way registered charity? Please visit www.qho.ca for more information!

I am a Peer Educator for the Belize initiative, and in May I will be travelling there for 6 weeks with a group of Peer Educators from diverse faculties at Queen's to teach children ranging from 9 to 13 years of age. However, this wouldn't be possible without fundraising and help from wonderful people like YOU! Peer educators need to raise funds to make their initiatives possible, so this is where you come in. I have set some perks and incentives for certain donation amounts that you can see over to the right of the screen, but any amount donated is greatly appreciated.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate right now, then that's okay! You can still help by sharing this page to all your friends.

Thank you!

story:
Short Summary

We ( my husband and I) inherited modest farm in abandoned village in the mountains- Velebit mountain range that stretches parallel with Adriatic coast line. It s been in my family for past 300 years and features 2 room house, stone one room cattle shed, wood shed and stone rain water tank built in 1908 that looks like a well. House is completely renewed from basement to the new roof, stone well fixed ,wood shed repaired and last summer we started turning cattle shed into essential oil distillery and space for collected medicinal herbs.

We proudly own 11 saved street dogs, I paint furniture-1920/1970, my husband brews beer and makes recycled wood furniture among other things .

What We Need & What You Get

Our long term project is to revive as much as possible self sustainable way of life that used to be only way .

We decided to start with the cultivation of our land after long, long rest - plan is to make rather big(raised beds) vegetable garden using old seeds that are native to Croatia or became so through the centuries. For more sensitive cultures we will build small greenhouses. Eventually we will use all the land that we own but it requires time and observation due to the climate and lack of water. Although we have electricity only water is rain water collected from the roof or man made basins.

Our parallel project is  wood burning essential oil distillery  and collecting medicinal herbs. 

We wish to promote this way of life, careful usage of nature for human benefit, usage of old, dry trees and wood, cleaning and maintaining our immediate environment using all things natural after people and their cattle practically disappeared from the mountains.

Our idea is to sell some surplus of food, herbs, teas and essential oils, lecture about self sufficiency and carefully combine old ways with 21 ct.


The Impact

Reintroducing forgotten knowledge of making everything in once habitat useable and meaningful. Folk herbalism is neglected and forgotten, knowledge of various usage of different wood is forgotten too/ plates, trays, furniture/, old ways of making cheese or butter churning in wood barrels are rarely seen today and so on.

Making one empty village alive again using old and new skills may slowly introduce  people to the mountains and vice versa .


Risks & Challenges

Biggest challenge  is how to communicate simple message of very different life and value system that coincides with our modern-consumer- commerce-business society and real option of combining " two worlds". Purpose is to enrich, teach and send a message that rural production on small scale can be useful and fun.

Other Ways You Can Help

We ask kindly to share info about our project . Any tip, interesting fact or suggestion concerning this topic is more than welcome.

story:
Guru Dass and the Personal Guru App

We aim to create a mobile app, which contains Guru Dass' vast knowledge and experience in meditation and spiritual guidance, and making it available to anyone who owns a smartphone.

Guru Dass’ Personal Guru App offers you immediate access to guidance on those issues that are creating stress in your life. Watch videos of Guru Dass speaking on a variety of subjects: stress, fear, anger, loss, anxiety, love, relationships, responsibility, etc., that are common causes of our stress and worrying. Along with the videos, Guru Dass teaches specific meditations to help deal with these subjects, and provides daily tips to help you remain mindful and find balance and empowerment in your life. 

Guru Dass is an internationally renowned Kundalini Yoga and Meditation Master, with over 40 years experience, who has trained hundreds of Kundalini Yoga teachers worldwide. He is also the founding director of Mindfuleaders, dedicated to bringing meditation and mindfulness to the workplace, both collectively and individually. 

We need your contribution to fund the initial set-up and production of the Personal Guru App.


What You Get

Your personal Guru will open a window for you to begin discovering the possibility of inner transformation and fostering the fundamental qualities of life: 

• Clarity     • Non-reactiveness      • Enabling the possible

The benefits of using Personal Guru:

• Access your creative muscle and create innovation in everyday life

• Managing Stress

•  Befriending Fear and Anger

• Dealing with Loss

• The Nature of Anxiety

• Healthy and Conscious Relationships

• Love and Inner Abundance

• Unburdening Responsibility

• Being a Mindful Leader

• Being a Mindful Parent 

• Understanding the Mind - the thinking vs the working mind

…and many more

Other themes:

 • The workings of the mind  - the working mind vs the thinking mind and learning how to distinguish them

 • The trappings of the thinking mind: judgement, prejudice, habit, safety, control, comfort, fear, guilt.

 • “Not Now” - how to free yourself from the grasp of the thinking mind and disempowering old habits and beliefs

•  Discovering The Flow: Being You in the Present Moment

•  Stress and Personal Sustainability

•  Recognizing, measuring and managing one's stress levels

•  How to use Mindfulness in your daily life (work, home, etc.)‚ to access different and new ways to handle common challenges 

•  How to bring compassion, empathy, communication, purposefulness, motivation into personal and professional roles

•  Learning how to listen: working with feedback and being open to criticism


Who is Guru Dass

Guru Dass, a direct disciple of Yogi Bhajan (Kundalini Yoga) and Ramesh Balsekar (Advaita) began his spiritual quest as a teen, having his first Kundalini Yoga experience at the Woodstock Festival in 1969. By the time he was 18 he was living in an ashram and teaching Kundalini Yoga. At 20 he had travelled to India and studied with different masters. In the 70’s he pioneered Kundalini Yoga in Spain and Europe. For years Guru Dass accompanied Yogi Bhajan as his personal musician, in the USA, Europe and India. He often played during his classes, bringing the gift of his music to Yogiji’s meditations. 

Since 2001 Guru Dass has been traveling, teaching and sharing his music worldwide. He has trained hundreds of Kundalini Yoga teachers in courses he leads in different countries. He is presently one of the most knowledgeable and experienced Kundalini Yoga teachers in the world. He was recognized by Yogi Bhajan himself as a Level I and Level II Kundalini Yoga teacher trainer and sits as a founding member of TTEC (Kundalini Research Institute's Educational Council). 

Guru Dass is a teacher with the gift of the word, of speaking in a manner that frees the mind and opens the heart. His classes offer us a journey through wisdom, self-empowerment and love. As a musician (Berklee College of Music Alumni), he has recorded numerous mantra and spiritual song CDs. His latest CD is titled NAMO, an expression of Guru Dass dedication to the path of Love. 

You can find his music in www.spiritvoyage.com


The team Behind Personal Guru

Klas Moberg, co-founder, is a serial entrepreneur with an extensive interest in Kundalini Yoga. Klas is a global consultant within business development.

Magnus Bylund, co-founder, is all about design and honest content. Magnus is the owner of Honest Communication, www.honest.se, with great precision and aesthetic sense.

Sponsor

www.raj108.com

• Understanding the Mind - the thinking vs the working mind

…and many more
Other themes:

 • The workings of the mind  - the working mind vs the thinking mind and learning how to distinguish them
 • The trappings of the thinking mind: judgement, prejudice, habit, safety, control, comfort, fear, guilt.
 • “Not Now” - how to free yourself from the grasp of the thinking mind and disempowering old habits and beliefs
•  Discovering The Flow: Being You in the Present Moment
•  Stress and Personal Sustainability
•  Recognizing, measuring and managing one's stress levels
•  How to use Mindfulness in your daily life (work, home, etc.)‚ to access different and new ways to handle common challenges 
•  How to bring compassion, empathy, communication, purposefulness, motivation into personal and professional roles
•  Learning how to listen: working with feedback and being open to criticism


Who is Guru Dass 
Guru Dass, a direct disciple of Yogi Bhajan (Kundalini Yoga) and Ramesh Balsekar (Advaita) began his spiritual quest as a teen, having his first Kundalini Yoga experience at the Woodstock Festival in 1969. By the time he was 18 he was living in an ashram and teaching Kundalini Yoga. At 20 he had travelled to India and studied with different masters. In the 70’s he pioneered Kundalini Yoga in Spain and Europe. For years Guru Dass accompanied Yogi Bhajan as his personal musician, in the USA, Europe and India. He often played during his classes, bringing the gift of his music to Yogiji’s meditations. Since 2001 Guru Dass has been traveling, teaching and sharing his music worldwide. He has trained hundreds of Kundalini Yoga teachers in courses he leads in different countries. He is presently one of the most knowledgeable and experienced Kundalini Yoga teachers in the world. He was recognized by Yogi Bhajan himself as a Level I and Level II Kundalini Yoga teacher trainer and sits as a founding member of TTEC (Kundalini Research Institute's Educational Council). Guru Dass is a teacher with the gift of the word, of speaking in a manner that frees the mind and opens the heart. His classes offer us a journey through wisdom, self-empowerment and love. As a musician (Berklee College of Music Alumni), he has recorded numerous mantra and spiritual song CDs. His latest CD is titled NAMO, an expression of Guru Dass dedication to the path of Love. You can find his music in www.spiritvoyage.comThe team Behind Personal GuruKlas Moberg, co-founder, is a serial entrepreneur with an extensive interest in Kundalini Yoga. Klas is a global consultant within business development.Magnus Bylund, co-founder, is all about design and honest content. Magnus is the owner of Honest Communication, www.honest.se, with great precision and aesthetic sense.Sponsorwww.raj108.com

story:
Short Summary

The people of Burlington seek meaningful change in their lives. People are searching for ways to bring deep fulfillment and implement nourishing habits so that each may experience a greater fullness of being. 

In tandem with this yearning for growth and change among the people, downtown Burlington is itself undergoing a Main Street revitalization. Buildings first vacated, then owned by private industry are now in the hands of innovators and developers, and great things are happening. Among the innovation and cooperation, I seek to bring the healing arts to the downtown community. My call to action among teachers and healers is met with support and enthusiasm. We are energy workers, herbalists, doulas, and bodyworkers. We are living examples of what a holistic approach to life can look and feel like. Together we will bring our experience and wisdom and become a destination, a place where people can come seeking answers, seeking support, and seeking community. 

My name is Karin Elizabeth. I am a healer, and I am a teacher. I provide reiki healing sessions and reiki training classes in North Carolina. I help people to take the power of healing into their own hands. I also teach and practice meditation and whole foods nutrition, and I help people make realistic changes in their daily lives so they can live with more vitality and fulfillment. This has been a way of life for me for over twenty years. I've lived and offered my services and classes in this community for over four years. My clients and students come from Raleigh, Cary, Durham, Chapel Hill, Saxapahaw, Graham, Burlington, and Elon.

This space will provide a healing room for seeing clients and a gathering space for classes, workshops, and social gatherings for those seeking to meet others who share their goals of improving their health and their lives.  This space will house an apothecary and shop with items that support health and healing,

What We Need 

The ideal location is available right now. It is in a beautiful, newly renovated building along a main road, and it is to be shared with others whose work will draw people seeking enrichment and better quality of living. Our work will complement one another. I have already signed the lease, and we open our doors February 1. But we cannot do it alone. This is a community center, and it needs the support of the local community as well as the greater health & healing community to thrive and truly become the place of support and growth for all who seek personal change.

We need $3500 to secure this space and furnish it with enough materials to get the center started. I have $1000 saved, and the costs of running this campaign are about 8-10% of donations received. Therefore, I am asking for $2700 to be raised by this campaign. 

All funds raised go directly to securing the space and supplying it with basic furnishings to comfortably see clients and hold classes. Start-up costs include: the security deposit and first two months rent; two months liability insurance; commissioning the signs for the front door and for the road; basic promotional materials; and basic furnishings for the healing room, reading nook, and class space. Within the first two months, other healers and teachers will begin offering classes and seeing clients at the center, and our combined participation will help to pay the bills thereafter. As the business grows, we will enclose the healing room so a healer can see a client privately while others gather with a teacher for a workshop or class. 

If we exceed our goal, it will go directly into the next phase of the project, which is building sound-insulated walls in the healing room and then outfitting the apothecary & shop with shelving and a check-out table and beginning to purchase inventory. Beyond that? Oh, you'd better sit down. The vision is big, and it is already happening. While there isn't space to write it all here, let's meet for tea. I'll happily share it with you.

Giving & Receiving

I learned long ago that when the time is right, you cannot wait or the moment will pass you by. This is why I am certain I must act now, secure this space, and begin. This campaign gives the other healers, teachers, and medicine-makers time to prepare for expanding their work into this community. It gives them time to adjust their schedules as they will now expand their teaching into this community, and it allows them time to prepare the inventory of  herbal remedies and other products for the apothecary & shop.
Your generosity and support do not go unnoticed. I am a firm believer in reciprocation. The next page will detail for you gestures I put forward as a way of expressing my deep gratitude for your participation. If you would prefer another form of reciprocation, such as learning to read food labels with a discerning eye, just ask. I am creative, and I am flexible.

The Impact

When you are making positive changes to your life, success is easier when you feel supported. When you have all of the resources to support your health and healing nearby, you are more likely to stay committed to your goals. Within the center, clients can learn, experience, and receive the tools to effect lasting change. There is a sunny nook for sipping complimentary tea and perusing our resource library. This is a place to gather, to stop in and ask a question, and to rest from the worries of the world for a while. It is a place to learn at a short workshop or an all-day class, to join in for a Sunday evening documentary, to experience the profound effects of a healing session. We are walking distance to the food co-op, another business supporting the health and well-being of the people of our area. This proximity promotes the abundance of us all. 

I come with a vision, and I come with a purpose. I also come with a reputation for effecting change. I am a catalyst. People who have worked with me know that I am passionate about what I do. I take living well very seriously.

Challenges

The people of the community are ready. The physical location is ready. I am ready. Other healers and teachers are interested in joining the center, and together we are designing how each can participate materially and/or physically by contributing directly to the rent, renting space per class or healing session, selling their products, or working in the shop. Together, we will thrive. This location is ideal for our center, and so I must act now to secure the location.

This campaign provides for covering expenses for the first two months of business, which gives my colleagues time to get their products ready and schedules organized to begin offering more to the community. Some will begin offering classes and seeing clients the first day we open the door.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can help us to realize this vision by spreading the word. Please, tell your friends! Tell your colleagues! Forward this message to anyone you think may be interested in supporting this for the community of Burlington and its surrounding areas, and for supporting the health and well-being of us all. You can use the Indie Go Go tools to share this campaign on social media, but I do suggest using copy + paste of the link to send it by email.

Thank you so much for your time and attention. Thank you for any way you can help bring this center into being!

story:
Short Summary

When MJ and Kooper started Suckatash in 2014, they wanted to create a men's toy that was fun, safe and would feel great. Against a sea of cheap, poorly designed and just plain weird toys, The Booty was born. 

The wild success of the first Booty has led to the development of The Booty 2.0.

Back by popular demand, The Booty 2.0 has kept the classic shape with an even better rubber material, two newly designed interior channels and a weight distribution that puts the 'sex' back in 'sex toy.' 

Now available in two colors: light & dark, The Booty is a great gift for the modern gentleman who also happens to be an ass man. 

Visit our webpage for more info: www.suckatashmenstoys.com

This is not a fundraising campaign! This is an exclusive pre-sales event. 

The Booty 2.0 is in the middle of it's development phase and being offered to our fans here first. This is your early opportunity to get in on The Booty 2.0. With this funding, we'll do an expanded global launch, but the prices will go up to reflect the higher quality of the new product after this event is over. 

  • Feel: The Booty 2.0 is made from a unique rubber not found amongst North American flesh toys. 
  • Shape: The curve of the Booty is suspended up off the base so the weight of the cheeks rocks against you during use. It is a perfect handful, in any position!
  • Weight: This toy is 10 lbs of ass! Unlike any hand held device, the feel of this baby will change how you feel about solo-sex.  
  • Two Holes & Two Ribbings: The Booty comes with a vaginal and anal opening and just like real life, they feel different. Add some variety to your fun without having to break the fantasy. 
  • Free Shipping in the United States! We are proud to be an American-owned business. 


That's awesome, but why am I reading it on Indiegogo? 

Crowdsourcing website are a great way to bring you toys that don't exist yet. No other company has created a men's toy quite like ours. This is the best way for us to get you the latest and greatest materials and designs for your personal pleasure.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help! Please share our page with any ass-loving friends that might be interested.

story:
What is Flour and Ice?

Hello everyone! First of all, thank you for visiting my page. Flour and Ice has been something I've been dreaming about since I graduated culinary school in 2009. 

After attending The French Culinary Institute, I worked as a pastry chef in both New York City and Austin, Texas. Now, I feel I am ready to start my own venture and create a product I am really proud of.
Flour and Ice seeks to provide nostalgic desserts in grown-up flavors. I feel such joy when I am creating one of these desserts, and I hope a fraction of that joy reaches my customer when they eat it.
So what do I need?

Flour and Ice has been chosen to be at the New York City Bridal Expo in February! While I am insanely excited, a booth (with samples for 1,000 guests) is $800. The funds will be used to create the samples and pay for the booth. This is an amazing opportunity for Flour and Ice to showcase our desserts to a captive audience. If I don't hit my goal, any funds will be used to cover the cost of attendance at the expo.

The Impact

If anyone knows me, they know I always follow through on a task. When I decided to pursue Flour and Ice, I knew it would be an all or nothing venture. This bridal expo is an opportunity for great exposure and minimal cost and any and all help is more than appreciated. 

I know that starting a business isn't easy. However, with this bridal expo, I will gain the traction I need to explore other ventures - Smorgasburg, I'm comin' for ya!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially, please don't worry! If you can get the word out about my product and my website, I would be forever grateful. Thank you again for your support!

story:
Short Summary

“Team Work Makes The Dream Work”

In 2015 l became involved with USTA’s Diversity and Inclusion program to help grow tennis in communities. I volunteered to organize tennis programs and teach basic fundamentals to kids age 10 and under. I discovered many neighborhoods do not have tennis courts outside. The lack of facilities created a monumental problem to my objective. I studied the problem and later I created the mobile tennis screen. People can now engage anytime and place with the mobile screen.
Over the past 2 years I have conducted more than 60 demonstrations in 4 Midwest States where people liked the product. Also, EZ PT has been recognized to be useful in Physical Therapy Programs. We need your support. Team work will make the dream work.  Many people had the opportunity to experience EZ Pop Tennis - who wouldn’t have, I feel ready to move forward with production. All funding received will be used for business development, product development and manufacturing, further marketing and product storage. 

“Team work will make the Dream Work”  I am networking everyday to inspire people to join me on social media.  Ask a friend to support us. Help Fund “Making Tennis Easy And Available”- Remember the Williams Sisters who became Champions.  Anything is possible given the opportunity.

 

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Create, Save & Send Future Messages to Family & Friends - No Matter What! 

(Upcoming) Features

The problem:

If something happens to us, will we get to say I love you one last time?

What about I forgive you? Who will preserve our favorite memories and secret recipes? Our childhood stories?

In 2001, when our founder Brandon held his twin boys for the first time, he felt a depth of emotion and responsibility only a parent can understand. A few months later, 9/11 struck. He could not stop thinking, as he left his boys to go to work each day, "Did those 2,977 people get to say I love you one last time?”

He realized that, with today’s technology, he could build a solution that guarantees a ‘yes’—not only for I love you, but for everything else too.

Introducing WheniLeave.com

We believe that everyone can—and should—decide what they leave behind, no matter what. WheniLeave.com (WiL) is an online platform for you to create messages for family, friends, and anyone else, to be delivered when you pass.

How it works

1. Create Your Messages

Take as much time as you need creating your message in our platform, designed to give you a calm, cozy, private space to reflect. As you live and learn, you can come back to edit anytime.

2. Choose Your Recipients

Enter the current and backup contact information of the special someone who will receive your words.

3. Assign Your Trustees

Your trustees will notify us when you pass. Once we hear from all of them, we'll deliver your messages according to your wishes.

A solution for people in any stage of living, proven by 30+ interviews and 150+ surveys

“My in-laws lived through two world wars, immigrated from another country, raised three children, and are now proud grandparents. Their legacy is the wisdom they have to share, and thanks to WheniLeave.com, their message can be passed on to many more generations to come.”

– Crystal M

“During a three-decade journey with Lyme, mold illness, and other health complications, we never knew what was around the corner. Another seizure? Another ER visit? With all of the unknowns, I understand how encouraging it would be to have more influence over part of the story, even if it is the goodbye. To be able to say thank you to everyone that stayed by your side. To leave them with a smile and the enduring message that what they did mattered.”

– Melissa F

Protect what really matters to you

Life is unpredictable. Until now, insurance has only covered your car, home, and savings. By creating and storing your WheniLeave.com messages, you’ll be able to protect your wishes, memories, thoughts, and feelings too.

Never leave a heartfelt thought unsaid

You’re busy—moments pass. Our simple, welcoming platform makes it easy to ensure you appreciate a parent’s remark, deeply thank a teacher, or tell a friend how much she means.

We need your help

With our current working prototype, you can write letter messages. We have some amazing new features in progress and, only with your generous support, can release them next year:

  • Photo Memories: Decorate your words with special photos from over the years.

  • Speech-to-Text: Simply speak into a recording device, and your words will automatically be translated to text in our platform.

  • Audio Message: Upload an audio file, like a lullaby, poem, or story in your own voice.

  • Video Message: Upload a video file for an extra personal touch.

  • 360 Review: Pull in all your favorite media from across all the places you've been doing it all in one place!

And this is only the beginning.  The products in our roadmap are revolutionary like "WiL." 

What your pledge will do

Our Indiegogo goal of $25,000 will cover content, UI/UX design, and web development, as well as legal, hosting, and licensing fees for building our prototype into a complete platform. We’ve also budgeted in the costs of making your perks and shipping them to you, plus the 5% Indiegogo fee.


Your donation allows us to provide the best experience possible for your life-defining moments.

Rewards

Be part of a movement for inner peace

“I want to ensure that those I leave behind—my husband, my child, my best friend—will always have a means of remembering what they have meant to me, to know what joy they gave to me, so they know they have mattered and made a difference. WheniLeave.com gives me that peace of mind.”

– CM, 49, Gen X
“Who wouldn’t want to leave some last remarks to people they love dearly?”

– MM, 30, Millennial
“Knowing how things can change so quickly puts extra emphasis on keeping in touch and telling people you care for that you love them.”

– NK, 43, Gen X

“As I grow older, I understand more and more the importance of communicating my thoughts and feelings towards family and friends. WheniLeave.com is a revolutionary way to insure that these messages are delivered safely and conveniently.”

– DW, 47, Gen X

“I want to leave some kind of messages for my loved ones to turn to wherever they miss me.”

– LY, 28, Millennial

Founders

Brandon Na

Brandon is a seasoned entrepreneur who has started and run several businesses over the past two decades including leading one to grow 1400% in less than 3 short years. The entire time, he was only waiting for the right time to bring this special idea into the world. Finally, after hearing about too many people, both close and afar, not being able to leave behind the important stories of their lives, he knew he couldn't wait any longer.

WheniLeave.com Team

To bring you WheniLeave.com, Brandon has handpicked the most passionate, inspired people he knows. Our team includes the designers behind Chipotle and Comcast, as well as the technical talent of startups like Dollar Flight Club & seed-funded companies like AdmitSee. Our strategic advisors have served, and currently serve, on executive teams and boards of top national retail brands and international non-profits.

 

Thank you. Your support means everything to us.

 

BROUGHT TO YOU BY
story_txt:
Create, Save & Send Future Messages to Family & Friends - No Matter What! (Upcoming) FeaturesThe problem: If something happens to us, will we get to say I love you one last time?What about I forgive you? Who will preserve our favorite memories and secret recipes? Our childhood stories?In 2001, when our founder Brandon held his twin boys for the first time, he felt a depth of emotion and responsibility only a parent can understand. A few months later, 9/11 struck. He could not stop thinking, as he left his boys to go to work each day, "Did those 2,977 people get to say I love you one last time?”He realized that, with today’s technology, he could build a solution that guarantees a ‘yes’—not only for I love you, but for everything else too.Introducing WheniLeave.comWe believe that everyone can—and should—decide what they leave behind, no matter what. WheniLeave.com (WiL) is an online platform for you to create messages for family, friends, and anyone else, to be delivered when you pass.How it works1. Create Your MessagesTake as much time as you need creating your message in our platform, designed to give you a calm, cozy, private space to reflect. As you live and learn, you can come back to edit anytime.2. Choose Your RecipientsEnter the current and backup contact information of the special someone who will receive your words.3. Assign Your TrusteesYour trustees will notify us when you pass. Once we hear from all of them, we'll deliver your messages according to your wishes.A solution for people in any stage of living, proven by 30+ interviews and 150+ surveys“My in-laws lived through two world wars, immigrated from another country, raised three children, and are now proud grandparents. Their legacy is the wisdom they have to share, and thanks to WheniLeave.com, their message can be passed on to many more generations to come.”– Crystal M“During a three-decade journey with Lyme, mold illness, and other health complications, we never knew what was around the corner. Another seizure? Another ER visit? With all of the unknowns, I understand how encouraging it would be to have more influence over part of the story, even if it is the goodbye. To be able to say thank you to everyone that stayed by your side. To leave them with a smile and the enduring message that what they did mattered.”– Melissa FProtect what really matters to youLife is unpredictable. Until now, insurance has only covered your car, home, and savings. By creating and storing your WheniLeave.com messages, you’ll be able to protect your wishes, memories, thoughts, and feelings too.Never leave a heartfelt thought unsaidYou’re busy—moments pass. story:
Want to age beautifully? Then protect your skin and nurture it with ingredients that will "stemulate" the natural reproduction of new vibrant healthy skin. Stemulation is formulated to feed and nourish your skin.

Whether you are concerned about aging or simply slowing down the process, Stemulation will help you love your reflection.  

 

 

The science of stem cells

Stemulation is based on the science of stem cells.  Numerous medical and scientific published studies are at the core of our formulation protocol.

We are born with an abundance of stem cells that support our growth to maturity.  A demonstration of this is how quickly an infant grows, but as we mature to adulthood, we have fewer and fewer stem cells to restore and repair traumas of the body.

Stemulation solves this issue by introducing growth factors that support and encourage the missing stem cells that produce these growth factors by reintroducing bio-identical growth factors topically.  

 

 

 

Revolutionary technology 

"Liquid Gold"  is the foundation of the line and is the broad spectrum serum that acts as the multivitamin for the skin.  

  • With the highest concentration of growth factors and botanical antioxidants, "Liquid Gold" is effective in addressing most common skin concerns.
  • The growth factors help to stabilize the production of the sebaceous gland production which can reduce breakouts and acne.
  • Additionally, growth factors "stemulate" the production of collagen and elastin which keeps the skin plump and supple, thus has a very valuable effect in reducing the signs of aging.  

Ideal for these concerns: fine lines and wrinkles, free radical damage, sun damage, acne, hyperpigmentation, dryness and dehydration, rosacea, dark spots

Ideal for these skin types: normal, oily, and combination skin, acne-prone skin, mature skin

How to use: Apply 1-2 pumps of Stemulation Serum to clean face and neck to improve the appearance of skin texture and tone. For maximum benefits use twice daily

 

 

What, why and when

Stemulation Skin Care uses distinct proven methods to improve the overall condition of the skin.

  • The treatment of the skin tissue with growth factors, antioxidants, botanicals, and peptides that nurture and stimulate a healthy response for our skin to promote the production of collagen and elastin.  Critical to the ability to retain hydration and fight off fine lines and wrinkles.
  • Stemulation utilizes bio-identical stem cell growth factors - Our stem cell growth factors are produced in a pharmaceutical laboratory.  They are synthetic, not human or animal-derived.

 

 

Glow from within

The real test of skincare is the ability to go sans makeup and let the luster of your natural beauty shine through. Want better-looking skin? Stemulation Skin Care helps improve the appearance of a wide array of skin issues like acne, rosacea, dry skin, fine lines, and more.

 

Why we need your help

We were in the process of updating our packaging prior to the pandemic, it is an expensive process and with the closures, we nearly didn’t make it.  But thankfully the current pandemic has reminded us of the importance of sticking together in the world as it has changed the lives of all people and small businesses.

To maneuver through this challenge we had to shift our focus from selling almost exclusively to professionals to selling our products directly to you. 

Our goals for the future

Stemulation Skin Care is committed to creating exceptional and ethically-produced skincare products. As we move along our journey towards sustainability, we’ll keep you updated through our social channels and our website. And of course, we’re here to answer any questions you may have.

How we'll use the funds:

  • Complete our packaging initiative. 
  • Focus on ethical, organic, sustainable ingredients
  • Reduced production costs
  • Continued creation of exceptional effective skincare products   

 

Follow our journey!
