story:
Short Summary

My name is Jason Venckus and I am the founder of Momentum Fitness and Health and Momentum Power Foods which produces Regain.  Momentum Fitness and Health was created after my own health struggles and after becoming a personal trainer and health coach. In my late 20’s my own health was at risk. I drank, smoked and ate fast food almost daily. By 28 I was already taking 3 daily pills. I decided I was not going to go down that path. I started exercising and changing my nutrition. Processed foods and fast food were almost completely eliminated from my diet. I felt so good that I wanted to run 5k races and that blossomed into marathons and half-iron distance races. I eventually became a Personal Trainer, Health Coach and Fitness Nutrition Specialist.

I needed a natural recovery drink to compliment my new lifestyle. After reading up on coconut water and tart cherry juice I decided to mix the two together in my shaker cup for post race recovery. Someone said to me, “I would buy this!"

That was all I needed to hear, and I began to find the right recipe. I needed to make sure each ingredient was free of additives and contained a complete electrolyte profile. In our video, you will see testimonials from athletes of all ages. See below how we hope to have an impact on the environment as well. Momentum Fitness Companies looks to create a lasting legacy of health for people and the planet.

What We Need & What You Get

Simply put, we need about $15,000 for our first run. We have many people asking for this product and where they can get it. With 1/3-1/2 the sugar of major brands, no chemical preservatives, sweeteners or colors and no added sugar from cane sugar or concentrates many want this for themselves and especially for their kids. We already have $2500+ so we are asking for $12,500. This will help us to get a professional label designed, ingredients and packaging ordered and cover our insurance costs so that we can partner with a contract bottler. We will also need to be non-gmo and/or organic certified. We are already incorporated and trademarked. 

Our product is geared mostly towards the athlete, though it does have benefits for the weekend warrior, concert goers, those suffering from hangover and those concerned about their general health. Our perks will reflect that. We want to give you functional things for your daily life, not clutter your home with more stuff you won't use. Of course we'll have stickers, shirts (nice shirts, not bulky cotton) and headbands but also bottle cozies (since we bottle in glass), custom coolers, drawstring bags and a party Ice Tub. There will be special perks for gym owners that will allow them to preorder sellable product at a 25% off discount.

We have already done so much leg work to build up clientele. We have been doing small scale production for our own studio and some other gyms. We have been in talks with semi-professional teams as well. So, if we do not meet our fundraising goal we will pay you your perks and scale up as much as we can and continue to build. This is not something we are giving up on! Read more about the impact we plan on having! 

 

Our Mission To Be a Green Company

We also genuinely care about the environment and sustainability and this is evident in all phases of the production of our product. We plan to bottle in the most sustainable way. We will accomplish this by bottling in glass as it is infinitely recyclable and even easier to reuse. Studies show that only 28% of glass is recycled globally. The main reason is that glass is not put in the recycle bins properly in order to be recycled. We, as a company, will use social media to promote proper recycling procedures for our by-products. In addition we have instituted a bottle return policy. Those returning bottles will receive discounts on future purchases for each bottle returned. 

We will source our coconuts from farms that support sustainable farming practices and initiatives. Currently 4.1 billion coconuts are harvested each year. Many of the husks end up in the ocean but there are companies finding many uses for them including: shipping pallets, cat litter, mulch, organic pest repellent (slugs), bedding/litter for reptiles, mushroom growth, mosquito repellent and FUEL! In time we hope to open solar/wind powered bottling plants and use fuel efficient/alternative fuel vehicles. 

Regain is not just good for you, it is good for the planet. Our goal is to also create a charity that raises money for the planet, people and animals. 5% of Momentum Power Foods proceeds and 1% from Momentum Fitness and Health will go to this charity. Momentum Fitness Companies looks to create a lasting legacy of health for people and the planet.

Both businesses have green missions and look to use our status to improve the planet. Current successful campaigns include monthly plogging groups (picking up litter while jogging), Styrofoam collection for recycling and gardener's exchanges where local gardeners grow produce, swap with each other and donate 10-50% to local families in need. Because of these programs, the founder of Momentum Fitness Companies, will be given an award this year as a top 30 Entrepreneur Under 40 by the West Suburban Chamber of Commerce and Industry (Chicago). 

How We Know We Will Be Successful

Getting seen is always the hardest part of any business. Many people fear getting rejected when they ask to show a new product. This has not been an issue for us. We ask to do tastings and if we get a yes, we do it! If not, we move on to the next opportunity. We have a fan base already and people looking to get involved from gyms themselves to athletes, doctors and nurses! We just need the means to get it in their hands. Our team is very motivated, willing to do the legwork and get out in the public! We sponsor youth athletic teams and events that allow us to be present with our product and gain new customers every week! We have sampled at gyms and semi-professional sports events and have been met with great success! You can find all the testimonials on our website: www.findingyourmomentum.com/regain. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Though we tried to keep smaller levels of donations available, we understand that not everyone can help in that way. If we have inspired you in any way or if you feel the same way we do about standard sports drinks, the health of people and the planet, then please share our campaign. Indiegogo makes it really simple by providing one click tools.

story:
**It was tested in a 1m^3 Test Cabinet by the certified labs in 2019  (PS: Most of the certifications of the existing portable air purifiers were tested in 50cm^3 test Cabinet only.)

 

Certification

*Official Test Reports from Japan FIA in 2019

 

Daily Applications

Ionizo purifies the air through the negative ions it generates, which attach themselves to air pollutants including the likes of dust, allergens and viruses, making the particles too heavy to remain airborne. 

The air in your immediate surrounding will be ionized and purified:

Keeps you informed if your loved ones fall victim to unhealthy air:

 

Ionic Purifying

Ionizo creates a pollution-free environment around you, the emitted ions of Ionizo is *50 times more than natural forest ion concentration, so you could feel just like bathing in the pureness of nature. 

 

Real-time Monitoring

Ionizo keeps a constant watch over the quality of air surroundings that brings peace of mind by knowing your loved ones are well protected and away from any harm of pollution.

 

Designed For Travel

Ionizo is thoughtfully designed to be compact for portability. It’s only 45g and perfectly fits your daily clothing with necklace or clip so that you could breathe freely wherever you go. 

Built-in lithium battery, fast rechargeable via USB Type C. Operation time can be up to 4 days:

 

Double Protection 

We want to do more as well as do better in development so that our new products will not only clean the environment but also complement the range already in the market. 

 

Works Behind

Artfully crafted curves render the product compact and delightful to the eyes. The design is a showcase of elegance in simplicity. 

 

Production Stage

Our product is in the production stage. The moulding process is finished for production meaning that we are ready to produce. The estimated time for production and delivery takes about 2 months. 

 

Purification Test

Team and Credits

The project team was formed in 2016 under the cooperation between a Japanese company and a Hong Kong company. As a result of the joint efforts by various talents, we were able to showcase the product in front of everyone here and now. Our persistence to never settle for less will guarantee that we will deliver a product so carefully made that will surpass the expectations of our backers. 

 

Risk and Challenge

Together with our backers, we look forward to the birth of Ionizo. We can only imagine how excited you would be when you receive the Ionizo. It is our promise to dedicate all efforts to bring to life this innovative portable air-purifier to meet your expectations.

With the aim to deliver as early as possible, we have already signed agreements with relevant parties, so that they are ready for the mass production to start. Our team will do the very best to ensure the smooth running of production, although we have to keep our kind backers reminded that there could be challenges force majeure that might cause a possible delay. We are well prepared now to affront any challenges, and we would love your participation in this project. Please share it with your friends, and together we can witness the momentum birth of Ionizo.

As a result of the joint efforts by various talents, we were able to showcase the product in front of everyone here and now. Our persistence to never settle for less will guarantee that we will deliver a product so carefully made that will surpass the expectations of our backers. 
 
Risk and Challenge
Together with our backers, we look forward to the birth of Ionizo. We can only imagine how excited you would be when you receive the Ionizo. It is our promise to dedicate all efforts to bring to life this innovative portable air-purifier to meet your expectations.
With the aim to deliver as early as possible, we have already signed agreements with relevant parties, so that they are ready for the mass production to start. Our team will do the very best to ensure the smooth running of production, although we have to keep our kind backers reminded that there could be challenges force majeure that might cause a possible delay. We are well prepared now to affront any challenges, and we would love your participation in this project. Please share it with your friends, and together we can witness the momentum birth of Ionizo.

story:
ABOUT ME

Hi! My name is Joshelle Jackson and I am the Founder and Creator of Retro Elle. Back in 2013, I became a mother to a beautiful baby girl. Til this day, I continue to feel my daughter is the greatest gift God has given me. Unfortunately, during that time, I had also developed postpartum depression. I was still getting use to living in Atlanta, GA for the first time and miles away from all my family and loved ones who were in Connecticut. I often questioned, how could such a joyful gift cause me to feel so low? So, I decided to take back my power and started paying more attention to my selfcare and overall wellness. I attended therapy and would often use my daughter's naps and bedtime as my personal selfcare routine. I called it #mommymetime. If I had at least 15-20 minutes of alone time, I was good. I started creating my own natural beauty products (body butters, bath soaks, candles, etc.) that I would use during bath time, yoga and meditation. I started noticing a dramatic shift in my mood and was on the road to recovery!

 

WHY I CREATED RETRO ELLE

The word Retro means: Imitative of a style, fashion, design or things from the recent past. Denoting action that is directed backward. The word Elle means: she, her (in French).  

I created Retro Elle because I feel that society paints this image that once you become a mom, you are supposed to be mute and who you were once before should retreat into the universe somewhere. You are now a mom and should sacrifice everything you have and all that you are for your children. But, before you were a mom, mama, mommy, mother, you were Elle! You had an identity. You had goals. You had ambition. You had a purpose. And, it's time you get to HER!

 

OUR MISSION

Our mission is to reminder others that selfcare IS NOT SELFISH especially as a mother! If we don't take time to care for our mental, physical and emotional wellness, how can we be great mothers for our children, family or loved ones?

 

RETRO ELLE PRODUCTS & COMMUNITY

Here at Retro Elle, we will be selling natural beauty products such as: whipped body butters, soaps, baths soaks, bath bombs, candles, etc. As a busy mom, we want to accommodate you in experiencing a meaningful selfcare routine and #mommymetime right in the comfort of your home.

In the near future, we would also like to start creating #MOMMYMETIME community workshops here in Atlanta, GA. We would like to host an event once a month or once every other month for mothers in the local area to get together to social and participate in activities such as: yoga, educational empowerment classes, dance, aerobics, budgeting, etc. with other mothers. We want mothers to look forward to enjoying some much needed time for themselves while having fun!

 

WAYS YOU CAN HELP

I first want to say thank you for taking the time to learn about myself and Retro Elle. You can help me with starting my company by:

  1. Making a donation of any amount you choose. This a one time donation so you want accrue any monthly fees. Any amount whether big or small makes a HUGE difference! :-)
  2. You can purchase one of two of my perks: PERK 1 (2 oz. whipped body butter) or PERK 2 (2 oz. whipped body butter, sticker set, #mommymetime Bucket List, and a handwritten note from me). :-)
  3.  If you cannot make a monetary donation, there still is help in the power of sharing. You can share a post about my campaign on your social media or simply share with family or friends! :-)

story:
Short Summary

Many entrepreneurs are trooping to Ghana to open up businesses because it is one best and safest places in Africa to invest. 
I think some unexplored areas are the fields of medical research and supercomputing. Ghana is one of the leading countries in terms of scientific innovation. For instance, there is a drone delivery system for saving lives. And recently, Bill Gates praised the country's immunization system for gains over diseases like polio.
There are some modern research facilities in the country. But there are a few to no facilities dedicated to computational biology/chemistry to test theoretical ideas. 
I want to undertake a project that will contribute to growth; in drug development, practical education, and scientific findings.
In this project, I want to build a state of the art computational biology/chemistry facility accompanied by capable computer systems. 

What We Need & What You Get

We need up to $2,000,000.00. This money will go towards building a state of the art computational biology/chemistry facility through a  collaboration between Ghanaian industry players, institutions, and other international prestigious computational science labs. Also, part of the money will go into the development of computer clusters (or supercomputer) made up of 300 or more inter-linked powerful computer workstations and servers. The computer system will be designed and built through collaborations with the appropriate institutional departments and technical teams. 

The Impact

The coronavirus disease is a pandemic that has caused many problems around the world. I think in the future there may be similar deadly outbreaks like this around the world. The world has become a small community due to internet communication, so we are capable of sharing information. Hence, the advancement of medical research capabilities in any country makes the world a safer place. Ghana has many untapped potentials in terms of scientific development. And there are many productive ideas (or projects) that have died because of limited resources. The facility and computer system I am proposing will add up to the resources needed to advance efficient medical research and host computational intensive projects across Ghana and Africa. I believe that this will encourage several scientific and technological undertakings and promote competition. We will use the facility to train scientists and work with pharmaceutical firms on drug development.  Also, we will dedicate the facility for studying plant or herbal medications to develop safer drugs and to reproduce ancient plant-derived medicinal formulas. Herbal (or plant-based) drugs are the go-to medications for most people in Ghana and Africa; for treatments and boosting immunity.

Risks & Challenges

Scientific findings and breakthroughs take time and dedication. It is also expensive as it involves a lot of resources.
I have collaborated with groups of scientists to develop novel drug molecules. My contribution to a project on protein-DNA interactions got me a second author on a publication. I have designed techniques for studying protein-surface interactions on a supercomputer.  A better understanding of protein-surface interactions is key to developing better artificial transplants. At the moment, I am contributing to the fight against COVID-19 by studying how COVID-19 interacts with various surfaces.
I have mentored hundreds of high school students. Also, I have helped people build computer workstations for their projects. 
I have worked with diverse scientists (or labs) in material engineering, applied mathematics, and computational structural biology departments in Universities in America. With proper funding, my experience, and the necessary advice, I believe we can make this dream come true.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please get the word out and make some noise about our course.
And use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
About Preactly

We are a Swedish team of four dedicated people focused to stop the increased mental health issues at workplaces. It all starts with self-awareness of as many people as possible about what is affecting us. Our tool and model contribute to that and to how you as an individual may take your self-control.

We studied a massive amount of research on what factors affect us as individuals. This was the beginning of our development of Preactly Digital Health Management Tool. We did it together with experts in different areas behavioral science and public health science, because it is a complex interplay of factors involving work-life, life outside work and lifestyle, that all affects our mental well-being.

Different countries report different numbers, but in general 10-20 % of all adults have some kind of mental health disorder. If we combine stress related headache or anxious the numbers are even higher. It is no longer possible to think that this cannot be you or I.

Preactly is a tool for knowledge, insights, reflection and self-empowerment for your own well-being. Based on questions about your own experience, it lets you follow your own changes over time. This is one of the most imortant things to be aware of and let you act in time and before it is too late.

From start we developed Preactly for workplaces and we launched it on the labour market in Sweden. However, a small user survey showed that over 80 % of our users liked to use our tool at work and many would like to use our tool for their own sake, if it would be available.

"It feels much needed! The tests have been very good, incredibly easy to get started and a nice yet simple layout. The instruction and language as very supportive. I never had to read twice or think about it, but could instinctively answer."

"Interesting and educational. Feedback that suited me."

Therefore, we realised with some adjustments we could also make a version of Preactly available as an individual tool for employees and entrepreneurs. This way we can make it available for a lot more people and make a bigger impact. Now we need your help to do so!

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need your support to make the development and changes required to launch Preactly as a tool not only to organisations, but also to individual employees and entrepreneurs. With a funding of 9 500 EURO/9 850 USD (100 000 SEK) we can in three months develop and test the new versions.

In return you will of course get to use Preactly. We offer you a full year license. The options you may choose between are:

  • For Employee or Entrepreneur
  • Swedish or English
  • Use every month or every other month

Preactly is made to be intuitive and easy to use. And you will get automatically reminded so that you actually put off time. You don't even need to use it that often. Give yourself half an hour once in a while for reflection on how things in your life affects you.

The tool is divided into modules that all have three parts.

  1. Starts with the questions.
  2. Get feedback from each module and reflect on the knowledge and insights.
  3. Make active choices for if you want to set some factors up for improvement.

Then you will get guided to prioritize chosen areas for improvement and all the way to actions. The tool will remind you to follow up every or every other month depending on your choice.

 

Risks & Challenges

In tech, development delays can of course arise, but we have a good estimation since we already launched Preactly WorkPlace to the labor market. And we know what adjustments we need to make.

If our crowdfunding campaign succeeds we expect to be done by the end of May 2020. It can vary a little bit depending on if you have chosen Preactly Entrepreneur or Preactly Employee.

If the campaign does not reach its goal, it might delay development one or two months, or we will down-scale the presentation of over time statistics at first. 

Even though we already have done a lot of tests, this will be a new version of the product and you will get the absolutely first real release. With support from our in-house developers you will get instant feedback on any addressed issue.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Do you feel that this topic is as important as we do? Then please help us in our mission and spread our campaign by sharing and telling. That would meant a great deal for us!

Do you like to offer all your employees the opportunity to use Preactly, or use it as a workplace tool? Please get in touch and we will help you out.

Sharing is caring so help us develop your own well-being tool and be part of Preactly´journey to!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
A Deep and Gentle Clean

These items necklace, watches, glasses, toothbrush we use every day. Over time, dust, pollution, and daily wear all conspire to cloud the brilliance of gemstones. The polished look of a stainless-steel watch can begin to dull. The slight openings between the links of metal bracelets are also privy to settling dust and dirt, which can lead to wear or even corrosion. On every used toothbrush, there are harmful particles. These items require cleaning from time to time, but they are really not easy.

 

Abbi Clean is an ultrasonic cleaner, the new cleaning solution that makes it easy to remove the dirt from difficult to reach areas and keeps your valuables safe from damage.

Why is Abbi Clean So Effective?

The key innovation built into Abbi Clean is the bubble. More accurately, it’s the bubbles. We create these bubbles via soundwaves, which move through the water in a process known as “cavitation,” the bubbles forming a “cavity” in the water.

 

Hard-to-Reach Dirt Removed Fast

No problem! Abbi Clean can remove even the most stubborn particles quickly and easily. You can stop worrying about “missing a spot” from here on out.

 

Remove All Traces of Contamination Embedded Onto Surfaces

While Abbi Clean cleans effectively, it is also gentle with your belongings. This is an effective tool that will not damage anything important to you.

 

Chemical-Free Pure Physical Cleaning

Easy to Get Started

All you do is add water to the tank and turn the switch to “on.” Then it gets to work for you. Cleaning at the optimum frequency, 45KHz, it can remove mold, stains, and tiny particles efficiently and consistently.

Abbi Clean takes care of everything, doing all of the hard work for you so that you never need to blister your hands trying to scrub anything again.

 

Best Solutions for Your Jewelry Cleaning Needs

Diamond rings, earrings, bracelets, necklaces, watches broaches, and other jewelry fit perfectly in Abbi Clean, which is muchmore effective than a regular jewelry-cleaning solution. On average, Abbi Clean is a full 30-40% more effective than other solutions, which means you can count on it to protect all of your favorite jewelry pieces for the long term. In only 3 short minutes, it will sparkle and shine when you pull it out.

With proper care, your silver and platinum will retain its beauty and character for many generations to come.

 

Clean Before You Clean

The hidden dirt on your toothbrush,When you flush with water normally, the filth hidden in the crevices of the toothbrush is difficult to rinse off.

Abbi Clean is there to help you, restoring your toothbrush without any scrubbing and without any effort. It can get into all of the cracks and crevices where particles hide.

It’s important to take care of your electric toothbrush to make sure you get your best 

clean with every brush. Clean it every one or two days with AbbiClean.

 

Your Makeup Tools

Professional Cleaning Your Small Parts

Yes, Easier to Clean Contact Lenses 

How Dirty Your Metal Watchband?

Even with water-resistant designs, stainless steel watches can be vulnerable to rust due to frequent swimming, saltwater exposure or even just frequent sweating.

Abbi Clean takes your watch in for a professional service and cleaning. An expert can polish away scratches that your toothbrush can’t.Let's we have a look one of the Apple watch metal watchband,how dirty it is?

 

 

 

Abbi Clean: Your Home Cleaning Partner

Abbi Clean is a lab-tested innovation, and we are ready to introduce it to the world. Our groundbreaking device is going to introduce a new level of cleanliness on a large scale.

Unboxing From Pick Gadgets 

 

 

Take It Anywhere You Go

Compact and portable, Abbi Clean goes wherever you go. You can carry it with you to your office, to school, and then back again. If you run a jewelry business, it is perfect for your storefront too.

 

Testing and Manufacturing

Specifications

  • Product Name: Abbi Clean Clean Ultrasonic Cleaning Machine
  • Rated Voltage: DC 12V
  • Rated Power: 15W
  • Adaptor: AC100-200V 2A
  • Net Weight: 368g
  • Ultrasonic Frequency: 45,000 Hz
  • Model: CO3
  • Tank Capacity/Material: 280ml/stainless steel
  • Colors: White
  • Unit Size: 205 x 103 x 64 mm / 8.07 x 4.05 x 2.5 inches

What's in the box

 

Household Necessities

 

Who We Are

In 2012, three young professionals came together to start Shanren Technology, combining expertise in electronics, product development, and web development. We resolved to create products that would carry out a single principle: helping people live more harmoniously with nature. In the eight years since then, we have developed multiple products in the sport and health sector. Now, we are establishing Abbi Clean as the first Shanren product in the home health sector, remaining true to our founding principle and striving to exceed all of our customers’ expectations.

 

Thanks your support

To say thanks to everyone who makes a contribution to this campaign, we are offering exclusive discounts on Abbi Clean for a limited time only.

Contribute now and help us get this innovative device out to the people who need it!

 

One More Way to Help

In addition to contributing some amount of money to this campaign, you can show your support for Abbi Clean by sharing a link to the campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware of Abbi Clean before it launches, the smoother the launch process will go.

We appreciate your support.

Thank you

 

 

Time Line

 

Risks & Challenges

Since the first mass-produced product, the Shanren team has developed more than 10 products from when we began in 2012. The tooling of Abbi clean has already been completed, so we are confident that we can deliver this product to our backers as planned. If some unexpected challenges or problems arise that might affect the delivery date, we will communicate that without any delay and be completely transparent with our supporters.

 

Our Fundraising Goal

Right now, we are turning to you for help raising the funds that we need to manufacture, market, and distribute Abbi Clean on a large scale. Our goal through this campaign is to raise $3,000, which will cover our startup costs and position us to bring Abbi Clean into homes and businesses far and wide.

To say thanks to everyone who makes a contribution to this campaign, we are offering exclusive discounts on Abbi Clean for a limited time only.

Contribute now and help us get this innovative device out to the people who need it!

 

One More Way to Help

In addition to contributing some amount of money to this campaign, you can show your support for Abbi Clean by sharing a link to the campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware of Abbi Clean before it launches, the smoother the launch process will go.

We appreciate your support.

Thank you!

Clean it every one or two days with AbbiClean. Your Makeup ToolsProfessional Cleaning Your Small PartsYes, Easier to Clean Contact Lenses How Dirty Your Metal Watchband?Even with water-resistant designs, stainless steel watches can be vulnerable to rust due to frequent swimming, saltwater exposure or even just frequent sweating.Abbi Clean takes your watch in for a professional service and cleaning. An expert can polish away scratches that your toothbrush can’t.Let's we have a look one of the Apple watch metal watchband,how dirty it is?

story:
Hexa is a new, comprehensive super mask, developed to remove pollutants like PM 2.5 (fine particles), PM 10.0 (coarse particles), exhaust and other harmful substances from the air you breathe, while keeping you cool and refreshed.

Hexa is powered by twin turbo fans that can supply up to 150 liters of clean air per minute, alleviating stress on your lungs and quickly filtering thick smoke, dust, and other airborne irritants. Paired with our custom air quality sensor and an app that monitors, tracks, and alerts you to polluted air, Hexa becomes a truly unstoppable clean air system.

It is the solution for anyone exposed to polluted air; commuters, motorists, and athletes will all benefit from a cleaner air supply. Please visit https://koolmask.com for more information.

Hexa dramatically reduces your exposure to harmful pollutants. This includes PM10 (coarse particles), PM2.5 (fine particles), exhaust and odors.

Hexa not only cleans the air you breathe, it also monitors and tracks the air quality around you. With Hexa’s mobile app, air pollution alerts can be customized and delivered to your smart phone.

Air quality levels are also displayed through color-coded LED lights. With a quick glance, you can tell just how safe the air is. Hexa provides you with peace of mind whenever and wherever you need it.

Air pollution, particularly in urban areas, is a growing, global epidemic. With 80% of people living in urban areas, where they are exposed to air pollution that exceeds safe limits, it was clear to us that a safe, personal solution was needed. That is why we created Hexa.

       

 

We had regular people try Hexa and compare it to other air filtration face masks on the market.  Here's what they had to say:  

 

Here's what the media has to say:

"[An] all encompassing solution for anyone exposed to polluted air including commuters, motorists and athletes." – Gadgetsandwearables.com

“Its comprehensive system makes it a personal clean air system engineered for superior airflow and unmatched protection.” – MusttechNews.com

"While climate change and pollution are still in dire need of being addressed and resolved, products like Hexa are working to safeguard people from some of the inevitable consequences these global issues will have." - TrendHunter

"If you or a loved one live or travel to areas with bad air quality (which likely includes many, if not most, readers of this article) - check it out." - Inc.

"同时，凭借专利技术打造的特殊结构，也让HEXA能快速排出口罩内部的湿气、二氧化碳，维持使用者舒爽，不像一般口罩让人有湿黏热温的不快感受。 除此之外，HEXA还可以随时监控周围空气质量，通过LED的颜色分级显示，利用手机APP向使用者发出警告，还可绘制空气品质地图，且能与亲朋好友分享这些信息." - Sohu.com

"二手菸、店家油煙、燒金紙、汽機車廢氣……一趟短短 30 分鐘的通勤，壟罩在各種不同的空氣污染之下，若要維護身體健康，就得從保障空氣品質做起才行；新創公司 Kool Mask 推出一款可隔絕 97% PM0.01，每分鐘產生 150 公升清淨空氣的 IoT 智慧口罩「HEXA」，售價約新台幣 3 千元" - Limitlessiq.com

"Hands down the best clean air supply mask" - Interesting Engineering

 

 

Hexa can remove up to 97% of air-borne particles as small as 0.01 microns in diameter.        

Watch how quickly and effectively Hexa filters thick smoke:

Watch Hexa reduce the invisible airborne particle level to zero:

 

     

 

With our app, Hexa becomes more than just a personal clean air supply.  It monitors and tracks the air quality around you and alerts you.        

Hexa’s smart control unit functions as both an air quality sensor and fan control.  You can adjust your mask’s airflow as well as monitor the air around you.  The smart control unit can be used independently, without connecting to the mask or battery.      

Hexa’s smart control unit tracks both PM10 and PM2.5 particles and delivers data in real time to your smart phone.       

Using U.S. EPA Air Quality Index (AQI) standards, our app monitors the density of airborne particulate matter in micrograms per cubic meter of air.  This information is then reported using AQI color codes.      

Watch Hexa's smart control unit work as an air quality sensor:

Hexa’s air quality app delivers real-time air pollution data to your smart phone and allows you to:      

Set your personal alert levels

Track and map air pollution data      

Share that data with family, friends and the Hexa community to help form a global air quality monitoring network.      

Unlike air quality data provided by governmental or environmental bodies, our sensor detects the level of pollutants in a user’s immediate vicinity, providing specific, up-to-the-minute information.  Users then have the option to share the data with Hexa's global air quality network, or send directly to their friends and family.  The result?  An air quality network that provides location-specific data mapped out to share with loved ones, the Hexa community, and the general public.

 

Hexa’s custom-made twin turbo fans can supply up to 150 liters of clean air per minute.  Whether you’re walking, jogging, cycling, or running, in the city, country, or on a crowded subway, Hexa’s clean air system provides protection and enhanced access to clean air.      

Our custom engineered fans create positive air pressure inside the mask, making breathing easy and safe.

Hexa’s patent-pending exhale air valve is the secret behind the mask’s cool, dry interior - a feature that really sets it apart.  This high-efficiency exhale valve allows for the quick release of heat, moisture, and CO2, preventing excess build-up and providing lasting comfort.      

Hexa's open honeycomb structure provides extra airflow and helps with heat dissipation, a major problem in other masks.      

       

 

Hexa offers two ways to control your clean air supply.  A standard control unit, and a smart control unit with a built-in air quality sensor.      

Both control units can be used to adjust clean airflow continuously from 50 to 150 liters per minute and are easy and intuitive to use.      

       

 

Hexa is fueled by a 5200 mAh mobile power bank with ultra-low resistance cables that can operate the mask up to eight hours, depending on fan speed.  Using a mobile power bank increases safety while keeping weight to a minimum.      

The mobile power bank works with either of Hexa's control units.      

       

 

Hexa’s design philosophy is to achieve superior protection with superior functionality.  We set out to design a personal clean air supply mask that would exceed your expectations in terms of performance, comfort, mobility, and style.       

Hexa's modular clamping design makes it easy to open, change a filter, and close, while still protecting the fans and filter.      

Hexa’s honeycomb design increases the available airflow, while achieving structural integrity and light weight.      

Hexa's fan exhaust nozzles are directed away from the wearer's face to increase comfort and air circulation.      

    

We designed Hexa to work with an external power bank to increase your flexibility and safety, while reducing the weight of mask.      

Choose from one of five color options, and show off your personality and style.      

Follow the evolution of the mask design, from first hand-made prototype to our most recent 3D printed model.       

We progressed through dozens of major design reiterations, prototypes, tests, and validations to achieve our goal of making the world's best personal clean air supply mask.      

       

       

       

 

Custom-made fans achieve high static pressure and flow velocity with low noise level and thermal footprint.       

Our fans have undergone almost as many revisions as the rest of the mask during their development.      

At maximum airflow, Hexa's fans operate below skin temperature, which keeps the mask, and your face, cool.      

       

Despite its high level of efficiency, Hexa is a quiet solution.  At full speed, Hexa’s noise level is equivalent to normal conversation or the background noise of a restaurant, which is around 60 decibels.      

During laboratory testing, Hexa's filter achieved up to 97% total filtration efficiency for airborne particulate matter:

consumers older than 12 years of age.

 






 

 






 


 


 


 

Hexa is the first product designed by Koolmask, a Seattle-based tech start-up founded by Edward and his son Luke.      
When living in Asia, Luke suffered from severe allergies and asthma caused by air pollution.  Like most kids, he loves to play outside, but had to wear a face mask for all outdoor activities.  However, Luke could barely keep the mask on for 10 minutes due to the discomfort caused by the excessive heat, moisture, and restricted breathing.  Feeling frustrated and restricted, Luke wanted to have a mask that felt cool, looked cool, and would also protect him from air pollution.
They looked hard, but couldn’t find an adequate mask on the market, so they decided to develop their own.  After two years of hard work and help from family and friends, Hexa has risen from an idea to a product, with multiple pending international patents.
Luke and Edward hope Hexa will help everyone suffering from the effects of air pollution enjoy normal, active lives.

In this clip, you can see just how quickly and effectively Hexa filters the smoky air in our office from the left chamber and delivers the clean air to the right chamber.
 


 


We need your help to bring Hexa to life, spread the word, and grow the community of early adopters.  We want to engage amazing backers here and get your input to make our product even better, so that more people can enjoy healthy and active lives with our products!    
Risks and challenges
As the first of its kind, Hexa has many unique benefits and challenges in terms of design, engineering, and manufacturing.
We have done and will do our best to minimize the risk for our backers. We have gone through more than one dozen design iterations and completed four generations of prototypes. In addition, we have selected key suppliers for our major components, as well as tooling suppliers and contract manufacturers. Our mobile app has gone through 15 test versions and is on track to be released on time.
Our team is experienced in design, manufacturing, and supply chain management and we are confident that we can meet our timelines. However, unexpected delays can occur due to manufacturing issues, logistics, and other issues. We will do our best to be as transparent as possible and keep you informed, and work hard to resolve any hurdles as they may arise.
Tooling Completion & Start of Production  
As March 2020, despite of the virus situation globally, we completed all production tooling and successfully produced first article of the mask.  We are in the process to start mass production and aim for shipping in Summer 2020.

Dr. Henry Crooks found that "silver in the colloidal state is highly germicidal, quite harmless to humans and absolutely non-toxic. Rather than in a chemical compound, the silver in the colloidal state may be applied in a much more concentrated form, with correspondingly better results. He said the silver deficiency was responsible for the improper functioning of the immune system. Dr. Becker's experiments conclude that silver works on the full spectrum of pathogens without any side effects or damage to any part of the body. He also states that the silver was doing something more than killing disease organisms. It was also causing major growth stimulation of injured tissues. story:
Short Summary

My name is George McKinney and I have been an innovator and a tinkerer for most of my life.  Last year I received the Roy Clay Award for being one of the top 50 African-Americans in technology.  Roy Clay was one of the founders of HP.  In addition our technology just received a major endorsement from the University of Arkansas Pine Bluff which will dedicate faculty and staff to our technology once funded.  We have a patent on a powerful wireless technology, as well as, patent pending status on several technologies that I believe have the potential to be world-changing.  We have assembled a group of Scientists, Physicians and Engineers for the purpose of creating a dynamic tool for monitoring diabetes, which happens to be one of the fastest growing epidemics in our world today.  We have enlisted the help of Fallbrook Engineering of Encinitas CA., which has been around since 1981 and have developed a tremendous team primed for progression to tackle this task. 

Finally, the non-invasive glucose diagnostic sensor (GDS) is the device at the front and center of our technology development. Various devices on the market today are capable of constant glucose monitoring (CGM), but they fall short in accuracy and most are still invasive. Our GDS has the ability to detect blood glucose levels and wirelessly transmit this data to the connected device of the user’s choice.  Our method of doing so makes this highly disruptive. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need $50,000.00 to complete our second stage prototype 
  • We will send you a framed copy of our finished prototype photo shown as a logo.  
  • All funds will be directed towards completion of the stage 2 prototype.
  • Completion of this stage will allow licensing with multi-national corporation some of whom we have already begun discussions. 
  • Completion of this stage will create a market ready version of our product which will be our Kiosk version.  You will be able to go into a Rite Aid or CVS and test your electrolyte levels, vitamin D levels and Glucose levels in our shoe box sized bio-chamber. 

The Impact

• Most Glucose Monitoring  devices on the market fall short in accuracy and many are still invasive.  Our device will ultimately be the size of a divers watch and integrate with cell phone technology which will allow people to send needed information to first responders and caretakers

•Our device has a proprietary means of detecting the specific bio-signature of glucose and much more, we believe we our technology will eventually lead to monitoring cancers, and one day soon, ending blood draws!

•Our technology will change the world, choose us, and we will change the world together!

Risks & Challenges

One of the risks and challenges in pursuing our technology is the task of miniaturization.  Specifically, taking our device from the size of a shoe box and shrinking to down to the size of a divers watch.  Although, we know that our device will be revolutionary at the second stage of prototyping.  The real power of our device will be to shrink to the extent that it can be integrated into any smart watch.  To help us in this process we have engaged the services of Fallbrook Engineering of Encinitas which has been around since 1981 and is no stranger to working with diabetic monitors.  We will also be working with the engineering department at the University of Arkansas to help us in this task. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to contribute financially, we encourage you to get the word out.  Maybe you have connections who can contribute or professional engineers, medical doctors or advisers who can donate time.  All of your efforts will be greatly appreciated.  Please get the word out!

story:
PHOTO: Sheila speaking with a Farm Shop franchisee in Juja, Nairobi

More and more people are dying from medical conditions which are preventable.  This project focuses on cardiovascular screening in Kenya; a country who's mortality associated with cardiovascular disease is comparable to that of cancer.  This project will see us partner with local clinics, hospitals and universities to develop a sustainable model of cardiovascular disease screening for rural farming populations which currently have limited access to primary care.


Background

Infectious diseases such as HIV and Malaria have traditionally received mass media attention as priority health concerns in developing nations.  However, little attention has been given to the non-communicable diseases which are equally as important and easily preventable. In May 2015, the World Health Organization (WHO) assembly strongly supported the urgent need to find innovative, affordable and effective means for early detection, prevention and management for diseases such as cardiovascular disease, respiratory disease and cancer in developing countries such as Kenya.  


The Problem

Millions of people in Kenya are suffering from chronic diseases such as high blood pressure, heart disease and diabetes-all that are easily preventable and treatable.

Kenya is a developing country that has experienced great growth in infrastructure, economic development and GDP over the last few years. As a result, many Kenyans have experienced more wealth and as a result many people have been engaging in a more sedentary lifestyle and enjoying indulgences which were previously unaffordable. These factors have contributed to the rise of chronic diseases in Kenya, similar to many other countries in the developing world. 

In urban centers, individuals are likely have more access to primary care services. However in the majority  of rural Kenyan communities, there are limited health care facilities, hence most face limitations in access. 

According to 2014 WHO data Kenya currently does not have an operational policy, strategy or action plan to reduce unhealthy diet, reduce physical inactivity and promote lifestyle modification for cardiovascular disease prevention. In addition, there currently are no evidence-based national guidelines/protocols/standards for the management of major Non-Communicable Diseases (NCDS) through a primary care approach.

PHOTO: Measuring Blood Pressure


Our Solution

By partnering with local health centers and social enterprises, such as Farm Shop we are implementing a community based cardiovascular screening program offered directly in the Farm Shop Franchieses so that it is easily accessible to rural farming communities. When farmers go to their local Farm Shop store to buy agricultural products, they will be offered health screening at the same time. In addition, nurses will visit local farming communities and provide health seminars on how to prevent and treat cardiovascular diseases.

By combining a screening and education model that is community based and accessible, we are hoping to show that this type of intervention is effective, cost-efficient, sustainable and scale-able. 


PHOTO: A happy Farm Shop customer

The Impact we expect:

Farm Shop's near-term goal is to reach 500 shops in Kenya, serving a minimum of 250,000 farmers and indirectly benefitting at least 1 million Kenyans. Hence, by integrating a screening program through Farm Shop's network, we can potential improve the health of hundreds of thousands of Kenyans in the near future. 


Use of Funds

In order to successfully implement this pilot program we need help with purchasing equipment such as blood pressure monitors, hiring local Kenyan Nurses and training local support staff to ensure sustainability of the program. 

Your donation to this campaign will ensure that our initial test pilot program in the Kiambu region of Kenya will be successful.


Pilot Project: In Fall 2015, we will be testing our project in 5 Farm Shop franchise outlets, all located in Kiambu Kenya - just north of Nairobi city.


Project Partners

This project relies on bringing partner organizations together - we are leveraging a network of 40+ rural community hubs (through Farm Shop), satellite primary medical clinics (through the Aga Khan University Hospital) and local medical training colleges.


Farm Shop is a social enterprise striving to become the most trusted agribusiness platform for smallholder farmers across Africa. Drawing on the principles of successful franchising around the world, Farm Shop is building a franchise network of agri-dealers located in rural, undeserved areas of Kenya. 


The department of Family Medicine at the  Aga Khan University Hospital has been striving to provide high-quality care the area of disease prevention and health promotion. Though primary care is a relatively new field in Kenya, the Family Medicine Department at the Aga Khan University is creating outreach satellite clinics to rural communities with the goal of establishing a strong primary care network.

Perks

Any contribution to the project is welcome and we have some limited edition shirts and hats to give back to our community of supporters!

*Hats and Shirts may not look exactly as pictured

PHOTO: A happy Farm Shop customerThe Impact we expect:
Farm Shop's near-term goal is to reach 500 shops in Kenya, serving a minimum of 250,000 farmers and indirectly benefitting at least 1 million Kenyans. Hence, by integrating a screening program through Farm Shop's network, we can potential improve the health of hundreds of thousands of Kenyans in the near future. Use of FundsIn order to successfully implement this pilot program we need help with purchasing equipment such as blood pressure monitors, hiring local Kenyan Nurses and training local support staff to ensure sustainability of the program. Your donation to this campaign will ensure that our initial test pilot program in the Kiambu region of Kenya will be successful.Pilot Project: In Fall 2015, we will be testing our project in 5 Farm Shop franchise outlets, all located in Kiambu Kenya - just north of Nairobi city.Project Partners
This project relies on bringing partner organizations together - we are leveraging a network of 40+ rural community hubs (through Farm Shop), satellite primary medical clinics (through the Aga Khan University Hospital) and local medical training colleges.



Farm Shop is a social enterprise striving to become the most trusted agribusiness platform for smallholder farmers across Africa. Drawing on the principles of successful franchising around the world, Farm Shop is building a franchise network of agri-dealers located in rural, undeserved areas of Kenya. 



The department of Family Medicine at the  Aga Khan University Hospital has been striving to provide high-quality care the area of disease prevention and health promotion. Though primary care is a relatively new field in Kenya, the Family Medicine Department at the Aga Khan University is creating outreach satellite clinics to rural communities with the goal of establishing a strong primary care network.Perks




Any contribution to the project is welcome and we have some limited edition shirts and hats to give back to our community of supporters!



*Hats and Shirts may not look exactly as pictured

story:
Hi, my name is Clar, I am just 23 years old and I should be starting out my normal adult life with school and work. However, the reality of my life is quite different.  

On Valentine’s Day, 2015 the course of my life changed forever.  I was turning left out of a plaza when another driver slammed into me without warning.  My car was totaled and so were parts of my body.  I am blessed that I escaped with my life, but it is a life greatly changed.  I have several herniated and bulging disks in my neck and spine. My spinal cord is compressed and I have developed spinal stenosis – very painful and debilitating.  In addition, my hip is rotated backwards and I’ve damaged the nerves in my right arm.  I cannot bend, lift, reach, or even sit up for long periods of time and I am in considerable pain 24 X 7.  

Needless to say, I cannot work at any traditional job or carry on a normal life.  I used to love to do sports and spend time with my friends and family.  I was in school and studying for a BS in Holistic Medicine and Major in Alternative Health. Now, my life consists of visits to the doctor, therapy sessions, and keeping myself medicated ( I am on more than 10 medications a day) enough to function through the pain. My family is having to support me now and helping as much as they can, but they are running out of money.  I’ve had to skimp on some of my meds and stop my therapy sessions due to financial pressures.  That’s where I need your help.  100% of the donations I receive from this site will be used to cover my ongoing medical costs. I am hopeful that once I am able to return to therapy, my condition will stabilize slightly and I’ll be able to start making plans for the remainder of my life.  I am hoping to be able to take on some free-lance work on Ebay or Fiverr to gradually be able to start earning a living to supplement my disability payments. This is a freak situation that could easily have happened to anyone and I am trying my best to get through it with grace and dignity, but it’s been a tough situation for me and for my family.  Anything you can do to help out would be greatly appreciated!

story:
Help to Save our Country...


Go Healthy Caribbean's main objective is to use television and print to transform the people of Jamaica and the rest of the Caribbean to thinking and acting in ways that will create healthier lifestyle as it relates to food, exercise and fitness, the mind, and the environment. Too often we watch our parents, brothers, sisters, and other family members died or suffer from illnesses that could be avoided. The lack of knowledge to the average person is destroying our people, the environment and the society at large. We can do better. We have made the move in the right direction to do better. WE NEED YOU TO HELP US MAKE IT HAPPEN!

This TV show aims for a renewed attitude, one that says, “I will Go Healthy today, this week, this month and for years to come!” We want to see a transformation in how people think about themselves and through this proactive programme, they will understand good health as a body, mind and soul/spirit and environment concept.


WHY GO HEALTHY?

Go Healthy Jamaica, THE PILOT and first series, is a half an hour, once per week programme, which will attract a diverse Jamaican audience, engaging them with healthy living displays and discussions.

The beautiful Island of Jamaica with all the tropical fruits and foods (See below) of the world has its population struggle with many food related illnesses such as Diabetes, Hypertension and heart disease.

Did you know that 26.6% of Jamaicans were overweight and 25.2% were obese in the 15-74 age groups? Jamaica Health and Lifestyle Survey reported these statistics in 2008.

The emphasis of the programme in the initial phase is placed on educating the population on how Healthy minds can create healthy families and healthy families will result in higher productivity. A win-win for the world! Combining a healthy mind and body will ultimately result in a productive, less stressed and more peaceful society.


THE TEAM

Aldain "Craig" Thomas, 32 year old fitness enthusiast and body builder who returned to Jamaica after living in the UK for over 10 years is the founder and Director of this project. He was astonished at the alarming reality of the attitude towards food, how and what Jamaicans eat and how they treat each other and environment. These are elements which contribute to the decay in the society. He is encouraged and committed to begin the Go Healthy Caribbean Campaign starting with his home country Jamaica then extending the programme to other Caribbean nations.

Email: aldainthomas371@gmail.com

Ceceille Palmer is a Director and the Project Coordinator. She has worked on numerous projects including the annual Culinary Federations Taste of Jamaica, Jamaica Lifestyle Festival and ActionCOACH Buying Customers event in Jamaica. She is a self made Life Coach and an advocate for healthy living and eating. Ceceille is a Lecturer in Project Management as well as Business and Marketing Consultant.

Alecia Smith Edwards, Social Media and Communications Manager. She is a professional Journalist with Jamaica Information Service.


HOW CAN YOU HELP? 

Help us to fund this project in the form of a TV programme, which will be our Pilot Promotional Video to create the weekly series.

Share the Mission and Vision to create a healthier nation by liking and sharing the facebook and twitter campaign

Tell all your friends and family to support Jamaica by supporting our campaign

Thanks in advance for your support


WHY INVEST YOUR MONEY WITH US?

Changing a nation for better will help to change the world. We all want to be change agents. We are a group of individuals determined to help our country move positively forward.

We are business people who will ensure your investment gives a positive return to all involved

What makes us different?

No other programme in Jamaica offer anything similar, we will be successful.

Recognizing and utilizing the resources we have in our foods, helping our people and creating lasting and positive change.


The Ask…

How will it be spent?

US$5,500 Camera and Production Team

US$2,000 Script Writers and Editors

US$2,000 Music, Graphics and Presenter

US$500 Creating the promotional DVDs


CONTACT US

www.facebook.com/gohealthycaribbean 

twitter.com/GoHealthyCarib

https://instagram.com/gohealthycaribbean


Go Healthy Team

Email: gohealthycaribbean@gmail.com

Telephone: (876) 373-9472 or (876) 371- 5945

story:
Tennis Round - Overview

tennisround.com connects you with local tennis players at nearby tennis courts. Players are matched based on skill level and location. With users registered in 4,000 cities Tennis Round helps players stay in touch when they move or travel. 

Buy a T-Shirt, Support Tennis Round.

If you buy one of our unique perks - t-shirts or Pebble Smart Watches - you'll help us raise funds to grow the Tennis Round community, improve the service and expand it to more cities and countries. Some of these perks come with free subscriptions to our Premium Plan, which is normally $29 per year. 

Our Goal & Your Impact

Our goal is raise funds to make Tennis Round more enjoyable and build new features such as Doubles, Mixed Doubles, Leagues, Tournaments, Player Matching by Gender, Age, Match Results, Add New Courts, Reviews, Ratings.
Your contribution will also help us roll out Tennis Round internationally. So, next time you visit Australia, Canada, UK or Singapore you can take the racket with you. 
Please buy one of our unique perks to support the campaign. You'll get a cool souvenir and help us grow and improve Tennis Round. 

Perks - T-shirts & Watches

These are the t-shirt and Pebble watches we have available as perks. Take a look and pick one you like. We'll start shipping them as soon as the campaign ends. But we'll send you the promo code for our Premium Plan Subscription within a few days of your contribution (if your perk includes one). 
  • T-shirt Design #1: Small Tennis Ball (top right)

  • T-shirt #2: Players Mashup

  • T-shirt Design #3: Tennis Round Name

  • T-shirt Design #4: Big Tennis Ball (center)

  • T-shirt Design #5: Tennis Ronin

  • Pebble Watch: Time (pick one)

  • Pebble Watch: Classic (pick one)

Testimonials

Check out what some of our users are saying about Tennis Round:

  • What a great site! I’ve been a USPTA pro for over 40 years and I’m in the midst of recommending this site to all of my students. Fred Drilling, USPTA American University

  • I have met two hitting partners already through your site. Thanks for providing that service. I hope to use the site further in the future. - Christina

  • It’s a great site. I have found a couple of games since I joined. My only recommendation at this point is adding the ability to filter a search for tennis courts – example: lighted public courts within 10 miles of 31234. Love the website. - Chris Moore

  • You folks as well as the website are fantastic. Thanks for making these tennis happenings so easy. I will talk it up to everyone I can here in Louisville, Ky. The other few site are quite difficult and not user friendly or near as approachable as yours!!!!! Thanks for helping me have THE best summer!!! - Paul Petty

  • Tennis Round has been great for getting my tennis game established since moving to Walnut Creek, CA. Scheduling matches is a breeze and being able to connect with new players who just as motivated to play helps keep tennis a regular thing. Through the site I met a group of guys that I now play with weekly. Being able to research courts and lights is also a huge help for scheduling matches if you're new to an area. Love the service. Keep up the good work!" - William Yeh

  • Awesome. Thanks for adding the courts. :) I must say this site is pretty cool. I like the ideas you are putting into it. I hope it grows the tennis community as well as make it a more open and accessible sport. - Linc DeRose

Other Ways You Can Help

Facebook Post a link to www.tennisround.com on your Facebook, Twitter or blog. Share our video and IndieGoGo campaign to raise awareness of Tennis Round so other tennis players can join the site.

Partnerships If you have a tennis or fitness related business, let's partner up - partnerships@tennisround.com or text/ call 415-754-8068.

Who We Are

We're a small team of marketing and technology professionals living in San Francisco, CA. Our background is in designing and building internet applications for big brands like Google, YouTube, Yahoo, Microsoft, AMEX, JCPenney and Trulia. 
We launched Tennis Round in 2010 and signed up 2,000 players the first year. Now every month over 100,000 people visit www.tennisround.com to find nearby tennis courts and connect with tennis players in their own city.

story:
Short Summary

Why I Decided to Take Control of My Health!

My name is Jarik Conrad. I, like many of you, have a family history of chronic disease. I lost two sisters way too early – Rita at 35 to cancer and Chandra at 47 to a heart attack.

About a decade ago, after a lifetime of eating fast-food, processed food and a diet full of animal products, I learned my cholesterol was dangerously high. My doctor prescribed me a statin and informed me that I would most likely take it for the rest of my life!

Not satisfied with that prognosis, I began educating myself about health and nutrition and began making changes to my diet. Today I am prescription drug-free and my cholesterol has dropped more than 140 points!

Not wanting to speak purely from my own experience I was inspired to seek a certificate in Plant-Based Nutrition from Cornell University and launch Sprouted Bean Health Systems to help as many people as I can!



Be the First to Get Healthy with PB101!

Over the past 10 years I have trained thousands of people on how to improve their social and emotional skills to be better leaders, better coworkers and better employees.  With PB101, you can use those same skills (like improving your impulse control, self-regard and ability to mange stress) to finally get off of that diet roller coaster.  

What makes us different is our focus on the brain and what science tells us about human behavior. We have three areas of focus:

  1. Use Your Whole Brain - We offer assessments and training on emotional intelligence and decision-making.
  2. Eat Your Whole Foods - We provide nutrition education and practical tools including meal creators, recipes, healthy alternatives to processed foods and animal products.
  3. Work Your Whole Body - We provide education and programs on functional exercise so the you can have a lifestyle free of pain and limitations.
We look forward to helping you make 2015 your healthiest year ever!


Jarik E. Conrad, EdD, MBA, MILR, CPT

CEO and President

Sprouted Bean Health Systems, LLC

What We Need & What You Get

We are raising $17,000 in order to:

  • Complete the Emotional and Social Intelligence training videos. 
  • Complete key web site and mobile app updates, including starting to add the subscription services.
We have a variety of perks and funding options:



Once all of the premium features are added, subscribers to PB101 will receive:

  • A health assessment
  • A personalized health plan
  • On-line emotional intelligence training
  • Continually updated content featuring articles and studies regarding health and nutrition
  • Access to health coaches
  • Progress tracking tools
  • Games and activities
  • Most importantly you will be connected to a supportive network to keep you energized and focused.
The Impact

Almost 70% of Americans are overweight and nearly 40% are obese.  By 2020, obesity and its associated complications is expected to be the #1 killer on the planet.  Half of Americans have at least one preventable chronic disease.

The best weapons against these killers are proper nutrition and exercise, yet people consistently have trouble eating well and taking care of themselves.  We will help people understand why their past efforts have failed and teach them how they can look good and feel great with no gimmicks.

Your contribution will help us improve the quality of people's lives and, in some cases, save lives! 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk to this campaign and our overall success with this business is convincing people that living healthy can be easier than they think and will not require them to give up eating tasty food.  

We can overcome this challenge by not only giving people the information and resources they need, but also helping better understand and improve their thinking and decision-making.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please let your friends and family who want to lose weight and improve their overall health know about PB101 and our campaign. Visit us at www.pb101.com.  

Also, please remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you so much for your support!

story:
Hi there, my name is Alina Lapteva.  I am a professional personal trainer, and a nutritionist.  At this point of my career, I would like to create some fun and creative fitness projects, such as a fitness reality show.  

I started a project called 100 Days After Challenge, where participants set up their fitness goals that they must accomplish in 100 days.  

To keep the participants extra motivated, I set up different prizes for the winners, including $1000 cash, a diamond ring, and a whole day in the spa!  

The whole project will cost me about $5,000 so please help me raise this funding, and support your friends who are participating in this challenge!

Follow 100 Days After Challenge on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQlvQwvgkE4FuE7AlngjqEw

And vote on my Facebook page for your favourite participant by mentioning their name under the videos (1 vote per participant). https://www.facebook.com/alina.lapteva?fref=ts  

Please feel free to share this campaign to others.  We really appreciate your time and help.  Thank you.
